GSD36mvir_sau:586: jāte ca maraṇe caiva tatkālavyāpinī tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:588: manvādau ca yugādau ca grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ /

GSD36mvir_sau:609: atra hi yadyadeteṣu vihitaṃ tattadatra kurvāditi na vidherya vidhita eva tatsiddheḥ /

GSD36mvir_sau:625: yadi nobhayatra kintu karmaikadeśasambandhastatrāpi yadi samastadopakramavākyāt yadi viṣamastadādhikyenetyāha

GSD36mvir_sau:638: yugmāgnyoḥ yugabhūtayoḥ ṣaṇmunyoḥ vasurandhrayoḥ rudradvādaśyoḥ caturdaśīpūrṇimayoḥ amāvāsyāpratipadośca tithyoryugme parasparavedhaḥ /

GSD36mvir_sau:681: yāṃ tithiṃ samanuprāpya udayaṃ yāti bhāskaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:683: yāṃ tithiṃ samanuprāpya astaṃ yāti divākaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:693: vṛddhyādītyādipade vātadguṇasaṃvijñānabahuvrīhiṇā yajñopavītādidaivadharmavatāṃ daivaśrāddhādīnāṃ pitryāṇāṃ ca putravṛddhini mittavaśenāniyatakālakatvenānirṇeyatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:695: yugmavākyānāṃ tu mithovirodhe tadaviṣayībhūtatithiṣu ca daśamyādiṣu śuklakṛṣṇavākhyādvyavasthā apekṣitavighānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:697: na copavāsa eva śuklakṛṣṇavākyādvyavasthā tadatirikte tu viruddhayugmavākyadvayavirodhāt vikalpa evāstviti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:698: tatra upavāsaprakrame 'pi”tayā karmāṇi kurvīta”iti bahuvacanena karmamātre tadavagamāt
GSD36mvir_sau:699: yattu devalavākyaṃ tat yugmavākyādinā pūrvasyāmuttarasyāṃ vā grāhyatvena prāptāyāṃ tattadaharbhāge tattithyabhāve titheḥ pradhānatvādaharbhāgasya ca guṇabhūtatvād guṇamukhyavyatikramanyāyena tithāveva kartavyatve prāpte aharbhāge evānuṣṭhānasiddhyarthamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:702: prācyāstu dvi tīyādikayugmānāmiti pūrvārddhe na vivādaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:706: hāsavṛddhī candrasya tayorādirāśrayaḥ kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣau tatsambandhinī codanā śuklakṛṣṇapakṣavākyamityarthaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:707: athavā hrāsa vṛddhī kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣau tāvādirnirmittabhūtā yasyāścodanāyā nirṇayasye tyarthaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:710: āparāhṇikaśrāddhe tu yayāstaṃ savitā yāti pitarastāmupāsate /
GSD36mvir_sau:713: yadyapi śuklakṛṣṇavākyaṃ daśamyādiviṣaye daive 'pi pravartata iti nāsya
GSD36mvir_sau:714: pitryamātraviṣayatvaṃ tathāpi āparāhṇikaśrāddhātiriktaśrāddheṣu śuklakṛṣṇavākyameva nirṇāyakamiti vyavasthārthaṃ hrāsavṛddhyādicodaneti vākyamityadoṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:721: yadapi”karmaṇo yasya yaḥ kāla”iti vākye “hrāsavṛddhī na kāraṇam'; ityatra hrāsavṛddhigrahaṇaṃ tadapi śuklakṛṣṇaparamevetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:725: kiñca pūrvārddhe yugmavākyaṃ daiva eveti niyamavidhānāt /

GSD36mvir_sau:729: staṃ'; itivākyasya grahaṇādekoddiṣṭe paviṇe ca tithivṛddhikṣayasāmyaprayuktasandehe sati
GSD36mvir_sau:732: kiñca vṛddhyādāvitipadena sandehapratipādanaṃ vyarthaṃ sarvanirṇayavākvānāṃ sandeha eva pravṛtteḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:733: teṣu satsvapi karmakālavyāpto satyāṃ sandehābhāvānna sandehotthāpakatvamapi teṣāṃ kintu tithikhaṇḍatvasyaivetyuktam
GSD36mvir_sau:734: yā ca yayāstamityādeḥ pārvaṇaviṣayatvena vyavasthā sāpyayuktā /
GSD36mvir_sau:738: ityādivākyaparyālocanayā dvidhāvibhaktadināparāhnaviṣayatvāt sakalapitryaviṣayatve 'pi na kāpi kṣatiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:739: ekoddiṣṭāderapi hi kutapapūrvārddha upakrame 'pi tādṛśāparāhṇa eva samāpyamānatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:743: udite daivataṃ bhānau pitryaṃ cāstamite ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:751: kṛṣṇapakṣe 'parāhṇe tu rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:753: tasmāt yayāstamityādi na pārvaṇe 'stamayavyāpitithividhāyakaṃ kintu sarvapitrye kharvadarpavākyaprāptāstamayavyāpitvānuvādamātram
GSD36mvir_sau:756: sā tithiḥ sakalā jñeyā pitrye 'rthe cāparāhṇikī //
GSD36mvir_sau:758: tasmāduktayuktyā pitrye kharvavākyāt, daive yugmavākyāt, yugmavākyavirodhe tadaviṣayatithiṣu ca śuklakṛṣṇavākyānnirṇaya iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:759: yatra pūrvaviddhīyā grāhyatvaṃ yugmādivākyādavagataṃ yathā ddhitīyāviddhāyāstṛtīyāyāstatra tṛtīyāyā dvitīyādināstamayāt pūrvaṃ trimuhūrtāyāstato 'dhikāyā vā sattve evāgrāhyatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:761: evaṃ yatra uttaraviddhāyā grāhyatvaṃ yugmādivākyādavagataṃ yathā tṛtīyāviddhāyā dvitīyāyāstatra dvitīyāyāstṛtīyādine udayādurdhvaṃ trimuhūrtāyāstato 'dhikāyā vā sattve eva tat na tu tato nyūnatve /
GSD36mvir_sau:765: udite daivataṃ bhānau pitryaṃ cāstamite ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:772: na tu havye yodayavyāpinī kavye yāstamayavyāpinī tasyā dvitrimūhūrtasattoddeśyaviśeṣaṇasyābivakṣitatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:774: yāṃ prāpyāstamupaityarkaḥ sā cet syāt trimuhūrtagā /
GSD36mvir_sau:778: trimūhūrtā na kartavyā yā tithiḥ kṣayagāminī /
GSD36mvir_sau:780: iti dakṣavacane 'piśabdaśravaṇāt, pūrvārddhe kṣayagāminyāstrimuhūrtāyā niṣedhasya prāptipūrvakatvena vṛddhisāmyayostrimuhūrtagrāhyatvaliṅgācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:781: vastutastu pūrvottarārddhayorekavākayatārthamuttarārddhagatāpiśabdānu ṣaṅgeṇa dvimuhūrtānukalpastutyarthatvameva yuktaṃ na tu svatantro niṣedho vā kyabhedāpatteḥ /

GSD36mvir_sau:783: evaṃ yatra pūrvaviddhottaraviddhā vā niṣidhyate tatrāpi yadi pūrvatithirvodhikā yathā pratipat dvitīyāyāstatra pratipadūdayānantaraṃ trimuhūrtā tato 'dhikā vottaratithervedhikā, yadi uttaratithirvedhikā yathā dvitīyā pratipadastatra dvitīyā pratipadidane 'stamayātprāk
GSD36mvir_sau:784: trimuhūrtā tato 'dhikā vā na tato nyūneti /
GSD36mvir_sau:792: ityādīni trimuhūrtanyūnāyā api sampūrṇatvapratipādakāni tānyaṣṭākapāla āgneyādhikaraṇanyāyena trimuhūrtavedhastāvakāni stokāpītyapiśabdopādānādityalam /
GSD36mvir_sau:794: upavāsādau tu yā pūrvadine śuddhā satyuttaradine nāsti trimuhūrtanyūnāsti vā tatrāyugmāpi pūrvaiva trimuhūrtanyūnāyā yuṣmaśāstrāviṣayatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:795: yā tu pūrvadine trimuhūrtaviddhottaradine trimūhūrtā tato 'dhikā vā tatra yugmavākyānnirṇayaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:796: na cottarāyā yugmavākyavi ṣayabhūtatve 'pi pūrvaiva kāryā /

GSD36mvir_sau:800: hemādrimadanaratnayostūpavāse tu yatra pūrvatithividdhottarā niṣiddhā yathā pratipadviddhā dvitīyā tatra trimuhūrtanyūnayāpi pratipadā viddhā dvitīyā yadyuttaradine trimuhūrtanyūnāpyasti tadottaraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:801: ghaṭikārghaṃ tribhāgaṃ vā svalpaṃ vā dūṣayottithim /

GSD36mvir_sau:813: pūrṇā ityeva mantavyā prasūtā nodayaṃ vinā //
GSD36mvir_sau:815: yadā tūttaradine svalpāpi na labhyate tadā niṣiddhapūrvatithividdhāpyupoṣyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:821: pañcamuhūrtaviddhāyā ekādaśryā grāhyatvaṃ ca yadā daśamī pañcamuhūrtā paradine ekādaśī dvimuhūrtā dvādaśī ca kṣayaṃ gatā tadā jñeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:825: yatra tu pūrvaviddhā grāhyetyuktaṃ tatra trimuhūrtavedha eveti viśeṣa iti yuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:851: daivāntareṣu tu kṛṣṇāyā uttaraviddhātvaṃ śuklāyāśca pūrvaviddhātvamavivādameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:852: idaṃ cīpavāse daivāntareṣu ca śuklāyāḥ pūrvaviddhātvaṃ na sāyaṃ trimūhurttasattve kintu āparāhṇikyā eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:855: yattu gauḍaiḥ etasya vacanasya nirmūlatvaṃ, samūlatve āparāhṇikapitryaviṣayatvaṃ yacchabdayogāt
GSD36mvir_sau:856: vacanāntaraprāptāṃ pitrya āparāhṇikīmuddiśya sammukhītvasya lāghavena vidhānādityuktam /

GSD36mvir_sau:911: vṛtte tuṣārasamaye sitapañcadaśyāṃ prātarvasantamaye samupasthite ca /

GSD36mvir_sau:929: tattu samabhivyāhārarūpasannidhivaśena sāmānyaviṣayayugādiśruti saṅkocāyogāt pratipadyapyamāvāsyeti pakṣadvayavartyamāpratipatsamabhivyāhārāccāyuktamiti pūrvoktaiva vyavasthā jyāyasī /
GSD36mvir_sau:937: iti nāradīyavākye tṛtīyāyā dvitīyādūṣakatvābhidhānadvārā upavāse paraviddhadvitīyāyā niṣedhāt sā upavāsātiriktadaivaviṣayaiva syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:938: viṣṇudharmottaravākyena ca upavāsa eva punaḥ parānvitāvidhāne sati vidhiniṣedhayorvirodhe sati śuklakṛṣṇavākyābhyāṃ vyavasthāpanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:939: tathācātra upavāsagrahaṇasya upalakṣaṇamātraparatayā paraviddhāyāḥ pūrvaviddhāyāśca śuklakṛṣṇapakṣavyavasthayā sarvadaivaviṣayatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:940: evaṃ sarvatra sāmānyato nirṇīte 'rthe viśeṣato niṣedhe punarviśeṣavidhānasya idameva prayojanaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:941: yacca kṛṣṇadvitīyāyāḥ pūrvaviddhāyā grāhyatvamuktaṃ tat pūrvāhṇasaṃsparśe satyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:943: paurvāhṇikī ca kartavyā dvitīyā tādṛśī vibho! //
GSD36mvir_sau:948: yatra pūrvaviddhatvaṃ prāptaṃ tatraiva paurvahṇikatvavidhānāt kṛṣṇapakṣaviṣayatvameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:949: asmiṃśca vākhye yadyapi pūrvāhṇāparāhṇaśabdadarśanāt dvedhā vibhāga eva pratibhāsate /
GSD36mvir_sau:952: tathā ca tatsāhacaryāt paurvāhṇikatvamapi pañcadhāvibhāgapakṣeṇaiva, anhaḥ pūrvo bhāgaḥ pūrvāhṇa ityevaṃ vyutpattyā prātaḥ-kālasambandhitvameva
GSD36mvir_sau:954: nanvevaṃ vyākhyāne etasyāḥ śuddhatvādeva grāhyatvaṃ prāptamiti vacanāmidamanarthakaṃ syāt
GSD36mvir_sau:956: etadvacanābhāve hi yā pūrvedyuḥ sarvaṃ prātaḥ kālaṃ parityajya pravṛttā paredyuśca trimuhūrtā tato 'dhikā vā sā kṛṣṇapakṣagatatvena pūrvaiva grāhyā syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:958: paredyuśca paraviddhāvacanānāṃ yugmāgnītyādīnāṃ pravṛtteḥ parasyā eva grāhyatvasiddhirityasya vacanasya prayojanaṃ vyatirekataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati
GSD36mvir_sau:959: nanu yugmādivākyānāṃ śuklakṛṣṇavākyābhyāṃ śuklakṛṣṇaviṣayatvena vyavasthāpitānāṃ kathaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe pravṛttiḥ ? ucyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:961: yadā tu tāni vacanāni paurvāhvikītyanena vi śeṣavacanena sambadhyante yā pratipadyuktā grāhyā sā paurvāhṇikītyevamarthatayā tadā etādṛśānāmeva yugmāgnivākyavirodhāt śuklakṛṣṇapakṣaparatayā vyavasthāpanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:962: yā tu sarvaṃ prātaḥ kālaṃ parityajya pravṛttā paradine ca trimuhūrtā tato 'dhikā ca tasyāṃ pūrvaviddhāgrāhyatvavacanābhāvāt bhavedeva yugmavākyānāṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:964: yā tu paredyustrimuhūrtanyūnā sā pūrvāhṇasaṃsparśābhāve 'pi pūrvaiva grāhyā sandehābhāvāt, paraviddhāvacanānāmapravṛtteśca /
GSD36mvir_sau:970: sā dvitīyā paropoṣyā pūrvaviddhā tato 'nyathā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:972: śrāvaṇādimāsacatuṣṭayāsitapakṣadvitīyāsu aśūnyaśayanākhye vrate candrodayavyāpinī grāhyā tasya candrodaye vidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:973: candrodayavratatvaṃ cāsya candrāya cārghyo dātavyo dadhyakṣataphalādibhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:978: yāmupoṣya na vaidhavyaṃ strī prayāti narādhipa! // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:991: prathamā śrāvaṇe māsi māsi bhādre tathā parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:993: śrāvaṇe kaluṣā nāma tathā bhādre ca gīrmatā /
GSD36mvir_sau:995: ityuktvā grathamāyāṃ vrataṃ dvitīyāyāṃ sarasvatīpūjāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ śrāddhamuktvā caturthyāmuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:999: asyāṃ nijagṛhe vipra! na bhoktavyaṃ tato naraiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1013: caturthīsaṃyutā yā ca sā tṛtīyā phalapradā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1019: dvitīyayā tu yā viddhā tṛtīyā na kadācana /
GSD36mvir_sau:1024: tṛtīyā tu na kartavyā dvitīyopahatā vibho! /
GSD36mvir_sau:1025: dvitīyayā yutāṃ tāṃ tu yaḥ karoti narādhamaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1029: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ kālasūtraṃ bhayaṅkaram //
GSD36mvir_sau:1033: tṛtīyā tu na kartavyā dvitīyāsaṃyutā tithiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1034: yā karoti vimūḍhā strī puruṣo vā śikhidhvaja! /
GSD36mvir_sau:1038: sā tṛtīyā na kartavyā kartavyā gaṇasaṃyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1041: kāryā dvitīyayā sārddhaṃ na tṛtīyā kadācana / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1043: atra”rambhākyāṃ varjayitvā”iti”vihāyaikāṃ tu rambhākhyāṃ”iti ca śravaṇādrambhāvrate dvitīyāyuktatṛtīyā grāhyeti gamyate sākṣādvidhānāccayathoktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:1046: kṛṣṇāṣṭamī ca bhūtā ca kartavyā sammukhī tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1049: bṛhattapā tathā brahmana! kartavyā sammukhī tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1053: amāvāsyā tṛtīyā ca tā upoṣyāḥ parānvitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1056: ityādivacaneṣu upavāsavyatiriktakārye 'pi paraviddhātvasahkīrttanāt ekādaśyaṣṭamītivākyaṃ tu tithiviśeṣe upavāse paraviddhatvaṃ pratipādayati
GSD36mvir_sau:1072: śuklapakṣagatāyāstu tasyā eva titheryasyāmabhyudito raviriti caturthīyutāyā grāhyatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1073: vastutastu na śuklakṛṣṇabhedena vidhiniṣedhayorviṣaya vyavasthā yuktimatī
GSD36mvir_sau:1074: tathāsati dvitīyāyuktatṛtīyānaṣedhakānāṃ caturthīyuktatṛtīyāvidhāyakānāṃ ca prāgudāhṛtānāṃ bahūnāṃ saṅkocāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1076: rambhāvrataparityāgena dvitīyāyutatṛtīyāniṣedhānāṃ caturthīyutatṛtīyāvidhīnāṃ ca śuklapakṣe 'pi pravṛtteraṅgīkaraṇāt”anyeṣu
GSD36mvir_sau:1078: kevalaṃ yugmavākyameva tu rambhāvrataviṣayatvenāsmatpakṣe saṅkocyate iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1079: ayaṃ ca dvitīyāvedhaḥ svalpo 'pi tyājyo na tu muhūrtatrayaparimita eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1082: ata eva tṛtīyāpi caturthīyutā svalpāpi grāhyā na tu trimuhūrtatvakarmakālatvādaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1083: ayaṃ cālpasyāpi dvitīyāvedhasya niṣedhaḥ, alpottaratṛtīyāparigrahaśca śiṣṭācārāt gaurīdaivatyavratāviṣaya eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1084: vratāntareṣu tu niṣedhyadvitīyāvedhādestrimuhūrtatvamādaraṇīyameva yadā tūttaradine alpāpi tṛtīyā na labhyate tadā sarvavrateṣu dvitīyāyuktāpi grāhyaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1085: ekādaśī tṛtīyā ca ṣaṣṭhī caiva trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1086: pūrvaviddhāpi kartavyā yadi na syāt pare 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:1088: yadā tu pūrvadine tṛtīyā śuddhā satī uttaradine varddhate tadā śuddhāmapi tyaktvā caturthīyuktaiva grāhyā”gaṇayuktā praśasyata”ityādivacanaiḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:1090: anye tu etādṛśaviṣaye niṣedhavākyānāmapravṛtteḥ śuddhādhikāyāmapyuttaraviddhaiva tṛtīyā grāhyetyetadarthapratipādakasya vacanasyānupalambhāt gaṇayuktādivākyānāṃ ca tṛtīyāyāḥ dvitīyāvedhacaturthīvedhayoḥ satoḥ pūrvaviddhā vā grāhyā uttaraviddhā vā grāhyā ityevaṃ sandehe sati nirṇāyakatvāt etādṛśaviṣaye ca titheḥ pūrṇatvena sandehānudayāt nirṇāyakagaṇayuktādivākyāpravṛtteḥ pūrvaiva tṛtīyā grāhyetyāhuḥ tadayaṃ saṅkṣepaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1091: rambhāvra tārikteṣu upavāsādisakaladevakāryeṣu na dvitīyāviddhā tṛtīyā grāhyā kintu caturthīṃyuktā
GSD36mvir_sau:1092: gaurīvrateṣu svalpayāpi dvitīyayā yuktā varjyā na dvitīyāyāstrimuhūrtatvādaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1093: tathā gaurīvrata eva atrimuhūrtāpi caturthīyuktā grāhyā vratāntareṣu vedhyavedhakayostṛtīyādvitīyayostrimuhūrtatvamāśrayaṇīyameva
GSD36mvir_sau:1094: yadā tu svalpāpi tṛtīyottaradine na labhyate tadā dvitīyāviddhāpi sarvavrateṣu grāhyaiva rambhāvrate tu dvitīyāyuktaiva grāhyā tadalābhe ca dvitīyāyuktāpi śudrādhikā punaḥ pūrṇatvāt pūrvaivādeyeti iti tṛtīyānirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1103: caturthīsaṃyutā yā tu tṛtīyā sā phalapradā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1107: atra gaṇanāthetiviśeṣaṇasāmarthyāt gaṇanāthavrate tṛtīyāyuktā caturthī grāhyeti gamyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1114: si dvivināyakavrate ca madhyāhnavyāpinī caturthā prāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1119: yadi paredyureva madhyāhnavyāptiḥ tadaiva pare 'hani pañcamīviddhetyarthaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:1123: yadā tu pūrvaṃdine mātṛviddhā paredyureva ca madhyāhnavyāpinī bhavati tadā mātṛviddhātvaguṇayogena paradina eva vināyakavratamanuṣṭheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1128: viṣāṇiṃ tasya naśyanti na taṃ hiṃsanti pannagāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1131: yadā pūrvedyu reva madhyāhnavyāptiḥ tadaiva pūrvā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1133: pañcamyā nāgatithitvena tadyogasya prāśastyāt kecittu nāgadevatāvrate 'pi
GSD36mvir_sau:1140: tatra hi caturthī tṛtīyāyuktā grāhyetyeyāvat pratīyate na punarnāgacaturthī tṛtīyāyukteti
GSD36mvir_sau:1142: tena nāgadevatāvrate dinadvaye madhyāhnabyāptyādinā caturthīgrahaṇasandehe yugmavākyāt paraiva grāhyā, yadā tu pūrvadina eva madhyāhnavabyāptistadā karmakālaśāstrasya prābalyāt pūrvā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1147: gaurīvrate tu tṛtīyāyuktacaturthī grāhyā tṛtīyāyā gaurīdevatātvena tadyogasya prāśastyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1152: nidrāṃ ratiṃ śivāṃ bhadrāṃ kīrtiṃ medhāṃ sarasvatīm /
GSD36mvir_sau:1153: prajñāṃ tuṣṭiṃ tathā kāntiṃ tatraivāhani pūjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:1158: pūjāṃ kṛtvā labhet siddhiṃ saubhāgyaṃ ca naraḥ kramāt // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1162: caturthī varadā nāma gaurī tatra supūjitā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1164: jayā ca yadi sampūrṇā caturthī hasate punaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1165: jayā saiva hi kartavyā nāgaviddhāṃ na kārayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:1166: iti vacanamapi gaurīvrate kaimutyanyāyena tṛtīyāyuktacaturthīṃ grāhyatayā pratipādayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:1168: yadā paradine caturthīhrāsena pañcamī viddhā bhavati pūrvadine punarjayā sampūrṇadinavyāpinī bhavati tadā śuddhā tṛtīyāpi caturthīvrate grāhyā na tu doṣabhūyiṣṭhā pañcamīviddhā caturthīti na tvidaṃ vacanaṃ caturthīvrate śuddhatṛtīyāṃ grāhyatayā pratipādayati pañcamīviddhacaturthīniṣedhaparatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:1171: yadā pūrvadine madhyāhne jayā sampūrṇā uttaradine punarhāsavaśāccaturthī madhyāhvādarvāgeva samāpyate tadā dinadvaye karmakāle caturthyā abhāve sati kiṃ dinaṃ grāhyāmatyapekṣāyāmidaṃ vacanamārabhyate-jayā ca yadi sampūrṇeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1172: jayāyā madhyānhavyāpitve 'pi jayāyuktā pūrvaiṃva caturthī grāhyā na tu
GSD36mvir_sau:1175: vatsasya pūjā śivarātriretāḥ parā vinighnanti nṛpaṃ sarāṣṭram //
GSD36mvir_sau:1176: itipurāṇamuñcayavacanādapi gaurīvrate tṛtīyāyuktā caturthī grāhyeti pratīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1180: kecittu śuklacaturthī pañcamīyutā kṛṣṇacaturthī tṛtīyāyutā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1184: saṅkaṣṭacaturthī tu candrodayavyāpinī grāhyā tasyāstatkalpe candrodayakālatvavidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1187: pañcamī upavāsādisakaladaivakarmasu pūrvayutā grāhyā yugabhūtānāmiti yuramavākyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1189: pañcamī ca tathā kāryā caturthīsaṃyutā vibho! / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1192: pañcamī tu caturthyā tu kāryā ṣaṣṭhyā na saṃyutā / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1196: iti vaśiṣṭhavākye parigaṇitavyatiriktāyāḥ paraśabdasaṃgṛhītāyāḥ pañcabhyā upavāse pūrvasaṃyuktatvābhidhānācca
GSD36mvir_sau:1197: tena yadyapi prāyaḥ prānta upoṣyā hi tithirdevaphalepsubhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1198: iti śivarahasyasaurapurāṇayostithiprāntasyopavāse aṅgatvābhidhānāttithidvaidhe paraviddhā tithirupavāse grāhyeti pratīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1199: tathāpyasya sāmānyavidhitvāt prāgudāhṛtatattadviśeṣavacanaiḥ upavāse pañcamyāḥ pūrvayuktatvaṃ yuktameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:1200: etadevābhipretya prāyaḥ prānta iti prāyaḥśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1201: yattu pañcamī tu prakartavyā ṣaṣṭhyā yuktā tu nārada! /
GSD36mvir_sau:1211: caturthyā saṃyutā kāryā pañcamī parayā na tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:1212: deve karmaṇi pitrye ca śuklapakṣe tathāsite //
GSD36mvir_sau:1215: yathā pitrye aparāhṇādyanurodhena ṣaṣṭhīyuktapañcamīṃ parityajya caturthīsaṃyutā pañcamī upādīyate tathā daive 'pīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1216: naca daive pūrvāhṇasya karmakālatvāt karmakālaśāstrasya ca prabalatvāt parayuktaiva pañcamī upādeyeti śaṅkanīyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1217: pūrvodāhṛtatattadviśeṣavacanānāṃ prabalataratvāt etādṛśa eva ca viṣaye”yāṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:1220: ata evopavāsa eva pañcamī pūrvayutānyatra daive
GSD36mvir_sau:1222: daive kammeṇīti daivamātre pṛrvayutatvapratīteḥ parayuktapañcamīvacanānāṃ skandopavāsavacanena viṣayadānācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:1226: caturthīsaṃyutā yā ca sā tṛtīyā phalapradā //
GSD36mvir_sau:1227: pañcamī ca prakartavyā ṣaṣṭhyā yuktā ca nārada! //
GSD36mvir_sau:1229: tataśca yugmaśāstrayorvirodhe vyavasthāpakavacanāntarasyāpokṣitatvāt yuktā śuklakṛṣṇa śāstreṇa byavastheti /
GSD36mvir_sau:1231: prayuktā śuklakṛṣṇaśāstreṇa vyavasthā tāṃ nirākartumeva hārītavacane
GSD36mvir_sau:1233: tena viruddhamāpastambādiyugmaśāstraṃ skandopavāsaviṣayaṃ yuktamiti tasmāt pūrvoktaiva vyavasthā jyāyasī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1236: sā ca skandavratātirikte sarvatra daivakārye saptamīyuktā grāhya ṣaṇmunyoritiyugmavākyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:1242: daive karmaṇi tāmantyāṃ pitrye pūrveṇa saṃyutām //
GSD36mvir_sau:1243: iti sumantunā pañcamīviddhāniṣedhapuraḥsaraṃ daive karmaṇi antyaḥśabdoditāyāḥ saptamīviddhāyā vidhānācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:1244: nāgaviddhā tu yā ṣaṣṭhī śivaviddhātu saptamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1247: nāgaviddhā tu yā ṣaṣṭhī rudraviddho divākaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1248: kāmaviddho bhaved viṣṇurna grāhyāste tu vāsarāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1259: iti skandapurāṇavacanāt ṣaṇmuhūrtātmako na tu sāmānyatastrimuhūrtāmakaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:1266: idaṃ vacanaṃ yā dvādaśanāḍīmitapañcamyā viddhā ṣaṣṭhī sāmānyataḥ sarvadaivakāryeṣu niṣiddhā tasyā eva skandavrate pratiprasavārtham /
GSD36mvir_sau:1270: kiñca”nāgo dvādaśanāḍībhiḥ”iti vākyaṃ na sarvatra dvādaśanāḍīmitapañcamyā uttaratithidūṣakatvābhidhānaparaṃ tadabhidhāne gauravāt kintu yatra
GSD36mvir_sau:1272: skandavrate tu pūrvayutāyā eva grāhyatvābhidhānānna dūṣakatvamiti dvādaśanāḍīmitapañcamīviddhāyāmapi tatkāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1274: ekādaśī tṛtīyā ca ṣaṣṭhī caiva trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1277: pūrvedyuḥ ṣaṇmuhūrtapañcamīviddhāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāstrimuhūrtādhikakṣayāsambhavena uttaradine 'pi trimuhūrtāyā avaśyambhāvitvāt “yadi na syāt'; ityāsyānupapatteḥ, kintu ekabhaktādikāle madhyānhādau pare 'hani yadi na syāttadā yā skandavratātirikte savartra
GSD36mvir_sau:1291: sā ca sarvatra daive pūrvaviddhaiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1293: ṣaṣṭhī tu saptamī tāta! anyonyaṃ tu samāśritam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1296: pañcamī saptamī caiva daśamī ca trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:1302: iti upavāsa eva viddhāyā niṣedhāttatraiva pūrvaviddhāyā grāhyatvamastu /
GSD36mvir_sau:1308: ṣaṣṭhyā yuktā saptamī ca kartavyā tāta! sarvadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1309: ṣaṣṭhī ca saptamī yatra tatra sannihito raviḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:1316: yadā tu pūrvedyuḥ astamayottaraṃ pravṛttā paredyuśca tithikṣayavaśena trimuhūrtayā aṣṭamyā viddhatvāt śuddhā pūrvaviddhā vā na labhyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:1317: tadā”guṇe tvanyāyyakalpanā”itinyāyāt guṇānurodhena pradhānatyāgāyogāt niṣedhamatikramyāpi va canābhāve 'pi guṇakālatvena aṣṭamīviddhāyā evopādānaṃ nyāyyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1322: vaiśākhaśuklasaptamyāṃ gaṅgāpūjā tatra madhyānhavyāpinī grāhyā śiṣṭācārāt
GSD36mvir_sau:1325: sā ca vratamātre śuklā parā kṛṣṇā pūrvā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1329: pūrvaviddhā tu kartavyā paraviddhā na kutracit //
GSD36mvir_sau:1355: dūrvāṣṭamī tu sā jñeyā nottarā sā vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:1358: muhūrte rauhiṇe 'ṣṭamyāṃ pūrvā vā yadi vā parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1359: dūrvāṣṭamī tu sā kāryā jyeṣṭhāṃ mūlaṃ ca varjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:1360: iti parābhidhānaṃ tat pūrvadine jyeṣṭhādiyoge veditavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:1366: iyaṃ ca kanyārke agastyodaye ca na kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1368: siṃhārka eva kartavyā na kanyārke kadācana //
GSD36mvir_sau:1371: vaidhavyaṃ pūrvaśokaṃ ca daśavarṣāṇi pañca ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:1375: kanyārke yāṣṭamī śuklā jyeṣṭharkṣe mahatī smṛtā /
GSD36mvir_sau:1380: navamyā saha kāryā syādaṣṭamī nātra saṃśayaḥ /

GSD36mvir_sau:2618: pūjāsthānaṃ tato gatvā pradoṣe śivamarcayet // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2620: dinadvaye pradoṣavyāpitve tadekadeśasparśe vā uttarā grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2633: yadyāpi cātra sāmānyanirṇayādaparāhṇavyāpinī pūrvaviddhā prāpyate tathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:2636: iti saṃvartavacanāt sāyānhavyāpinyā api pūrvaviddhāyā grahaṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2637: anyathā hi sāmānyanirṇayādeva prāpteretasya vacanasya nirarthakatvāpatteḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:2645: śuklā caturdaśī grāhyā paraviddhā sadā vrate / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2649: etāḥ parayutāḥ kāryāḥ parāḥ pūrveṇa saṃyutāḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2652: sadā kāryā trayodaśyā na tu yuktā caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2653: paurṇamāsīyutā sā syāccaturdaśyā ca pūrṇimā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2657: pūrvaviddhā na kartavyā kartavyā parasaṃyutā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2660: ekādaśī daśamyā tu saptamyā cāṣṭamī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2661: pañcamyā ca yadā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśyā caturdaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:2662: āsu kriyā na kurvīta pūrvaviddhāsu mānavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2664: caturdaśī kāmaviddhā miśrāstā malināḥ smṛtāḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2671: madhoḥ śrāvaṇamāsasya śuklā yā tu caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2672: sā rātrivyāpinī grāhyā parā pūrvāhnagāminī // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2675: niśi bhramanti bhūtāni śaktayaḥ śūlabhṛt! yataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2687: dadarśa śīlā sā strīṇāṃ samūhaṃ raktavāsasām //
GSD36mvir_sau:2693: hyaudayikī grāhyā”iti pratyakṣavacanavirodhāt audayikī grāhyā na madhyāhnagateti saṅkṣepaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:2698: pūrvaviddhā tu kartavyā paraviddhā na karhicit // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2702: amāvāsyā tṛtīyā ca kartavyā parasaṃyutāḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2708: amāvāsyā tṛtīyā ca tā upoṣyāḥ parānvitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2711: śivavrate tu pakṣadvayagate caturdaśyau trayodaśīyute aparāhṇavyāpinyau grāhye /
GSD36mvir_sau:2714: caturdaśī tu kartavyā trayodaśyā yutā vibho! /
GSD36mvir_sau:2716: darśaviddhā na karktavyā rākāviddhā kadācana / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2723: pūrvaviddhā tu kartavyā paraviddhā na karhicit //
GSD36mvir_sau:2727: taditaravrateṣu”ubhe pakṣe caturdaśī”iti prāgudāhṛtapadmapurāṇāt tādṛśavṛddhavaśiṣṭhavacanācca uttaraviddhā grāhyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2734: varṣe barṣe tu kartavyaṃ mama santuṣṭikāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:2735: dinadvaye tadvyāptau aṃśataḥ samavyāptau vā paraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:2738: paradine gauṇavyāpteḥ sattvāt pūrvadine ca tadabhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:2744: tat saṅkalparūpavratopakramaviṣayaṃ na tu pradhānasya madhyāhnakālatvajñāpakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2759: matsyo 'bhūddhutabhugdine madhusite kūrmo vidhau mādhave vārāho girijāsute nabhasi yadbhūte site mādhave //
GSD36mvir_sau:2760: siṃho bhādrapade site haritithau śrīvāmano mādhave rāmo gauritithāvataḥ paramabhūdrāmo navamyāṃ madhoḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:2761: kṛṣṇo 'ṣṭamyāṃ nabhasi sitapare cāśvine yaddaśamyāṃ buddhaḥ kalkī nabhasi samabhūcchuklaṣaṣṭhyāṃ krameṇa //
GSD36mvir_sau:2762: ahno madhye vāmano rāmarāmau matsyaḥ kroḍaścāparāhṇe vibhāge /
GSD36mvir_sau:2763: kūrmaḥ siṃho bauddhakalkī ca sāyaṃ kṛṣṇo rātrau kālasāmye ca pūrve // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2766: jyeṣṭhaśuklacaturdaśyāṃ sarvasmin dine pañcāgnisādhanaṃ kṛtvā pradoṣe hemadhenurdeyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2775: atra dinodaya iti śravaṇāt prātaḥkālavyāptitvamiti gauḍāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2782: asyāmeva ca rātrau dīpadānaṃ kāryam tataḥ pradoṣasamaye dīpān dadyān manoharān /
GSD36mvir_sau:2794: varṣe ca hemalambākhye māse śrīmati kārttike /
GSD36mvir_sau:2804: rājā ca tatra sampūjyo yamaḥ pralayabhāskaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2811: atra ca rātriśabdastithilakṣakaḥ sivaśabdaśca śivavratalakṣakaḥ prakaraṇāt
GSD36mvir_sau:2829: ajānannapi niṣpāpo niṣādo gaṇatāṃ gataḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2843: prabhāte vimale jāte dṛṣṭvā tatraiva śaṅkaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:2856: jāgaraṃ kurute tatra sa rudrasamatāṃ vrajet //
GSD36mvir_sau:2858: tadetat śivarātrivrataṃ janmāṣṭamīvat saṃyogamapṛthaktvanyāyena nityaṃ kāmyaṃ ca tatra nityatvaṃ tāvat skandapūrāṇe--
GSD36mvir_sau:2863: varṣe varṣe mahādevi! naro nārī pativratā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2866: arṇavo yadi vā śuṣyet kṣīyeta himavānapi /
GSD36mvir_sau:2872: śivaṃ ca pūjayitvā yo jāgartti ca caturdaśīm /
GSD36mvir_sau:2878: sarvān bhuktvā tato bhogān mṛto bhūpo 'bhijāyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:2882: sarvān kāmānavāpnoti pretya ceha ca mānavaḥ / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2889: mādhamāse tu yā kṛṣṇā phālgunādau caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:2894: anyathā yo dadātīha sa dātā narakaṃ vrajet // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2900: ata evātra vedho 'pi na divāvedha eva kintu janmāṣṭamīvadrātrivedho 'pi
GSD36mvir_sau:2904: atastasyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ satyāṃ tatpūjanaṃ bhavet // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2906: bhūtāni śaktayo yoginyo 'pi śūlabhṛcchaṅkaraśca yato rātrau bhramanti ataḥ satyāṃ tasyāṃ pūjanaṃ bhavediti hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2907: yadā dinadvaye niśīthavyāpinī tadā pūrvaiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2916: śrāvaṇī durganavamī tathā dūrvāṣṭamī tu yā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2920: anaṅgena samāyuktā kartavyā sā sadā tithiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2924: tadrātriḥ śivarātriḥ syāt sā bhaveduttamottamā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2928: bhūtaviddhā ca yā tatra śivarātrivrataṃ caret // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2934: atra rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ yasmāditi hetuvaśāt pradoṣaśabdo rātriparo
GSD36mvir_sau:2945: yadā tu niśīthādūrdhvagā trayodaśī pera'hani ca niśīthāvyāpinyapi caturdaśī bhavati tadā paraiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2947: māghāsite bhūtadinaṃ hi rājannupaiti yogaṃ yadi pañcadaśyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:2948: jayāprayuktāṃ na tu jātu kuryācchivasya rātriṃ priyakṛcchivasya // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2950: jayāprayuktāṃ jayayā trayodaśyā prakarṣeṇa niśīthādūrdhvaṃ yuktāṃ na kuryāt nopavaset kintu sakaladinabhūyorātrilābhāt parāmevetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:2951: tathāca yat śivarātrivrate bhūtāṃ kāmaviddhāṃ vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:2957: pūrvasyā eva niśīthavyāptau uttarāyā eva vā niśīthavyāptau tatkālavyāpinī grāhyetyuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:2966: vyāptā sā dṛśyate yasyāṃ tasyāṃ kuryāt vrataṃ naraḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2974: iti kāmyaṃ pratimāsaṃ śivarātrivrataṃ tatrāpi pūjopavāsajāgaraṇavidhānāt tasya ca sakalarātrisādhyatvāt bahurātrivyāpinyāmanuṣṭhānam /
GSD36mvir_sau:2979: asyāśca mahāśiva rātreḥ ravibhaumavārānyatarayoge praśastataratvaṃ śivayogayoge praśastatamatvaṃ ca skandapurāṇe--
GSD36mvir_sau:2986: ante caiva śinīvālī trispṛśyāṃ śivamarcayet // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:2992: itivacanāt paradine yadi divā tithyantastadā tatraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:2998: sikthe sikthe phalaṃ tasya vastuṃ śakto na pārvati! //
GSD36mvir_sau:2999: brahmāṇḍodaramadhye tu yāni tīrthāni santi vai /
GSD36mvir_sau:3003: divaiva pāraṇaṃ kuryāt pāraṇānnaiva doṣabhāk // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3013: bhūtaviddhā na kartavyā darśaḥ pūrṇā kadācana /
GSD36mvir_sau:3016: evaṃ yat”caturdaśyā ca pūrṇimā”itiyugmavākyaṃ tat sāvitrīvrataviṣayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3018: atra ca na pūrvaviddhāniṣedhastasyāstrimuhūrtasattve kiṃ tvaṣṭādaśanāḍīmitacaturdaśīsattve
GSD36mvir_sau:3021: mādhavastu idaṃ vacanaṃ yatra bhūtaviddhā kartavyā yathā sāvatrīvrate tatrāṣṭādaśanāḍīmitā na grāhyetyevaṃparamityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:3030: jyeṣṭhe māsi site pakṣe pūrṇimāyāṃ tayā vratam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3031: cīrṇaṃ purā mahābhaktyā kathitaṃ te mayā nṛpa! //
GSD36mvir_sau:3033: amāyāṃ ca tathā jyeṣṭhe vaṭamūle tathā satī /
GSD36mvir_sau:3038: meṣe vā vṛṣabhe vāpi sāvitrīṃ tāṃ vinirdiśet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3042: śrāvaṇīṃ paurṇamāsīṃ prakṛtyāmnāte rakṣābandhane tu aparāhṇavyāpinī grāhyā
GSD36mvir_sau:3048: anye tu aṅgatve pramāṇābāvāt tata ityasya cākhaṇḍaparvāṇi arthasiddhatvenāvidheyatvānna grahasaṅkrāntyādivarjanamityāhuḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:3050: bhadrāyāṃ dve na kartavye śrāvaṇī phālgunī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3053: śrāvaṇyāṃ śravaṇe jātaḥ pūrvaṃ hayaśirā hariḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3073: athāto 'dhyāyopākarma oṣadhīnāṃ prādurbhāve śravaṇena śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ śrāvaṇasya pañcamīṃ hastena veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3078: kecittu hastenetyato nakṣatrarūpakālajñāne 'pi titherākāṅkṣitatvāttatra yāvadanirṇītaṃ kiñciddinamityupasthitaṃ bhavati tāvatsannidhānāt pañcamyevopasthitānveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3080: oṣadhirbhāve iti śrāvaṇasya tviti ca sarvatra sambadhyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3095: āśvalāyanastu--athāto 'dhyāyopākaraṇamauṣadhīnāṃ prādurbāve śrāvaṇasya pañcamyāṃ hastena vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3098: anena varṣāsambandhinoḥ śrāvaṇabhādrapadayormadhye śrāvaṇasya pūrvaṃ vihitatvāt saṃjñākaraṇasiddhaṃ bhādrapade 'nuṣṭhānaṃ stavayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:3100: māsanakṣatratithīnabhidhāya māsāntarābhidhāne pūrvoktamāsasyaiva bādho yujyate avāntarasājātye na tasya śīghropasthitikatvāt na nakṣatrādīnām /
GSD36mvir_sau:3102: ete ca kālāḥ svasvagṛhnānusārā vyava sthitāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3103: yeṣāṃ ca śākhāyāmaneke kālā uktāsteṣāmākāṅkṣāvaśāt pā ukrameṇopādānam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3105: tathā ca bahavṛcaiḥ śrāvaṇamāse śravaṇayukte kasmiṃściddine /
GSD36mvir_sau:3106: (*) tatra ca saṅkrāntigrahaṇasū takādau hastayuktapañcamyāṃ tadasambhave
GSD36mvir_sau:3107: kevalapañcamyāṃ kevalahaste vā tadasambhave auṣadhiprādurbhāvābhāve ca īdṛśanakṣatrādiyukte bhādrapade 'pi kartavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3110: avṛṣṭayauṣadhayastasmin māse tu na bhavanti cet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3111: tadā bhādrapade māsi śravaṇena tadiṣyate // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3121: saṅkrāntau grahaṇe āśauce ca doṣo madanaratnādibahnunibandhodāhṛta
GSD36mvir_sau:3123: saṅkrāntau grahaṇe caiva sūtake mṛtake tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3124: gaṇaśrāddhaṃ na kurvīta nāradasya vaco yathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:3132: yadyardharātrādarvāk cet grahaḥ saṅkrama eva ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:3133: nopākarma tadā kuryāt āvaṇyāṃ śravaṇe 'pi vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:3144: upākarmaṇi cotsarge grahabhedo na vidyate // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3146: evaṃ ca grahaṇapūrvottaradine śravaṇasattve tatroyākarma na tyājyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3147: yadā ca grahaṇasaṅkrāntiduṣṭaṃ parva tadā kālaniyama uktaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:3155: vājasaneyibhirityanena yeṣāṃ pañcamī gṛhya uktā ta upalakṣyante /
GSD36mvir_sau:3158: anyathā vājasaneyibhiḥ pañcamyāmeveti cetyubhayavidhāne vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3159: na ca”saṅkrāntirgrahaṇaṃ vāpi yadi parvaṇi jāyate”ityasyānenopasaṃhāro
GSD36mvir_sau:3160: yukto natu lakṣaṇā lakṣaṇāta upasaṃhārasya nyāyyatvāt, anyathā”puroḍāśaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:3162: prakṛte hi upasaṃhāre śuddhapañcamyā api vidheyatvena vākyabhedāpattyā lakṣaṇaiva yuktā tasmādyeṣāṃ gṛhye papañcamī noktā taiḥ pūrvodāhṛtamanuvākyāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:3166: baudhāyanaistu āṣāḍhyāmevā teṣāṃ kevalāyā evāṣāḍhyā uktatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3170: siṃhe ravau tu puṣyarkṣe pūrvāhṇe vicaredbahiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3189: āhṛtya tāḥ śrutīstasmai dadau lokaguruḥ svayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:3199: hastaśravaṇe api sakhaṇḍe audayike eva grāhye /
GSD36mvir_sau:3205: na ca śrāvaṇamiti naitasya karmaṇo nāmadheyaṃ kintu śravaṇākarmaṇa iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3222: kathamanyathātulyakakṣatayā bahvṛcānāmupādānaṃ kriyeta tulyakakṣāṇāmeva hi samabhivyāhāro yujyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3223: na hi sambhavati brāhmaṇairidaṃ kartavyaṃ kṣatriyairidaṃ kaṭhairidamiti yujyate ca vaiśyairidaṃ karttabyamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3224: evaṃ ca bahvṛcaiḥ śravaṇa iti samabhivyāhāro yujyate yājuṣaiḥ parvaṇīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3225: kiṃ ca bahvṛcagṛhyapariśiṣṭakāro bahvṛcānāmeva karmasambandhidharmavidhānārthaṃ pravṛtto na tu taittirīyāṇām /
GSD36mvir_sau:3226: evaṃ ca yat tatra taittirīyasambandhitatkālādikaṃ śrūyate tadaṃśe 'nuvāda
GSD36mvir_sau:3236: tadapi na taittirīyātiriktānāṃ pūrvaviddhāvidhāyakaṃ kintu upākarmātiriktaviṣayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3238: api cātra parvagataviśeṣasyaivaudayikasya vidhānaṃ yuktam apekṣitatvāt samabhivyāhārācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:3239: na ca yadaudayike parvaṇyupākuryuḥ taittarīyakā eveti vacanavyaktirastviti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3241: na ca yadaudayike taittirīyakā ityeva vacanavyaktiḥ parvaudayikatvaṃ ca sannidhilabhyamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3243: tathā sati sannidhita eva śravaṇopasthityā tatrāpyaudayikatvalābhe uttarārddhaṃ nirarthakaṃ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3245: ekahāyanītvapiṅgākṣitvayordvayorapi yaugikatvena dravyavacanayorviśiṣṭadravyavidhivadatrāpi yaugikābhyāmanyataḥ prasiddhārthābhyāṃ padābhyāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ parvaiva vidhīyate iti na kiñcidanupapannam anye tu taittirīyakarttṛkaparvaudayikatvaviśiṣṭopākarmavidhimevacchanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3248: gṛhyoktasya ca punarvidhiḥ karttṛbhedāt, anyathā ekaviṣayānekasmṛtyucchedāpatteriti vadanti
GSD36mvir_sau:3250: smṛtayo hi svātantryeṇaiva pravṛttāḥ yuktaṃ yat prati smṛtividhiriti,
GSD36mvir_sau:3251: pariśiṣṭaṃ punaḥ śeṣapūraṇarūpaṃ śeṣiṇamupajīvyaiva pravṛttamiti na tatra tadananuvādena vidhāyakatvamiti
GSD36mvir_sau:3265: etaccopākarma malamāse na kāryam tathā ca--
GSD36mvir_sau:3272: iti vākye sauramānavihitatvarūpahetūpanyāsapūrvakamanutkarṣavidhānācchandogānāṃ sauramānena vihitatvāt tadviṣayamidamṛṣyaśṛṅgavacanami ti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3285: upākarma na kartavyaṃ kartavyaṃ siṃhayuktake // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3290: ityanena nigamavacanena karkaṭasthe vidhānāt kathaṃ niṣedha iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3293: kintu siṃhavidhiviśeṣa eva”na girāgiretibrūyāt”iti vat (*) (a. 9 pā. 1
GSD36mvir_sau:3296: tatra yajñāyajñīyamityanena”yajñāyajñā vo girāgirā ca dakṣase”iti
GSD36mvir_sau:3299: tatra yonigānamaghīyānaiḥ sāmagairgakāreṇa sahitaṃ “gāyīrā girā iti gīyate
GSD36mvir_sau:3300: “airaṃ kṛtvodgeyam'; iti brāhmaṇavākyena tu girāśabde gakāralopapūrvakamirāśabdena gānaṃ vidhīyate
GSD36mvir_sau:3301: tathā ca yonigānabrāhmaṇagānayosaktulyabalatvena viṣeṣābhāvādvikalpena prayoge prāpte”nagirā gireti brūyāt, yadgirāgireti brūyādātmānameva tadudghātā giret”iti gakārarahitagāne bādhamuktvā gakārarahitamirāpadaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:3304: siṃhe karkaṭe ca vikalyenopākarmaṇaḥ prāptau “narmadottara'; iti vacanena deśabhedādvayavasthāpyata ityāśayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3305: evaṃ ca siṃhakarkaṭayorubhayorapi prāptatvādavyavasthāyāṃ deśabhedena vyavasthāmāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:3311: sarvatropākaraṇe prāpte dakṣiṇadeśe 'pi upākaraṇaṃ prāptam evaṃ sati tatrānena vākyena yaddakṣiṇe upākuryāt tat karkaṭe yaduttare tta siṃhe /
GSD36mvir_sau:3313: siṃhe ravau tu puṣyarkṣe pūrvāhṇe vicaredvahiḥ (*) /
GSD36mvir_sau:3318: ityatra siṃhe ravāvityetasyobhayatra sambandhena yat sāmagānāṃ siṃhārkavidhānaṃ taddeśabhedaprāpakakarkasiṃhavyavasthānivṛttiphalakatayā nityavat prāptyarthamiti na kiñcidanupapannam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3331: samāvṛtto brahmacārikalpena yathānyāyamitare jāyopeyītyeke prājāpatyaṃ taditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:3332: brahmacārikalpenauyena niyamaviśeṣeṇa brahmacāryadhīyīta tenaiva yuktaḥ samāvṛtto 'pyadhīyīta
GSD36mvir_sau:3334: tathā jāyopeyī = gṛhastho 'pi brahmacārikalpoktaniyamena natu bhikṣādidharmeṇetyarthaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:3355: ata ūrdhvaṃ tu chandāṃsi śukleṣu niyataḥ paṭhet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3359: yadā śrāvaṇyāmupākarma tadā puṣyamāsasya śuklapratipadi pūrvāhṇe, yadā prauṣṭhapadyāṃ tadā māgha iti vyavasthito vikalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3363: arddhapañcamān iti ardhaḥ pañcamo yeṣu te sārddhāṃścatura iti yāvat /
GSD36mvir_sau:3375: baudhāyanaḥ- śrāvaṇyāmāṣāḍhayāṃ vopākṛtya taiṣyāṃ mādhyāṃ votsṛjet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3388: gārgyaḥ siṃhe ravau tu puṣyarkṣe pūrvāṅṇe vicaredvahiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3391: yadā tu siṃhasthe sūrye hasta eva prathamastataḥ puṣyastadā karkaṭasthe puṣye utsarjanaṃ kāryamityuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:3393: māse prauṣṭhapade hastāt puṣyaḥ pūrvo bhavedyadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3394: tadā tu śrāvaṇe kuryādutsargaṃ chandasāṃ dvijaḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3396: prauṣṭhapade yo hastastasmāt pūrvaḥ puṣyo yadi śrāvaṇagato bhavet tadā śrāvaṇa evotsargaṃ kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3404: etacca daivatvātpūrvodāhṛtavacanebhyaśca sarvaiḥ pūrvāhṇa eva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3414: darśāntāśvināmāvāsyā tu abhyaṅge prātaḥ kālavyāpinī grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3415: iṣe bhūte ca darśe ca kārttikaprathame dine /
GSD36mvir_sau:3421: dīpān dattvā pradoṣe tu lakṣmīṃ pūjya yathāvidhi /
GSD36mvir_sau:3440: iyaṃ ca bhadrāyāṃ na kartavyā”bhadrāyāṃ dve na kartavye”itipūrvodāhṛtavacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3444: tatra dinadvaye pradoṣasattve parā pūrvasya bhadrāyuktatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3445: yadā tu pūrvasyāmeva pradoṣavyāptirbhadrāyogaśca bhavati, sūryodayāt pūrvaṃ ca yadi holākādīpanāya kiyānapi bhadrārahitaḥ kālo 'vaśiṣyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3454: yadā tu pūrvatra bhadrārihataḥ kālo na labhyate paratopi ca na pradoṣavyāptiḥ tadā pūrvatraiva bhadrāpucche kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3455: pṛthivyāṃ yāni kāryāṇi śubhāni tvaśubhāni ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:3456: tāni sarvāṇi sidhyanti viṣṭipucche na saṃśayaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3458: idaṃ ca yadottaratra sārddhayāmātrayāt pūrvameva paurṇa māsīsamāptistadā jñeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3459: yadā tu tanmitā tato 'dhikā vā paurṇamāsī pratipacca dvitīyadine vṛddhigāminī tadā pratipatpradoṣe 'pi sā kāryā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3461: pratipad varddhamānā tu tadā sā holikā smṛtā //
GSD36mvir_sau:3466: ityādīni pūrvaviddhāvidhāyakāni tāni pūrvadine bhadrābhāve jñeyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:3467: yadā tu pūrvadine bhadrā dvitīyadine candragrahaṇaṃ tadā pūrvatraiva bhadrāpucche holākā kāryeti divodāsaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3474: yadyapi”paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajetāmāvāsyāyāmamāvāsyayā yajeta”itivākyābhyāṃ sāṅgau darśapūrṇamāsau parvaṇi vihitau iti pratīyate
GSD36mvir_sau:3476: pakṣāntā upavastavyā”itivākyāntaraikavākyatayā parvaṇyupakramamātraṃ tābhyāṃ vidhīyate samāptistu pratipadyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:3481: athavā paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdayoḥ sandhivācitvasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt tasya cātisūkṣmatvenopakramasyāpi tatra kartumaśakyatvādatra lakṣaṇayā paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdābhyāṃ parvapratipadrūpaṃ sandhipārsvadvayavartti tithidvayaṃ kṛtsnaprayogārthatvena vidhīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3482: evaṃ ca”sandhau yajeta”ityatrāpi sandhiśabdena tādṛśatithidbayameva lakṣyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3487: sāmīpyaṃ viṣayaṃ prāhuḥ pūrveṇānhā pareṇa vā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3490: tatrāpi na sampūrṇaṃ parvānvādhānakālaḥ kintu ādyaṃ bhāgatrayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3498: antyau = parvapratipadorantyau bhāgauḥ yāge pratipado 'ntyo bhāgo varjyaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:3499: vratakarmaṇi anvādhāne parvaṇo 'ntyo bhāgo varjya ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3503: “yadaharupavasatho bhavati tadahaḥ pūrvāhṇa eva prātarāhutiṃ hutvā”iti
GSD36mvir_sau:3512: prātaḥkāla iti prokto bhāgaścānhaḥ sa pañcamaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3518: evaṃ yāgānvādhānakāle nirūpite yadā tāvat parvapratipadoḥ sampūrṇatvaṃ tadā na kaścit sandehaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:3519: yadā tu tayoḥ khaṇḍatvaṃ tadā prakāracatuṣṭayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3520: āvartanāt prāk āvartane vā tadūrddhvaṃ vā rātrau vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3522: pūrvāhṇe vātha madhyāhne yadi parva samāpyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3534: itilaugakṣivākyāt sandhidine 'nvādhāya prātaryāga iti aviśeṣeṇa pratīyate tathāpi aparāhṇasandhau tāvatparedyuścandradarśanābhāve sandhidine 'nvādhānaṃ prātaryāgaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3538: atra caturdaśyāmanvādhānaṃ caturdaśīdine kiñcidamāvāsyāpraveśa eva bodhyam
GSD36mvir_sau:3544: caturdaśyāṃ cutaryāme amā yatra na dṛśyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3545: śvobhūte pratipad yatra bhūte kavyādikī kriyā //
GSD36mvir_sau:3546: iti baudhāyanavākye amā sampūrṇā na dṛśyate kintu svalpā dṛśyata iti vyākhyātamiti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:3555: candradarśanābhāve sati aparāhṇasandhāvanvādhānaṃ cet kimu vaktavyaṃ rātrisandhāviti kaimutikanyāyenaiva prāpte rātrisandhiśāstrānarthakyāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3561: titheḥ parasyā ghaṭikāstu yāḥ syurnyūnāstathaivābhyadhikāśca tāsām /
GSD36mvir_sau:3562: arddhaṃ viyojyaṃ ca tathā prayojyaṃ hāse ca vṛddhau prathame dine tat // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3565: vṛddhiḥ pratipado yāsti tadarddhaṃ parvaṇi kṣipet /
GSD36mvir_sau:3566: kṣayasyārddhaṃ tatā kṣiṣtvā sandhirnirṇīyatāṃ sadā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3569: nanu evaṃ yadā pūrvedyuraparāhṇasandhiḥ paredyuśca pratipadaścaturtha eva bhāgo 'vaśiṣyate tadā kathaṃ sandhiśāstrānnirṇayaḥ paredyuryāgakālābhāvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:3575: amāvāsyāyāṃ tu candradarśane yāgasya niṣedhādaparāhṇasandhau yāga evetyuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3576: hemādristu “sandhiryatrāparāhṇe syāt”ityetannārṣavacanaṃ kintu maṇḍanakārikeyamiti kṛtvā paurṇamāsyāmapi aparāhṇasandhau yadi
GSD36mvir_sau:3577: paredyuryāgakālo 'sti tadaiva tatra yāgastadabhāve tu pūrvedyurevetyuktavān /
GSD36mvir_sau:3584: na caivaṃ caturdaśyāmapi candradarśanasambhavāttatra ca”yadaivainaṃ na purastāt paśyat, tarhyevopavaset”iti gobhilenānvādhānasya paryudastatbāt kathaṃ tatra tadanuṣṭhānamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3585: “aṅgaguṇavirodhe ca tādarthyāt” (a. 12 pā. 2 adhi. 9) iti nyāyenaitādṛśe viṣaye tatrāpyaṅgabhūtānvādhānānuṣṭhānaucityāt
GSD36mvir_sau:3588: yadaharna dṛśyate tadaharamāvāsyāṃ śvo na draṣṭāra iti veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3590: eṣā vai sumanānāmeṣṭiryamabhiyajānaṃ paścāccandmābhyudetyasminnevāsmai loke 'rdhukaṃ bhavati iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3593: iti candrodaye yāgavidhānasya prāśastyāvagamāt kathaṃ tatra yāganiṣedha iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3594: atrābhyudayamātraśravaṇāttasya ca pratipadyapi sambhavānnaitasya candradarśanadine yāgakartavyatāparatvamiti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:3600: vastutastu rātrisandhau candradarśanadine 'pi yāgānuṣṭhānasya pūrvaṃ sādhitatvāttadviṣayāṇīti yuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3602: tadanyeṣāṃ tu baudhāyanakātyāyanādīnāṃ candradarśane yāgo na bhavatye vetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3603: smṛtyarthasāre tu sandhiśāstreṇaiva sarvadā nirṇayastenāparāhṇasandhāvapi sarvadānvādhānameva
GSD36mvir_sau:3604: yāni tu candradarśanadine yāganiṣedhavacanāni tāni tasyaivopolabdakāni na tu nirṇāyakānītyuktam
GSD36mvir_sau:3605: nanvevaṃ yāgakālanirṇaye kriyamāṇe tithivṛddhyā kadācit pakṣavṛddhau pūrvayajanīyadinātsaptadaśe 'hanyapi yāgaḥ prasajyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3615: atrāpavasathasya sthānāni caturdaśī pañcadaśī ṣoḍaśī na tu trayodaśī saptadaśīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3617: bhavet saptadaśaṃ vāpi tatprayatnena varjayet // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3627: āvartanāt prāk yadi parvasandhiḥ sadyastadā vā kriyate samastaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3634: madhyandināt syādahanīha yasmin prāk parvaṇaḥ sandhiriyaṃ tṛtīyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3638: atreyamiti paurṇamāsyevocyate na tvamāvāsyā asyā evāparāhṇarātrisandhibhyāṃ pūrvaṃ dvaividhyābidhānāt
GSD36mvir_sau:3642: idamapi dvyahakālatve pratipattṛtīyāṃśalābha eva na caturthāṃśalābhe
GSD36mvir_sau:3644: atra ca yadā parvasandhau iṣṭistadā antimaḥ padārthaḥ pratipadyeva anuṣṭheyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3651: yadaṣṭyi paśunā somena vā yajeta so 'māvāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā yajeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:3653: tathā darśavikṛtau paurṇamāsyapi pūrṇamāsavikṛtāvamāvāsyāpi ityavyavasthā ca vidhīyata iti vyutpāditaṃ pañcamopāntye /
GSD36mvir_sau:3656: kṛttikāḥ prathamaṃ viśākhe uttamaṃ tāni devanakṣatrāṇi teṣu kurvīta yatkārī syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3660: etacca na darśapūrṇamāsau prati pravartate prākaraṇikena niravakāśena paurṇamāsyādikālenānārabhyādhītasya sāvakāśasya nakṣatrasya pāñcadaśyena sāptadaśyasya dīkṣaṇīyāsvareṇopāṃśutvasyeva bādhitvāt tatra parvaṇi viśeṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3662: yaḥ paramo viprakarṣaḥ sūryācandramasauḥ sā paurṇamāsī yaḥ paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ sāmāvāsyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3663: iti gobilavacanāt paramasannikarṣaviprakarṣakṣaṇavācitvāgateḥ, tatra ca sāṅgaprayogānuṣṭhānāsambhavād”yadīṣṭyā”iti vākyena paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāpadalakṣitayoḥ sandhimadahorātrayorvikṛtervidhānādāvartane tataḥ prāgvā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3664: parvasandhau ca prakṛterapi tatraiva vidhānādyugapatprakṛtivikṛtyoḥ prasaktau prakṛteḥ pūrvedyuḥ prārabdhatvādantarā karmāntarānuṣṭhānāsambhavāt prakṛtau ca prātaḥkālasyaupadeśikatvāt prakṛtiṃ kṛtvā vikṛtiḥ kartavyeti yājñikā āhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3666: āvartanātprāk yadi parvasandhiḥ kṛtvā tu tasmin prakṛtiṃ vikṛtyāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3670: na cāvartanāt parataḥ sandhau vikṛteḥ prāthamye prakṛteraupadeśikānvādhānakālabādhaḥ syāditi vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3674: evaṃ sutyā yadyapyapūrvā tathāpi tadahareva kartavyā yadīṣṭyaṃtivacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3676: yasmin kāle 'māvāsyā sampadyeta tayeṣṭvāthaitayā yajeta yadi paurṇa māsī
GSD36mvir_sau:3683: somasya vai rājño 'rdhamāsasya rātrayaḥ patnaya āsan tāsāmamāvāsyāṃ paurṇamāsīṃ ca nopait
GSD36mvir_sau:3684: itiśrutau tacchabdanirdiṣṭarātryoḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdaprayogā dāgopālāṅganaṃ tathāprasiddheśca tithivācakatvāvagateḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3697: yadā prācyāṃ gacchaṃścandraḥ pratyagavasthitasūryaprayuktabhūcchāyāṃ praviśati tadā candroparāga ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3699: bhūcchāyāṃ svagrahaṇe bhāskaramarkagrahe ca praviśatīnduḥ / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3717: asnāyī mṛtyumāpnoti snāyī pāpaṃ na vindati //
GSD36mvir_sau:3719: prahaṇe saṅkrame caiva na snāyādyadi mānavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3720: saptajanmāni kuṣṭhī syāt duḥkhabhāgī ca jāyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:3727: atra yathāvidhītigrahaṇāt yat smṛtiratnāvalyāmuktametadamantrakaṃ snānamiti tat parāstam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3729: tisro nadyo mahāpuṇyā veṇī godā ca jāhnavī /
GSD36mvir_sau:3730: (*)gāṃ harīśāṅgataḥ prāptā gaṅgā iti hi kīrttitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:3731: (*) kālamādhave tu gāṃ harīśāṅghikāt iti pāṭhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3735: hareḥ padādīśvarasya śiraso gāṃ bhūmiṃ prāptā gaṅgā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3736: yadyapi jāhnavyeva tādṛsī, na tu veṇīgode /
GSD36mvir_sau:3750: ādityakiraṇaiḥ pūtaṃ punaḥ pūtaṃ ca vahninā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3761: sarvaṃ gaṅgāsamaṃ toyaṃ sarve brahmasamā dvijāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3762: sarvaṃ bhūmisamaṃ dānaṃ grahaṇe candrasūryayoḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3764: atra jalamātrasya gaṅgāsamatvoktyā prāśastyābhidhānenāvihitasya stutyānarthakyādarthavādeva yena kenāpi jalena snāyāditi vidhirunneyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3768: tato 'pi sārasaṃ puṇyaṃ tataḥ puṇyaṃ nadījalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:3773: atra bhūmiṣṭhādeḥ puṇyātiśayatvastutirbhūmiṣṭhādyasambhava uddhṛtādividhyunnayanārthā na tu guṇaphalasambandhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3778: mārge tu grahaṇaṃ śastaṃ devikāyāṃ mahāmune! //
GSD36mvir_sau:3779: pauṣe tu narmadā puṇyā māghe sannihitā śubhā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3780: phālgune varuṇā puṇyā caitre puṇyā sarasvatī //
GSD36mvir_sau:3782: jyeṣṭhaṃ tu kauśikī puṇyā āṣāḍhe tāpikā nadī //
GSD36mvir_sau:3783: śrāvaṇe sindhunāmā tu tathā bhādre tu gaṇḍakī /
GSD36mvir_sau:3789: yadyapi pauṣe tu narmadā puṇyetyādau deśaprādhānyaṃ pratīyate
GSD36mvir_sau:3790: tathāpi”kārttike grahaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ”ityupakramānurodhāt sarvatra grahaṇasyaiva prādhānyamanusandheyam
GSD36mvir_sau:3793: sūrye ca rāhuṇā graste tamobhūte mahāmune! //
GSD36mvir_sau:3797: gaṅgā kanakhalaṃ puṇyaṃ prayāgaḥ puṣkaraṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3800: daśajanmakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ gaṅgāsāgarasaṅgame janmanāṃ tu sahasreṇa yatpāpaṃ samupārjitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3808: gāvo nāgāstilā dhānyaṃ ratnāni kanakaṃ mahīm /
GSD36mvir_sau:3811: atra kurukṣetre yat phalaṃ labhyate iti siddhavannirdeśānupapattyā kurukṣetre gavādi dadyāditi vidhirunneyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3824: bāndhavānāṃ ca maraṇe nārakī syāttato 'nyathā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3827: ayanādau sadā deyaṃ dravyamiṣṭaṃ gṛhe ca yat /
GSD36mvir_sau:3831: yathā snānaṃ ca dānaṃ ca sūryasya grahaṇe divā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3832: somasyāpi tathā rātrau snānaṃ dānaṃ vidhīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:3853: bhūmirgāṃvaḥ suvarṇaṃ vā dhānyaṃ vā yadyadīpsitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3858: mucyamāne bhaveddānaṃ muktau snānaṃ vidhīyate // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3864: snānaṃ vidhāya gaṅgādau prāṇāyāmaṃ ca tarpaṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3872: puṇyaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ madhye muktikāle tvanantakam // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3874: tata ādimadhyāvasāneṣu yadyad vihitaṃ tasya tasya phalādiśayārthamiti mādhavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:3877: manuṣyā madhyakāle tu mokṣakāle tu rākṣasāḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3883: rāhusparśe dvayoḥ snātvā dānādau kalpate naraḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3904: snāne naimittike prāpte nārī yadi rajasvalā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3910: annenāsambhave hemnā kuryādāmena vā sutaḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3914: tena candragrahaṇe 'pi sapiṇḍādivārṣikamannādinā taddina eva kāryamiti madanapārijāta eva vyākhyātam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3918: taddine copavāsaḥ syāt pratyabdaṃ tu pare 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:3921: pratyabdaṃ tu tadā kāryaṃ pare 'hanyeva sarvadā //
GSD36mvir_sau:3925: darśasaṅkrāntyādiśrāddhakāle uparāge tu upa rāgaśrāddhenaiva siddhiḥ prasaṅgāt kāmyena ca nityasya /
GSD36mvir_sau:3927: sūtake matake caiva na doṣo rāhudarśane /
GSD36mvir_sau:3932: asnāyī mṛtyumāpnoti snāyī pāpaṃ na vindati //
GSD36mvir_sau:3934: gobalīvardanyāyena vā jananamaraṇayorapi pṛthaṅnimittatvapratipādanaparatayā vā snānākaraṇe
GSD36mvir_sau:3936: etenāśauca uparāge snānameva kāryaṃ na dānaśrāddhādīti jīmūtavāhanamatamapāstam /
GSD36mvir_sau:3938: yāvattāvacchabdābhyāṃ sparśādimokṣāntavyāpiśuddhyabhi dhānaṃ snānamātrārthatve 'narthakaṃ syāt snānasya sparśakālīnatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:3946: sūtake mṛtake caiva na dauṣo rāhudarśane /
GSD36mvir_sau:3954: na hyuparāge nimitte mahādānādi vidhīyate kintu saṅkrāntyādāvivāṅnabhūta uparāgakāle /
GSD36mvir_sau:3959: aśrotriyaḥ śrotriyo vā pātraṃ vāpātrameva vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3960: viprabruvo 'pi vā vipro grahaṇe dānamarhati // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:3966: (*) na vidyayā kevalayā tapasā vāpi pātratā /
GSD36mvir_sau:3967: yatra vṛttamime cobhe taddhi pātraṃ prakīrtitam //
GSD36mvir_sau:3987: bhūmidānaṃ pātra eveti niyamaparaṃ vā vacanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4001: snehapakvaṃ ca tailaṃ ca na kadācit praduṣyati // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4006: āranālaṃ ca takraṃ ca hyādeyaṃ ghṛtapācitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4007: udakaṃ ca kuśacchannaṃ na duṣyedrāhudarśane // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4014: tena rāhudarśane vāritakrādi tilakuśayutaṃ kuryāditi vidhīyate na duṣyatīti doṣābhāvastu nityanuvādaḥ tilakuśāyoge doṣaḥ syāditikhyāpanāyetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4016: pretaśrāddhe yaducchiṣṭaṃ grahe paryuṣitaṃ ca yat /
GSD36mvir_sau:4026: na svapenna ca bhuñjīta snātvā bhuñjīta muktayoḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4029: mukte śaśini bhuñjīta yadi na syānmahāniśā / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4034: ubhayato dve dve militvā vā dve ekaikamubhayata ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4058: atra ca na bhojanaṃ vidhīyate kintu rāgataḥ prāpte bhojane kālo nithamyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:4069: sāyāhne grahaṇaṃ cet syādaparāhṇe na bhojanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4070: aparāhṇe na madhyāhne madhyāhne na tu saṅgave /
GSD36mvir_sau:4071: bhuñjīta saṅgave cet syānna pūrvaṃ bhojanakriyā / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4073: grahaṇaṃ cediti aparāhṇa ityādau, bhojanamiti na madhyāhna
GSD36mvir_sau:4075: sāyāhnādau grahaṇe 'śaktānāṃ krameṇāparāhṇādāveva bhojananiṣedhastato 'rvāṅ na doṣa ityarthaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4077: anenaiva nyāyena candroparāge 'pi bālādīnāṃ śeṣivirodho mābhūditi rātriṃ pañcadhā vibhajya pañcamabhāga uparāge caturthe na bhoktavyaṃ caturtha
GSD36mvir_sau:4081: (*) suveṇāvadyati, svadhitināvadyati, hastenāvadyati, ityādiṣvavadeyeṣu ājyapaśupuroḍāśeṣu haviḥṣu avadānahetavaḥ sruvādyā avyavasthitā
GSD36mvir_sau:4083: vidhāyakasya śaktiḥ sahakāriṇītyaṅgīkartavyaṃ tasmācchaktisahāyo vidhireva yathāsāmarthyaṃ vidheyaṃ vyavasthāpayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:4084: tataśca dravadravyasyājyasya sruvo yogyaḥ chedanīyamāṃsasya svadhitiḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4085: śasraviśeṣaḥ, saṃkṛtasya puroḍāśasya hasta iti vyavasyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4087: arthātusāmarthyāt vidheḥ kalpanā = vyavasthitārthatvakalpanā syāt ekadeśatvātusāmarthyakalpitaśabdasya vidhivākyaikadeśatvāditi sūtrārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4090: bhoktavyaṃ tatra pūrvāhṇe na madhyāhne kathañcana //
GSD36mvir_sau:4091: pūrvaṃ niśīthāhnrahaṇaṃ yadā candrasya ve bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:4092: tadā divā na kartavyaṃ bhojanaṃ śikhivāhana! // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4115: mukti dṛṣṭvā tu bhuñjīta snānaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4118: kintu candragrahe sā rātristaduttaraṃ dinamityahorātramiti draṣṭavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4129: uparāgakāle tadvedhe ca bhojane prāyaścittamuktaṃ mādhavīye--
GSD36mvir_sau:4132: tasminneva dine bhutrtkā trirātreṇa viśudhyati // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4140: evaṃ ca raverapi grastāste prātaḥkālīnaṃ snānādi kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4144: ahorātroṣitaḥ snānaṃ śrāddhaṃ dānaṃ tathā japam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4145: yaḥ karoti prasannātmā tasya syādakṣayaṃ ca tat // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4151: atropoṣita iti niṣṭhayopoṣyeti ca pūrvakālavihitapratyayācca pūrvedyurupavāsa iti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:4160: candrasūryagrahe caiva na kuryāt putravān gṛhī //
GSD36mvir_sau:4168: anyathā śuklaikādaśyādāvayanapāta ekādaśyupavāsa uparāge mahādānāṅgabhūtopavāse cāndrāyaṇādyupavāse 'pi paryudāsaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4170: “yo dīkṣito yadagnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabhate”ityatra pūrvapakṣe dīkṣāyā iva
GSD36mvir_sau:4173: ata eva puraścaraṇāṅgabhṛtamupavāsaṃ putravanto 'pi gṛhasthā ācaranto dṛśyante śiṣṭā avigonana
GSD36mvir_sau:4174: tammādahorātroṣitaḥ snātvetyādyaṅgabhūta upavāsaḥ putravadgṛ hasthasyāpi bhavatyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4187: anyathā tadānarthakyāt nimittottyaiva jñānamātralābhāt naimittike nimittaniścayavato 'dhikārāt
GSD36mvir_sau:4191: ata eva rātrau revardine candrasya grahaṇe na snānādiprāptiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4196: anyathā dṛśerjñānamātravācitve deśāntarīyoparāge snānādiprasaṅgo durvāraḥ svāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4201: tatra snānaṃ na kurvīta dadyāddānaṃ ca na kvacit //
GSD36mvir_sau:4204: atha darśanaśabdena cākṣuṣajñānaviṣyatvayogyatā vivakṣyate tathā ca na rātridinoparāge 'tiprasaṅgastathāpi grahaṇadeśīyacākṣuṣatvena deśāntarīyāṇāmadhikārāpattiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4206: na ca yasmin deśe yaścandrasūryoparāgaścākṣuṣajñānayogyaḥ sa tasmin deśe uditahome sūryodayavat karmanimittamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4208: atha samānakartṛkacākṣuṣajñānaviṣayatvayogyatā vivakṣyate tarhi tadviṣayataivāstu viśeṣaṇatvena pūrvopasthiteḥ kiṃ yogyatayā
GSD36mvir_sau:4210: tasmāccākṣuṣa evoparāge snānādi kāryaṃ nāndhādibhirabhracchane voparāgaiti prācyāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4212: “dṛṣṭvā snāyāt'; ityatra dhātusambandhādhikāravihitaktvāpratyayena darśanasnānayoḥ “yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhoti'; ityatra ṇamulā jīvanahomayoriva sākṣātsambandhaḥ pratīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:4215: haviṣārttirivoparāgeṇa darśanaṃ viśeṣyata itivācyam prativasantaṃ somayāgāvṛttivat”amedhyaṃ dṛṣṭvā japatyavaddhaṃ mana”ityamedhyadarśanāvṛttau japāvṛttivacca pratidarśanaṃ snānādyāvṛttiprasaṅgāt noparaktamādityamīkṣetetyanīkṣaṇavratapālayitṝṇāṃ bahvāyāsasnānādibhiyā buddhipūrvaṃ darśanamakurvatāṃ duṣṭagrahaṇamapaśyatāṃ cānadhikāraprasaṅgācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:4216: kiñca “nāśucī rāhutārakā'; iti aśucerdarśananiṣedhānna tasya nimittatā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4221: naca niṣedhasya rāgaprāptaviṣayatvenopapatterna vaidhe darśane pravṛttiriti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4223: nanu na brhanāṇḍapurāṇāduparāgasvarūpaṇaśucitvāpādakaṃ vaktuṃ śakyaṃ deśāntarīyoparāgeṇa deśāntarīyāṇāmāśaucāpatteḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4227: brahmāṇḍavacanaṃ tu samparkamātreṇāśucitvaṃ kimut taddarśanenetyevaṃparam ata eva mātracprayogāḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4228: tathā cāśucitvāsyāpi sānānāderiva darśananimittakatvāt prāk darśanādaśucitvābhāvānniṣedhāpravṛttyāsti darśanaprasaktiriti syādeva nimittateticet /
GSD36mvir_sau:4232: asnāyī mṛtyumāpyanoti snāyī pāpaṃ na vindati //
GSD36mvir_sau:4235: sūtake mṛtake caiva na doṣo rāhudarśane /
GSD36mvir_sau:4238: na hyetena darśanaṃ pratiprasūyate kintu tannimittaṃ snānādi /
GSD36mvir_sau:4241: evaṃ ca jananādyāśauce niṣedhapravṛttyā darśanāprasakterna doṣo rāhudarśane ityanuvādānupapattiranadhikāraśca pūrvokta eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4247: tatra samānadeśīyadarśanayogyatvādinā viśeṣaṇe tatra tatroparāgasvarūpsaya nimittatvāvagateḥ sarvatra dadevāstu kimardhajaratyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4248: kiñca kvaciduparāga sya kvaciddarśanasya nimittatā śrūyate tatrāvaśyambhāvinyanyatarasya nimittatve uparāgasya darśanādarśanayoranugatatvena nityasya”ya etena”itinyāyena (a. 5 pā. 3
GSD36mvir_sau:4249: adhi. 13 sū. 37)nimittatvaṃ yuktaṃ na tvanityasya darśanasya /
GSD36mvir_sau:4250: ata eva”iḍānta ātithya”ityatra nityayā pūrveḍayaiva tadantatā
GSD36mvir_sau:4252: (a. 1 pā. 7 adi. 13) kiñca grahaṇasyāsambandhikatvānnimittatā yuktā na tu darśanasya sasambandhikasya
GSD36mvir_sau:4256: na ca pramādādbuddhipūrvaṃ vā niṣedhātikramāt sañjāte darśane naimittikaṃ snānādi vidhīyata iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4258: (a. 3 pā. 4 adhi. 14) “yūpaṃ nopaspṛśet” (a. 9 pā. 3 adhi. 3) iti niṣedhātikramajanitapratyavāyaparihārārthatvavat
GSD36mvir_sau:4260: tathāca niṣadhaikavākyatvena tadatikrama eva snānādividyāpattyoparāgasāmānye snānādividhirdurlabhaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4264: kintu kathañcidapi vidhito niṣedhābhāvādvā niṣedhātikramādvā prasaktaṃ darśanamanūdya yo darśanavān sa snāyaditividhānāt sulabhataraḥ sāmānyavidhiḥ syāditi cet, na /
GSD36mvir_sau:4267: tasmād yadi darśanamāśaucajanakaṃ tata āśaucino 'nadhikāraḥ, yadi svarūpasannuparāga āśau
GSD36mvir_sau:4269: kiṃ bahunā buddhipūrvakārī balānnimittaṃ sampādya na ko 'pi duḥkhākare snānādau pravartteteti sakalo vidhirapramāṇīkṛtaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4270: kiñca saṅkrame pūrvottarakālayoḥ puṇyatvam uparāge tu yāvaddarśanaviṣayatā tāvadeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4273: na ca dṛśerbhramapramāsādhāraṇatvājjale pratibimbabhramavataḥ sa evāyaṃ candra iti bimbapratyabhijñāpramāvato vā snānāvirodha iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4276: ata eva nopaghātāgnivaddarśa naviśiṣṭa uparāgo nimittaṃ pūrvoktadoṣānativṛtteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4278: na coddeśyaviśeṣaṇaṃ darśanaṃ vivakṣitaṃ havirubhayatvavadavi vakṣitatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:4279: nanvitthaṃ vyākulayato darśanasya māstu nimittatvaṃ kintu nīhārakarttṛkasandhyāharaṇe darśanaviśaiṣṭajapavidhivaduparāga eva nimitte darśanaviśiṣṭaṃ snānādi tattadvākyavihitasnānādyanuvādena darśanamātraṃ vā vidhīyate nimittaniścayastu bhavadiṣṭa evāstu /
GSD36mvir_sau:4282: noparaktamityādiniṣedhasya vaidhe 'pravṛtternāśucī rāhutārakā iti niṣedhasyai tanmate darśanottaraṃ pravṛtteḥ sarveṣāmadhikāro bhaviṣyatīti
GSD36mvir_sau:4283: yukto 'yaṃ panthā iti cet, na yuktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4289: ṛtā vā yasya rodasī iti śaṃsati cakṣurvākṣataṃ tasmādyataro vivadamānayorāhāhamanuṣṭayā cakṣuṣādarśamiti tasya śraddadhati /
GSD36mvir_sau:4297: astu vā cākṣuṣajñānavācitā tathāpi na darśane vidhiḥ sambhavati tasya pakṣaprāptatve 'pūrvavidhyasambhavāt, anekoddeśena vidhāne vākyabhedācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:4298: atha darśananiyamaviśiṣṭasnānādi vidhīyata iti matam, tathāpi nāndhādinivṛttiḥ suvacā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4300: na hi kāmya iva naimittikeṣu sarvāṅgopasaṃhāraḥ nimittatvavyāghātāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4303: na hi sarvadā sarvaḥ sāṅgamanuṣṭhātuṃ samarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4304: tasmāt kiñcidaṅgahānenāpi naimittikādhikārādandhādīnāṃ meghacchanne vā darśanarūpāṅgalope 'pi snānādyadhikāro durnirvāraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4305: ata eva na naimittikānurodhena nimittasaṅkocaḥ nimittaśrutivyāghātāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4309: na ceha pradhānabhūtasnānādināndhādervirodho yena tadatiriktaviṣayatā kalpyeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:4327: na ca darśanasya snānamātrāṅgatvācchrāddhādau ca taduttarakālatvasya snānottaratvenārthasiddhatvādanāvṛttiriti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4330: nanu darśanasya nimittaniścayatvenādhikārasampādanopayogitayāṅgatvāt sakṛddarśane 'pi tanniścayasya jātatvādanāvṛttiriticet, na, /
GSD36mvir_sau:4335: kiñca sphayasya bhaktāśleṣanimittejyāyāṃ pūrvakartavyāvāhana iva jyotiḥśāstrādinā prayatnānapaneyapratibandhakarāhityarūpayogyatāyā aniścayāttadviśiṣṭa darśananiścayābhāvāduparāgapūrvakālakartavyamahādānāṅgabhūtādhivāsanādau trirātropavāsādau ca niṣkampaṃ na ko 'pi pravartteta /
GSD36mvir_sau:4336: kiñca darśanasya nimittatve uparāge snāyādityādau uparāgādipade darśanalakṣaṇāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4337: uparāgasya nimittatve darśane 'pi sā tulyaiveticet, satyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4338: rāhudarśane snāyāditi saptamīyuktavākyeṣu”yasya ca bhāvena bhāvalakṣaṇam”
GSD36mvir_sau:4340: ityatra dohanasya gamanakālalakṣakatvavat dṛśeḥ kālalakṣaṇārthatvāvaśyambhāvāttatkāle ca snānādeḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4343: yasya gorbhāvena dohanakriyārūpadhātvarthena bhāvasya gamanasya lakṣaṇamupalakṣaṇaṃ gamanaparicchedakālādipratipādanaṃ tatra saptamī syāditi sūtrārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4344: ata eva saptamyantadṛśiyukteṣu na darśanavidhiḥ prasiddhasya lakṣaṇatvādaprasiddhasya tadayogāt abhiśabdādivadbhāvalakṣaṇavihitasaptamyā vidhiśaktipratibandhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4346: kiñca na ktvānteṣu darśanavidhiḥ ktvo 'vidhāyakatvātsnātyādeḥ parasya tu vidheḥ snānādividhāyakatvādviśiṣṭavidhau ca lakṣaṇā patterārthikānekadarśanatduttarakālatvasamānakarttṛkatvavidhyantarakalpanāpatteśca uparāgalakṣaṇāyāṃ tu lakṣaṇaiva kevalā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4350: tatra snānaṃ na kurvīta dadyāddānaṃ na ca kvacit //
GSD36mvir_sau:4351: itideśāntarīyoparāgasya paryudāsāt samāne deśe cākṣuṣatvayogyamuparāgaṃ śāstrato jñātvā tattatkāle snānādi kuryāditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:4352: janmarāśyādau grahaṇe doṣastatra ca śāntikāni śāntiprakāśe draṣṭavyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:4367: evaṃ ca mantrasiddhiḥ syāddevatā ca prasīdati //
GSD36mvir_sau:4374: puraścaraṇaṃ ca na grastodaye grastāste ca bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:4378: ata eva naśrāddhādyapi puraścaraṇānuṣṭhātṝṇā bhavati kāmyena nityasya bādhācceti kaścit /
GSD36mvir_sau:4379: vastutastu kāmyavidheḥ śrāddhādyanadhikāriṇaṃ pratyapi caritārthatvānna nityabādhakatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4400: ekabhaktaṃ tu tatproktaṃ nyūnaṃ grāsatrayeṇa tu // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4410: tatra dinadvaye tadvyāpto tadasparśe vā pūrvaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4417: kṣayavṛddhisāmyāni ca sarvatra ṣaṣṭhighaṭikāpekṣayā na tu pūrvatithyādyapekṣayeti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:4428: yathā hi mukhyakālavyāptyanurodhena nirṇayaḥ sambhavati na yugmavākyādaraḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4433: tena yatra viśiṣya gauṇakālavidhistatra tadvyāptyāpi nirṇaya iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:4434: anyāṅgabhūtamekabhaktaṃ tat pradhāne nirṇītāyāṃ tithau madhyāhne kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4437: (a. 12 pā. 2 adhi. 9 sū. 25) ata eva yatra
GSD36mvir_sau:4445: ata eva navarātravratasyāpi naktavratatvaṃ mādhavādyuktaṃ saṅgacchata ityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4454: yadā tu dviguṇā cchāyāṃ kurvaṃstapati bhāskaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4455: tatra naktaṃ vijānīyānna naktaṃ niśi bhojanam //
GSD36mvir_sau:4456: iti sauradharmādiṣu dināntyamuhūrtātmakau dviguṇacchāyopalakṣitaḥ kālo vihitaḥ sa gauṇaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4467: niśānaktaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ yāmārddhe prathame sadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4471: āhāraṃ maithunaṃ nidrāṃ svādhyāyaṃ ca caturthakam //
GSD36mvir_sau:4476: iti ghaṭikātraye 'pi sandhyāśabdaḥ sa sandhyāgarjitādau bodhyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4478: ata eva ravivārādiprayuktarātribhojananiṣedhe satyapi tatra naktānuṣṭhānamuktaṃ hemādriprabhṛtibhiḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4480: vastutastu vidhiniṣedhayoravirodhāt tridhaṭikottarameva naktaṃ kāryaṃ mukhyakālalābhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4490: itisumantunā evakāreṇa sauranakte sāmānyataḥ prāptarātribhojanasya niṣedhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4495: yatiśca vidhavā caiva kuryāt tat sadivākaram //
GSD36mvir_sau:4497: tadevaṃ gṛhasthānāṃ pradoṣa eva mukhyo naktakālaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4498: tatra dinadvaye mukhyakālavyāpitve tadasparśe vā parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4500: asparśa ca naikabhaktavanmukhyakāle bhojanaṃ kintu sāyāhna eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4504: evaṃ jñātvā tato vidvān sāyāhne tu bhujikriyām //
GSD36mvir_sau:4509: tatra sāyānharūpasya mukhyasya pradoṣarūpasya ca gauṇasya kālasya sattvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4510: ayaṃ ca nirṇayo na bhojanarūpa eva nakte kintu pūjādirūpe 'pi draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4512: anyāṅga upavāsapratinidhau vā nakte tu ekabhaktavadeva nirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4515: tatra yadekabhaktanaktādiviruddhaṃ tithidvayaprayuktamekasmin dine prāpnoti tatra pūrvaprārabdhayordvayoḥ pūrvatithiprayuktamanupasañjātavirodhitvānmukhyakalpena kāryam, itarattu anukalpayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:4516: idaṃ ca yadyuttaradine dvitīyagauṇakālo na labhyate tadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4526: ayācitānnabhojanaṃ tu yadaiva labhyate tadaiva divā rātrau vāniṣiddhakāle sakṛdeva kāryam
GSD36mvir_sau:4531: upoṣitavyaṃ yenāstaṃ yāti caiva tu bhāskaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4532: yatra vā yujyate rāma! niśīthaḥ śaśinā saha //
GSD36mvir_sau:4537: tatra saṅkramasvarūpaṃ tāvat ravibimbamadhyaparamāṇormeṣādirāśyādya paramāṇāśce sambandhaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4544: te ca saṅkrāntisāmānyanimittakeṣu vidhipratiṣadheṣu samāḥ sādhāraṇā ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4561: golaṃ ca viṣuvāyanābhyāṃ yuktaṃ rāśicakraṃ tanmadhye 'parā ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4563: karkamakarayoḥ krameṇa dakṣiṇāyanottarāyaṇa iti saṃjñā, tulāmeṣayorviṣuva
GSD36mvir_sau:4565: etā eva ca vārabhedena (nakṣatrabhedena) ca jātāḥ pratyekaṃ saptasaṃjñā bhavanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4568: sūrye ghorā vidhau dvāṅkṣī bhaume caiva mahodarī /
GSD36mvir_sau:4571: mandā dhruveṣu vijñeyā mṛdau mandākinī tathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:4574: miśritā caiva nirddiṣṭā miśritairyadi saṅkramaḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4586: sannihitakāla anuṣṭhānamarthasiddhaṃ yathā sandhikālavihitayordarśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sandhāvanuṣṭhātumaśakyatvena sannihitakāle karaṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4587: sa ca sannihitakālaḥ kimubhayataḥ kiṃvānyatarataḥ kiyāṃścetyapekṣāyām--
GSD36mvir_sau:4591: tadyogātusaṅkrāntiyuktātsūkṣmakālādadha urdhvaṃ ca militvā triṃśannāḍyo 'tra śāstrakāraiḥ pāvitritāḥ snānādyanuṣṭhānayogyāḥ kṛtā ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4592: idaṃ ca ubhayataḥ pañcadaśaghaṭikāpuṇyatvavacanaṃ ravibimbaparimāṇānāṃ jyotiḥ--śāstre matabhedena bhinnatvādyanmate spaṣṭabhuktyarddhaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:4595: taduttarakālaṃ ca tāvatībhireva ghaṭikābiruttarabhāgasyāpi meṣādirāśicakrānupraveśo jyotiḥśāstre grasiddhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4602: arvāk ṣoḍaśa vijñeyā nāḍyaḥ paścācca ṣoḍaśa /
GSD36mvir_sau:4609: ityādīni śātātapamarīcijābālivākyāni tāni yanmate nijapañcadaśāṃśayuktabhuktyarthaṃ ravibimbaṃ tanmatābhiprāyeṇa vyākhyeyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:4610: ataśca bimbaparimāṇabhedena ṣoḍaśa pañcadaśa vā ghaṭikā ubhayataḥ pratyekaṃ puṇyakāla iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:4614: iti devalavacanāt saṅkrāntikālāt pūrvaṃ triṃśannāḍyaḥ puṇyāḥ paścācca triṃśannāḍyaḥ puṇyāḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4618: yāni tu kvaciduttaratra kkacit pūrvatra kvacidubhayatretyevaṃ saṅkrāntiviśeṣakālavidhāyakāni vakṣyamāṇavacanāni tāni puṇyādhikyapratipādanārthāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:4621: gauḍairuktam-”pūrvodāhṛtobhayataḥ ṣoḍaśaghaṭikāpuṇyatvapratipādakānāṃ śātātapādivacanānāṃ viṣṇupadīmātraviṣayatvam itarasaṅkrāntiṣu vakṣyamāṇarītyā sarvatra
GSD36mvir_sau:4627: ayanādau sadā deyaṃ dravyamiṣṭaṃ gṛheṣu yat /
GSD36mvir_sau:4629: ityupakrame ayanādāvityādiśabdena viṣuvadviṣṇupadyorupasaṅgrahāt sarvasaṅkrāntiṣu dānādividhipratīteḥ sūkṣmakāle ca dānādyanupapatteḥ sthūlakālāpekṣāyām”arvāk ṣoḍaśa vijñeyā”ityādyuparitanena vacanena ubhayataḥ ṣoḍaśaghaṭikārūpasthūlakālavidheḥ sarvasaṅkrāntiviṣayatvasya spaṣṭatvāt na ca spaṣṭasya sāmānyavidherupasaṃhāro yujyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:4634: evaṃ ca sarvasaṅkrāntisādhāraṇyena ubhayataḥṣoḍaśaghaṭikāpuṇyatvavacanaiḥ ubhayataḥ puṇyatve sthite viśeṣavacanāni puṇyātiśayārthāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:4637: madhye tu viṣuve puṇyaṃ prāgviṣṇau dakṣiṇāyane /
GSD36mvir_sau:4643: vastutastu vṛttaṃ vartanaṃ bhāve ktaḥ vartamānakāle iti anantabhaṭṭavyākhyaiva yuktā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4646: idaṃ ca viṣṇupadīṣu prāk puṇyatvavacanaṃ praśastataratvadyotanārtham /
GSD36mvir_sau:4649: ataśca viṣṇupadyāṃ parāḥ ṣoḍaśa ghaṭikā itarasaṅkrāntyepakṣayā puṇyatarāḥ pūrvāḥ ṣoḍaśa puṇyatamā iti vyavasthā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4651: anye tu viṣṇupadīpūrvakālapuṇyatvaprātapādavākyasya nirmulatvāt skāndavacanādubhayata eva ṣāḍaśa ghāṭakāḥ puṇyakāla ityāhnuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4656: iti vacane cabdena itarasaṅkrāntyapekṣayā ubhayataḥ puṇyataratvasya sūcitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4660: triṃśat karkaṭake nāḍyo makare viṃśatiḥ parā //
GSD36mvir_sau:4661: brahmavaivartte tu makare tu daśādhikā iti caturthapādaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4663: ayane viṃśatiḥ pūrvā makare viṃśatiḥ parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4665: atra sarvatra viruddhānāṃ vacanānāṃ puṇyādhikyaparatvena vyavasthā draṣṭavyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4677: taṃ ca hemādriḥ pratyekaṃ pañcadaśeti militvā ṣaṣṭiriti vyākhyātavān /
GSD36mvir_sau:4678: viṣṇupadyāṃ tu saṅkhayāviśeṣasya aśravaṇāt sāmānyavacanoktā eva ṣoḍaśaghaṭikāḥ pūrvaṃ puṇyāḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4680: tulāmeṣayoḥ prāgūrcvaṃ daśa daśa ghaṭikāḥ puṇyāḥ, karke viṃśatiḥ pūrvaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:4681: makare urddhvaṃ, ṣaḍaśītyāṃ ṣoḍaśa parāḥ, viṣṇupadyāṃ pūrvā iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4686: atra caitāḥ pūrvabhoginya uttarabhoginyo ubhayatobhoginyo vā yadi divāmadhryāhnādiṣu jāyante tadā divaiva tatra tatroktapraśastakālalābhāt sapteva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4688: bhoginyāṃ vā astāt pūrvaṃ jāyamānāyāṃ divā pūrvottarau praśastakālau na labhyate tadā sāmānyavacanaprāptasya pūrvabhoginyāmuttarasya uttarabhoginyāṃvā pūrvasyaiva kālasya grahaṇaṃ na punaḥ praśastakālabhrāntyā rātreriti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4693: atra hi pūrvārddham ahni madhyāhnādau saṅkramaṇe 'haḥpuṇyatvasya
GSD36mvir_sau:4694: pūrvottaranāḍīpuṇyavacanaireva siddhatvānna yathāśrutārthaparaṃ kintu uktaviṣaye praśastakālalābhena prasaktasya rātripuṇyasya pratiṣedhārtham /
GSD36mvir_sau:4695: ataścodayānantarame va pūrvabhoginyāmastāt pūrvaṃ vottarabhoginyāṃ jāyamānāyāmahanyeva snānādyanuṣṭhayam
GSD36mvir_sau:4696: yāsu tu ubhayatobhoginīṣu ubhayorapi kālayoḥ sāmyaṃ tāsu divāpi praśastakālalābhāt na rātrāvanuṣṭhānaprasaṅgaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4699: yā yāḥ sannihitā nāḍyastāstāḥ puṇyatamāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4703: iti vacanācca rātrerapi puṇyakālatvaṃ prāpnoti, tathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:4704: rātrau saṅkramaṇe bhānordivā kuryāttu tat kriyām //
GSD36mvir_sau:4706: sa ca na sampūrṇaṃ dinaṃ kintu rātrau saṅkramaṇe bhānorddinārddhaṃ snānadānayoḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4708: tadāpi ca yadyarddharātrāt pūrvaṃ saṅkramastadā pūrvadinasya yadyūrdhvaṃ tadottarasya yadā tu ardharātre tadobhayoriti vyavasthitamityāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:4712: sampūrṇe arddharātre tu yadā saṅkramate raviḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4717: mādhavastu tṛtīyapraharasya prathamaghaṭikā dvitīyasya cāntyetyevaṃ ghaṭikādvayamarddharātramityāha
GSD36mvir_sau:4718: dinadvayaṃ ca na sampūrṇaṃ kintu arddhāvacchinnameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4726: vastutastu etasya anantabhaṭṭena nirmūlatvasyoktatvāt hemādpyādivyākhyaiva jyāyasī bahusammatā ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:4727: tasmāt pūrṇe arddharātre saṅkrame pūrvadinottarārddhamuttaradinapūrvārddhaṃ ca puṇyaṃ sannidhānāt
GSD36mvir_sau:4728: tadapi na samuccayena kintu vikalpena anyathā pradhānāvṛttyāpatteḥ, so 'pi
GSD36mvir_sau:4729: pūrvadinottarārddhavarttitithyā yadyabhinnā saṅkramakālīnā tithirbhavet tadā pūrvadinottarārddham, yadā tu dvitīyadinapūrvārddhatithyā abhinnā tadottaradinapūrvārddhaṃ grāhyamityevaṃ vyavasthitaḥ tathā ca--
GSD36mvir_sau:4734: arddharātrasaṅkrame yadi pūrvadinottarārddhe saṅkramakāle ca ekaiva tithirbhavet tadādau pūrvadinottarārdhe puṇyaṃ jānīyāditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:4737: ardharātrottaraṃ sakraṅme tu bhinnāyāmabhinnāyāṃ vā pūrvadinatithau pare
GSD36mvir_sau:4739: yadā tu ardharātrasaṅkramakālīnā tithirdinadvayārdhayorapi bhavati tadā pūrvabhīginīṣu pūrvadinottarārdham uttarabhoginīṣu uttaradinapūrvārdham ubhayatobhoginīṣu aicchiko vikalpa iti vyavasthā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4744: “sampūrṇe tūbhayordeyam”iti devīpurāṇenobhayatradeyatve vihite pradhānāvṛttyāpatteḥ samuccayāyogāt avyavasthitavikalpe prāpte”ādau puṇyaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:4747: ardharātrāt pūrvaṃ saṅkrame pūrvadinottarārdhaṃ taduttaraṃ saṅkrame uttaradinapūrvārdhe niśīthasaṅkrame tu yadi pūrvadinottarārdhavarttitithyābhinnāyāṃ tithau saṅkramaḥ tadā pūrvādanottarārdhaṃ yadi tu uttaradinapūrvārdhavarttitithyābhinnāyāṃ tithau saṅkramastadā uttaradinapūvārdhaṃ yadā tu dinadvayārdhavarttitithyābhinnāyāṃ tithau saṅkramastadā pūrvabhogirnāṣu pūrvadinottarārdham uttarabhoginīṣu uttaradinapūrvārdhama ubhayabhoginīṣu aicchiko vikalpa iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4751: pūrvāhne pañca nāḍyastu puṇyāḥ proktā manīṣibhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4752: aparāhṇe ca pañcaiva śraute smārtte ca karmaṇi //
GSD36mvir_sau:4755: iyaṃ ca rātrisaṅkramavyavasthā ayanabhinnaviṣayā pūrvodāhṛtavaśiṣṭhavacanena sakalasya rātrinirṇayasya
GSD36mvir_sau:4759: prabhāte vā niśīthe vā kuryādahani pūrvataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:4760: kārmukaṃ tu parityajya jñaṣaṃ saṅkramate raviḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4761: pradoṣe vārdharātre vā snānaṃ dānaṃ pare 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:4763: 'hanyeva puṇyaṃ pūrvaṃ makare tu arddharātratadadhaḥsaṅkrame 'pi pare
GSD36mvir_sau:4765: evaṃ ca rātrisaṅkrame 'pi divāpuṇyatvavidhānādarthādrātrau snānādipratiṣedha unnīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:4772: iti sāmānyato yājñavalkyavacanamapi ayanaviṣayam, anyathā itarasaṅkrāntiṣu divaiva puṇyatvavidhānādetasya nirviṣayatvāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4779: itiparyudāso na sakalasya rātrinirṇayasya kintu sannihitasyārddharātrasaṅkramaṇanimittakasya dinadvayasyaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:4781: yathā itarasaṅkrāntiṣu arddharātre jāyamānāsu dinadvayaṃ puṇyaṃ na tathā ayane tasmiṃstu arddharātre jāyamāne pūrvodāhṛtabhaviṣyottaravacanānmakare uttaraṃ dinaṃ karke pūrvaṃ puṇyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4782: bhaviṣyottaravākye hi na pradoṣa arddharātre vā jāyamānāyā makarasaṅkrānteḥ paradine puṇyaṃ prabhāte 'rddharātre vā jāyamānāyāḥ karkasaṅkrānteḥ pūrvadine puṇyamiti pratipādyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:4785: dinānte pañca nāḍyastu tadā puṇyatamāḥ smṛtāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:4786: udaye ca tathā pañca daive pitrye ca karmaṇi /
GSD36mvir_sau:4791: yathā pradoṣe jāyamānāyā makarasaṅkrānteḥ pūrvadinārddhe puṇyaṃ tathā ardadharātre jāyamānāyāḥ pare 'hanīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4793: ataścārddharātrasaṅkrame makare uttaraṃ dinaṃ karke pūrvam,
GSD36mvir_sau:4794: ardharātrādadhaḥ paścādvā saṅkrame tu ubhayatrāpi itarasaṅkrāntisarūpa eva nirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4795: na caivaṃ rātripuṇyatvapratipādakānāṃ yājñavalkyādivacanānāṃ nirviṣayatvāpattiḥ sarvasaṅkrāntiṣu rātrisaṅkrame divaiva puṇyakālābhidhānāditivācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4799: prācyāstu rātrisannihitadinabhāgasaṅkrāntau ṣoḍaśaghaṭikādirūpavihitasamayena rātrerapi vyāvṛttatvā ttadviṣayatayā rātripuṇyatvavacanānāmupapattirityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4800: atra ca vihitaṃ snānaśrāddhadānādi niṣiddhaṃ ca yātrāmaithunādi anyato 'nusandheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4801: rave rāśisaṅkramavannakṣatrasaṅkrame grahāntarāṇāṃ ca rāśinakṣatrasaṅkrame snānādyanuṣṭhānam
GSD36mvir_sau:4806: nāḍyaścatasraḥ sapalāḥ kujasya budhasya tisno manavaḥ palāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:4816: grahāntarasaṅkrame ca rātrau jāyamāne rātrāveva snānādi kāryaṃ ravisaṅkramavat divāpuṇyatvavacanābhāvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:4824: ekamātrarāhityaṃ cāsaṅkrāntatvena saṅkrāntidvayavattvena ca bhavatīti dvedhāmalamāsaḥ adhikamāsaḥ kṣayamāsaśceti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4827: yasmin māse na saṅkrāntiḥ saṅkrāntidvayameva vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:4828: malamāsaḥ sa vijñeyo māsaḥ syāttu trayodaśaḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4844: indrāgnī yatra hūyete māsādiḥ sa prakīrttitaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4847: ādyo malimluco jñeyo dvitīyaḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:4849: ādyadvitīyaśabdābhyāṃ tasyetaramāsāpekṣayā dvaiguṇyam uttaramāsasaṃjñatvaṃ ca sūcayati /
GSD36mvir_sau:4853: pūrvamarddhaṃ parityajya kartavyā cottare kriyā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4860: iti vyāsena mīnādisthe ravau pratipadādyalakṣaṇasambandhena caitrādilakṣaṇamuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4865: itibrahmaguptoktaṃ caitrādilakṣaṇaṃ tacchuddhamāsābhiprāyeṇa prāyikam na tu mukhyaṃ malamāsāvyāpakatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:4870: iti jyotiḥśāstre tasya nāmaśūnyatvoktiḥ sā viruddhamalimlucādināmakatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4872: atha vā brahmaguptoktameva lakṣaṇaṃ mukhyaṃ na tu vyāsoktaṃ kṣaye
GSD36mvir_sau:4874: adhikasya ca ṣaṣṭidinātmakatvāt tena ca meṣadisaṅkrāntisambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:4893: atra ca vākye darśāntamāsavivakṣāyāṃ kṛṣṇadvitīyāyāṃ ghaṭikācatuṣṭaye gate
GSD36mvir_sau:4898: ata evoktaṃ siddhāntaśiromaṇau, asaṅkrāntamāso 'dhimāsaḥ sphuṭaḥ syāditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:4902: yāni tu”māse triṃśattame bhavet”ityādivacanāni tāni sambhavābhiprāyeṇa na
GSD36mvir_sau:4906: sa ca kārttikādiṣu triṣveva bhavati nānyeṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:4907: yadā cāyaṃ tadā varṣamadhye kṣayamāsasyobhayato 'dhikamāsadvayaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:4909: kṣayaḥ kārttikāditraye nānyataḥ syāttadā varṣamadhye 'dhimāsadvayaṃ ca / iti /

GSD36mvir_sau:4919: klacit goku bhiḥ 19 hīnaiḥ kuvedendubhi (141) arthāt kvacit 141 varṣaiḥ kvacicca 122 varṣairvyavadhānaṃ bhavatīti māvaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4920: tathāca pūrvokta 974 saṅkhyāyāṃ 141 saṅkhyāyā melane 1115 jāyate tatra tanmelena 1256 jāyate tatra 122 melane 1378 jāyate ityavadheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4947: yatra māsi ravisaṅkramadvayaṃ tatra māsayugalaṃ kṣayāhvayam / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:4949: ata eva pūrvasaṅkrāntyupalakṣitasya kārttikāderuttarasaṅkrāntyupalakṣitamārgaśīrṣādyapekṣayā pṛthagavasthānābhāvāt dvisaṅkrāntaḥ kṣaya ityucyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:4951: meṣādisthe savitari yo yo māsaḥ prapūryate cāndraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4953: iti vacanoktalakṣaṇānusārāt kṣaye pūrvarāśisthe ravau darśāntyasamāptyabhāvāduttararāśistharavāveva tatsamāpteruttaramāsarūpatvamevetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4956: yasmin māse na saṅkrāntiḥ saṅkrāntidvayameva ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:4959: atra pūrvāsaṅkrāntadvisaṅkrāntayoḥ saṃsarpaṃhaspatisaṃjñā uttarāsaṅkrāntatyādhimāsatvaṃ krameṇābhidhānādavagamyate iti madanaratnaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:4960: saṃsarpaśca na malamāsaḥ kintu śuddhaḥ uttarastvaśuddhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:4964: yadāśvinādiṣaṭke malamāsa ekaḥ aparaśca caitrādiṣaṭke tadā pūrvasya śuddhatvapratipādakaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:4969: makare vātha kumbhe vā nādhimāso vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:4973: daivaṃ pitryaṃ tadā karma tulāsthe karturakṣayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:4984: atra ca malamāsasya trayodaśatvaṃ saṅkrāntiyuktaśuddhadvādaśamāsāpekṣayā na tu vāstavam /
GSD36mvir_sau:4985: atra yadyapi sarvā ityupādānāt sarvakarmaṇāṃ nivṛttipratītistathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:4986: iṣṭyādi sarvaṃ kāmyaṃ tu malamāse vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:4989: ityādipratiprasavavacanebhyaśca kāmyānāmeva nivṛttiḥ na tu nityanaimittikānām /
GSD36mvir_sau:4995: nityanaimittike kuryāt prayataḥ san malimluce / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5007: eteṣāṃ ca nityatvamakaraṇe pratyavāyaśrava ṇādinā bodhyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5009: darśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ hi tattatkālāvacchinne jīvane nimitte vihitānāṃ malamāsa eva kālasamāptiḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5010: yeṣāṃ tu jyotiṣṭomādīnāṃ vihitakālasya vasantādermalamāse 'samāpti, śuddhe
GSD36mvir_sau:5019: roge cālabhyayoge ca sīmante puṃsave 'pi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5021: idaṃ cātra kartavyatāvacanaṃ tannimittakasya snānādereva na tu
GSD36mvir_sau:5049: gauḍāstu na nityapadenāvaśyakartavyapārvaṇaśrāddhādigrahaṇaṃ tathā sati pretaśrāddhāderapi tata eva kartavyatāsiddhau teṣāṃ pṛthaggrahaṇavaiyarthyāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5053: indrāgnī yatra hūyete māsādiḥ sa prakīrttitaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5056: ādyo malimluco jñeyo dvitīyaḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5071: vaśiṣṭhaḥ, saṃvatsaramadhye yadyadhimāso bhavet māsikārthaṃ dinamekaṃ vṛddhiṃ nayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5075: asmin vacane māsikānupādānenaitasya tatparatve pramāṇābhāvāduktayuktyā pārvarṇaviṣayatvasyaiva yuktatvāt, /
GSD36mvir_sau:5090: astaṃ gate gurau śukre bāle vṛddhe malimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5092: iti gargavākyaṃ jātakarmādīnāṃ niṣedhakaṃ, tanmukhyakālākṛtānāṃ veditabyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5095: atipāte tu kartavyaṃ praśaste māsi puṣyade //
GSD36mvir_sau:5102: paramānnaṃ tu yo dadyāt pitṝṇāṃ madhunā saha /
GSD36mvir_sau:5113: gajacchāyā tu sā proktā tatra śrāddhaṃ prakalpayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:5115: atra dākṣiṇātyamate gajacchāyādeḥ sagatitve 'pi vacanātkartavyatā bodhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5117: yāni tu sagatikāni tāni nityānyapi na tatra kāryāṇi /
GSD36mvir_sau:5127: tasyā naimittikatve 'pi śeṣivirodhānnimittānantarakālabādhe jāte parvopasaṅgrahavacchuddhakālopasaṅgrahasya nyāyyatvāt sagatikatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5131: kāmyānyapi yāni śeṣivirodhādvilambaṃ na sahante yathā kārīryādīni tāni malamāse 'pi bhavantyeva
GSD36mvir_sau:5133: tathā tathaiva kāryāṇi na kālastu vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5135: atra naimittikāni kāmyānīti sāmānādhikaraṇyam tathā ca duḥsvapnādinimittena kartavyatayopasthitāni kāmyānītyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5137: asūryo nāma ye māsā na teṣu mama sammatāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5141: prārabdhaṃ karma yat kiñcit tat kāryaṃ syānmalimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5149: iti malamāse 'pi kāmyakarmaṇaḥ samāptipratipādakaṃ kāṭhakagṛhyaṃ tat sāvanamānopajīvikṛcchracāndrāyaṇāhīnasatrādiviṣayam
GSD36mvir_sau:5153: yastu khamāpanamiti brahmasiddhāntavacane samāptiniṣedhaḥ sa malamāsa eva mohāt prārabdhasya tasya tatraiva samāpane doṣātiśayapradarśanārtha ityādda /
GSD36mvir_sau:5154: tadevaṃ saṅkṣepato varjyatve siddhe prapañcārthaṃ vacanānyudāhiyante /
GSD36mvir_sau:5159: bāle vā yadi vā śukre vṛddhe vāstamupāgate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5170: iti nāradavacena mahādānānāmeva pratiṣedhaḥ sa pratyavāyātiśayārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5173: aste sandhyāgate bāle bhṛgau māsi malimluce /
