GSD36mvir_sau:5178: anye tu śeṣibādhāpatteravaśyakartavye dānādāvanyeṣāmeva pratiprasavo na mahādānānāṃ teṣāṃ punarniṣedhādityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5179: nārāyaṇopādhyāyāstu dānāntarāṇi mumukṣoḥ phalābhisandhiviraheṇa kurvāṇasya malamāse 'pi bhavanti mahādānāni tu na tathā punarniṣedhādityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5187: kuryānna sāvakāśaṃ māṅgalyaṃ na tu viśeṣejyām // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5195: vastutastu dvitīyādirapi malamāse niṣiddha eva sagatikatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5201: atra hi pūrvārddhagatanindāpokṣito niṣedho na svatantraḥ kalpyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5211: ata eva tīrthayātrāṃ vivarjayediti gārgyavacane pāṭhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5217: na tyaktavyaṃ gayāśrāddhaṃ siṃhasthe ca bṛhaspatau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5220: malamāse na kartavyaṃ vyāghrasya vacanaṃ yathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5222: tena vārṣikaṃ śrāddhaṃ malamāse na kāryamityeva vivakṣitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5231: ityādiśātātapādivacanāni tāni malamāsamṛtānāṃ punarmalamāse tatraiva pratyāvdikaṃ kāryaṃ na śuddha ityevaṃparāṇi /
GSD36mvir_sau:5232: varṣe varṣe tu yacchrāddhaṃ mṛtāhe tanmalimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5235: malimluce tu samprāpte brāhmaṇo bhriyate yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:5242: na cedaṃ vacanaṃ malamāsamṛtasya saureṇaiva māsena sarvadā pratyābdikakartavyatāparamiti samayaprakāśakṛdvyākhyānaṃ yuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5244: tasmānmalaṃmāsamṛtasya punarmalamāse tatraiva pratyābdikaṃ kāryaṃ na śuddha ityeva vyākhyā jyāyasī bahusammatā ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5245: śuddhamāsamṛtānāṃ tu dvitīyādyābdikaṃ śuddha eva kāryaṃ prathamābdikaṃ tu mala eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5252: ābdikaṃ prathamaṃ yat syāttat kurvīta malimluce /
GSD36mvir_sau:5256: punarābdikaṃ dvitīyādyābdikaṃ tu yadi taddine malamāsapātastadā trayodaśe śuddhe kurvītetyarthaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5258: pratyabdaṃ dvādaśe māsi kāryā piṇḍakriyā sutaiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5261: kvacid dvitīyābdikādau nalamāsapāte trayodaśe śuddhe kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5262: ādyābdikaṃ malamāsapāte 'pi dvādaśa eva māse kāryamityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5263: iyaṃ ca malamāsapāte dvādaśe māsi kartavyatā na saṃvatsaramadhye malamāsapāte /
GSD36mvir_sau:5264: tathāca sati dvādaśe māsi mṛtatithyalābhena sapiṇḍanānupapatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5268: malamāsamṛtānāṃ yadā kālakrameṇa kadācinmṛtimāsa eva malamāsastadā tadīyamābdikaṃ tatraiva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5269: śuddhamāsamṛtānāṃ tu dvitīyādyābdikaṃ śuddha eva prathamābdikaṃ tu mala eveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5274: yāni tu”māsadvaye 'pi tatkāryaṃ vyāghrasya vacanaṃ yathā”
GSD36mvir_sau:5281: tathaiva kāmyaṃ yat karma vatsarāt prathamādṛte //
GSD36mvir_sau:5284: atra cābhyudayaniṣedhadvārā tadaṅgakasya caulopanayanādereva niṣedho draṣṭabyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5287: kecittu prathamasamvatsare sapiṇḍīkaraṇottaradine kriyamāṇamābhyudayikaṃ malamāse 'pi kāryamityarthamāhuḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5289: tathā ca sapiṇḍīkaraṇādūrdhvaṃ yāni prathamasaṃvatsarasambandhīni punarmāsikāni kriyante tāni malamāse 'pi kāryāṇi ityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:5302: yacca”jyeṣṭhemāsi site pakṣe”ityādivacaneṣu daśaharādau cāndramāsavācijyeṣṭhādipadaśravaṇaṃ tadagatyā lakṣaṇayā sauramāsaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5303: ataśca tulādistharaveḥ śuddhamāse asambhavāt malamāsa eva yugādiprāpteranutkarṣasiddhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5306: siṃhe ravau tu puṣyarkṣe pūrvāhṇe vicaredbahiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5310: ata eva”śravaṇena śrāvaṇasya”ityādāvāśvalāyanasūtre śrāvaṇapadaṃ na sauramāsaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5324: mādhavādayastu daśaharāsu neti vacanasthaṃ vṛṣādita iti
GSD36mvir_sau:5326: pratimāsaṃ mṛtāhe ca śrāddhaṃ yat prativatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:5331: tairthikasyobhayatrakartavyatā tu yadaiva tīrthaprāptiḥ śuddhe male vā tadaiva śrāddhaṃ kuryāditivyavasthā draṣṭavyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5332: vastutastu manvādivākyena vairūpyāpatteḥ etadvacanabalāt tīrthaśrāddhamubhayatra kāryamitiyuktam
GSD36mvir_sau:5335: nabho vātha nabhasyo vā malamāso yadā bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5337: iti nāgarakhaṇḍavacanenāṣāḍhītaḥ saptame pakṣe vihitatvāt malamāse niṣedhaḥ spaṣṭa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5338: yadā tvāśvinasyādhimāsatvaṃ tadāpi na kanyāsambandhabhrāntyā malināśvine mahālayaḥ kāryaḥ kintu bhādrāparapakṣa eva”anyatrava tu
GSD36mvir_sau:5340: na ca kanyāyogābhāve kathaṃ tatra śrāddhamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5341: sakalasya pakṣasya kanyāyogābhāve kathaṃ tatra śrāddhamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5342: sakalasya pakṣasya kanyāsambandhābhāve 'pi bhādrapadakṛṣṇapakṣasya kanyāsaṅkrāntisparśavattvena tatra śrāddhasyānuṣṭhānaṃ śakyatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5344: ante vā yadi vā madhye yatra kanyāṃ ravirvrajet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5345: sa pakṣaḥ sakalaḥ pūjyaḥ śrāddhaṃ tatra vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5346: iti kārṣṇājinivacane 'pi sakalasya pakṣasya kanyāyogābhāve 'pi tatra śrāddhamuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5347: śūlapāṇyādimate tu kanyāsambandhanirapekṣasya pañcamapakṣasyaiva śrāddhakālatvādyuktameva tatra śrāddhānuṣṭhānam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5348: yattu tanmate kanyāgatāparapakṣe sakṛtkriyamāṇaśrāddhāntara tat kanyāgatāparapakṣasya pañcamatvāsambhavānmalināśvine prāptamapi vakṣyamāṇavacanānusārāttulāgatāparapakṣa eva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5349: vastutastu kanyāgatāparapakṣaśrāddhaṃ na pañcamapakṣaśrāddhādbhinnaṃ śrāddhabhede vidhikalpanāgauravāpatteḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5350: pañcamapakṣasya”ante vā yadi vā madhya”iti vacanena kanyopalakṣitasyaiva śrāddhakālatvapratīteśca
GSD36mvir_sau:5353: śrāvaṇabhādrayorhi malamāsatve pañcamapakṣasya kanyāsambandho na bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5354: tadā ca saptamapakṣasya vihitatvāt kanyopalakṣita eva śrāddhaprāptiriti na kāpi kṣatiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5355: yadā tu āśvinasya malinatvaṃ tadāpi pañcamapakṣasya kanyāsambandho 'styeva
GSD36mvir_sau:5356: amāyāmeva kanyāpraveśāt tena ekameva śrāddhamiti yuktaṃ bahusammataṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5357: tadapi cāśvinasya malinatve 'pi kanyopalakṣitasya mukhyasyaiva pañcamapakṣasya lābhāttatraiva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5360: daivaṃ pitryaṃ tadā karma tulāsthe karturakṣayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5361: iti jyotiḥ pitāmahavacanaṃ tulāstharavau kartavyatvabodhakaṃ tanmahālayātiriktavrīhipākādiśrāddhaparam
GSD36mvir_sau:5362: athavā mahālayasya”yāvadvṛścikadarśanam”iti gauṇakāle 'pi vihitatvād gauṇakālabhrāntyā malināśvine kriyamāṇasya niṣedhadvārā tulāstharavau
GSD36mvir_sau:5366: iti kartavyeṣu mahālayaparigaṇanaṃ kṛtaṃ tat mahālayākhyatīrthaparam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5368: atra ca jyotiḥ pitāmahavākye daivasyāpi kanyākartavyasya tulāyāṃ kartavyatvapratīterdurgāsthāpanādikamapi tatraiva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5372: śete buddhyati vṛścike sa bhagavān māsaiścaturbhirhariḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5373: kanyāyāṃ tu śacīpatiḥ surageṇairvandyastadottiṣṭhate durgā caiva tulāgame samadhike śeṣāstadanye surāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5379: dvirāṣāḍhaḥ sa vijñeyo viṣṇuḥ svapiti karkaṭe //
GSD36mvir_sau:5383: ityādistu gauṇo 'tra na grāhya iti bahavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5393: bāle vā yadi vā vṛddhe śukre vāstaṃ gate ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5403: mauñjībandho 'ṅganānāṃ pratiniyamavidhirvāstudevapratiṣṭhā varjyāḥ sadbhiḥ prayatnāt tridaśapatigurau siṃharāśisthiteca // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5406: muṇḍanaṃ copavāsaṃ ca gautamyāṃ siṃhage ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5407: kanyāgate tu kṛṣṇāyāṃ na tu tattīravāsinām //
GSD36mvir_sau:5413: śaiśavaṃ prāk tu pañcāhaṃ paścāddaśadinaṃ smṛtam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5414: śaiśavaṃ vārddhakaṃ pakṣaṃ prāk paścācca bṛhaspateḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5421: bahavau darśitāḥ kālā ye bālye vārddhake 'pi ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5425: śukro guruḥ prāk parataśca bālo vindhye daśāvantiṣu saptarātram /
GSD36mvir_sau:5426: vaṅgeṣu hūṇeṣu ca ṣaṭ ca pañca śeṣe ca deśe tridinaṃ vadanti //
GSD36mvir_sau:5430: na tyaktavyaṃ gayāśrāddhaṃ siṃhasthe ca bṛhaspatau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5437: surāsurejyāstamaye 'pi tīrthe yātrāvidhiḥ saṅkramaṇe ca śastaḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5443: darśaśrāddhaṃ tu yat proktaṃ pārvaṇaṃ tat prakīrttitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5444: aparāhṇe pitṝṇāṃ ca tatra dānaṃ praśasyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5462: iti mātsyānusārāttarpaṇamevocyate na tu piṇḍapitṛyajña iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5463: manuvacane pitṛyajñapadena tarpaṇasya grahaṇe piṇḍānvāhāryapadasya nāmadheyatvānupapatteḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5468: tacca na medhātithyuktaṃ pañcamahāyajñāntargatapitṛyajñarūpaṃ tarpaṇaṃ tasya śrāddhadine prasaṅgasiddhatvana tatpaścādbhāvavidhānānupapatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5470: tatpaścāddhāvo 'pi ca yadyapi snātasya śrāddhavidhānāttarpaṇasya ca snānāṅgatvāt prāpta eva tathāpi--
GSD36mvir_sau:5472: śrāddhaṃ vā pitṛyajñaḥ syāt pitryo balirathāpi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5473: iti vacanoktatriprakārapitṛyajñaprāptau jalatarpaṇapunarvacanaṃ sāgnikasya śrāddhadine pitṛyajñāntaravyāvṛttyarthamiti gauḍāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5474: anye tu snānaprayogāntargatasya tarpaṇasya kātīyānāmeva prāpteranyeṣāṃ snānaprayogāntarbhāve pramāṇābhāvāt prasajyeta kadācicchrāddhottaraṃ tarpaṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5475: ataśca tanniyamārthatve sambhavati parisaṅkhayāvidhyayogājjalatarpaṇottarabhāva eva matsyapurāṇavākye niyamyata ityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5478: tādṛśaṃ ca tat piṇḍapitṛyajñādhikāriṇaḥ sāgnikasyaiva sambhavatīti tadbiṣayamevedaṃ jhandogapariśiṣṭavacanaṃ manuvacanaṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5479: na tu sarvaviṣayam itarān prati tatsamākhyāsambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5480: ata eva pariśiṣṭokto vāsaratṛtīyāṃśarūpo 'parāṅṇaḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñādhikāriṇa āhitāgnereva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5481: “nātisandhyāsamīpata”ityapi ca dināntyamuhūrta eva taṃ prati niṣidhyate na tu sāyāhnarūpastrimuhūrtaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5485: ayaṃ ca pariśiṣṭoktaḥ kālavidhiryeṣāṃ candradarśanavati pratipaddine darśeṣṭerniṣedhasteṣāmeveti pariśiṣṭaprakāśakāraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5486: tena tādṛśānuṣṭhānakarttṝn sāgnikān prati yā gakālānurodhenāmāvāsyā parisiṣṭānusāreṇa mirṇīyate
GSD36mvir_sau:5488: candrakṣaye tu prāśastyamātraṃ”kṣīṇe rājani śasyate”iti vacanāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5491: amāvāsyāṣṭameṃ'śe ca punaḥ kila bhavedaṇuḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5501: tadanta eva kṣayameti kṛtsna eva jyotiścakravido vadanti //
GSD36mvir_sau:5508: tṛtīyayā caturthabhāgonatvāt tribhāgamātrāvaśiṣṭayā kalayā paridṛśyo 'nayorapi amāvāsyayorādyayāme na jāyeta kintu itaramāsavadatrānayoraṇyāmāvāsyayoḥ kṣaya ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5512: atrāparāhṇavyāptau trimuhūrtādhikavṛttikṣayābhāvena dine kṛtsnakālavyāptiritaradine tadasparśena ekadeśavyāptyā vā bhavati tatra tadasparśacaturdaśyapekṣayāmāvāsyāyāḥ sāmyena vṛddhyā kṣayeṇa vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5513: tatra yā tāvat pūrvedyureva kṛtsnakālavyāpinī paredyuśca tadekadeśamapi na spṛśāti sā pūrvaiva
GSD36mvir_sau:5514: yāpi tādṛsyevottaratra tade kadeśavyāpinī sāpi pūrvaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5515: paraṃ yadi yajanīyadine candradarśanādekadeśa vyāptidina eva yāgaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5516: yadi tu tithivṛddhyā candrādarśanāt pratipadyeva yāgastadā ekadeśavyāptidina eva kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5519: yā tu pūrvedyurevaikadeśabyāpina sā sutarā pūrvā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5523: yā tu paredyureva kutsnakālavyāpinī pūrvedyustadekadeśasparśena tadasparśena vā vidyamānā sottaraiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:5524: yā tu dinadvaye 'pi vaiṣamyeṇaikadeśavyāpinī sā yaivādhikā saiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5525: yā tu dinadvaye sāmyenaikadeśavyāpinī sā yadi kṣayeṇa tādṛśī tadā”yadā
GSD36mvir_sau:5526: caturdaśīyāmaṃ”iti pūrvādāhṛtakṣīyamāṇavākyāt pūrvaiva, yadi tu vṛddhyā
GSD36mvir_sau:5532: evaṃ yadā sāmyena tādṛsī tadāpi darśanādarśanakṛta eva nirṇayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5533: yadā ca keṣucitpakṣeṣu caturdaśīmiśrāmāyāmanuṣṭhānaṃ prāpnoti tadā yadi amāpratīkṣayā sarvānuṣṭhānaṃ sambhavati tadā sā pratīkṣaṇīyā no ceccatuddeśyāmapi sarvamanuṣṭheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5536: dinadvaye 'pyarāhṇavyāptau kṣaye pūrvā vṛddhau sāmye ca parā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5538: kṣaye pūrvā parā vṛddhau sāmya'pi ca parā smṛtā //
GSD36mvir_sau:5548: strībhiḥ śūdraiḥ kuhūḥ kāryā tathā cānagnikairdvijaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5563: aṣṭakā ityetaccāśvalāyanamate śrāddhahomayoḥ kātyāyanamate ca homamātrasya nāmadheyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5568: tathāpi sa”dravyaṃ brāhmaṇasampattiḥ”iti vadāśvalāyanoktasya kālasya lakṣaṇayā bodhakaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5572: evañca varṣe pañca aṣṭakā iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:5573: āśvalāyanastu bhādrāṣṭakāyā māghyāvarṣamiti saṃjñāntaraṃ paraṃ kṛtavān /
GSD36mvir_sau:5575: evañcāśvalāyanīyairbhādrakṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ paurāṇāṣṭakā mādhyāvarṣaṃ ca tantreṇānuṣṭheyamiti nyāyavidaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5578: caturaṣṭako hemanta ityetacca triṛtuḥ saṃvatsara itye tatpakṣābhiprāyeṇa /
GSD36mvir_sau:5580: viṣṇvādismṛtau yatra tisro 'ṣṭakāstisro 'nvaṣṭakā ityetattrayāṇāmupādānaṃ tatra taddhemantagatānāmeva
GSD36mvir_sau:5584: aindṣāṃ tu prathamāyāṃ ca śākaiḥ santarpayetpitṝn /
GSD36mvir_sau:5589: pauṣe kṛṣṇāṣṭakāyāṃ tu śākaiḥ santarpayet pitṝn /
GSD36mvir_sau:5590: itibrahmapurāṇavacanāntarāt pauṣakṛṣṇāṣṭakāyāṃ śākasantarpaṇokteḥ pauṣamāghaphālgunagatā eva tisra uktā bhavanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5591: kūrmapurāṇe tu pauṣādigā eva tisra iti spaṣṭamuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5597: evaṃ ca brahmapurāṇaviṣṇudharmottarayoḥ phālgunakṛṣṇāṣṭamīvyatiriktā hemantaśiśirayostisraḥ uktā iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5600: kṛṣṇapakṣe variṣṭhā hi pūrvā caindrī vibhāvyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:5603: śākaiḥ kāryā tṛtīyā syādeṣa dravyagato vidhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5604: yā cāpyanyā caturthī syāttāṃ ca kuryādviśeṣataḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5607: śākaṃ tu phālgunāṣṭamyāṃ svayaṃ patnyapi vā pacet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5608: ityanena phālgunāṣṭamyāḥ śākāṣṭakātvena pratyabhijñānānmārgaśīrṣāṣṭakāparityāgena tisra uktāḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5614: caturthī tu bhādrakṛṣṇāṣṭamyeva na tu phālgunakṛṣṇāṣṭamī
GSD36mvir_sau:5616: gobhilavat prathamata eva catasra iti na vadediti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5618: aśaktau tu”ekasyāṃ vā”ityāśvalāyanasūtroktaikā purāṇoktā ca bhādrakṛṣṇāṣṭamīti dve /
GSD36mvir_sau:5620: “yā māghyāḥ paurṇamāsyā upariṣṭāt dvyaṣṭakā tasyāmaṣṭamī jyeṣṭhayā
GSD36mvir_sau:5624: sā prakāradvayena vyākhyātā tadbhāṣyakṛtā malamāsatvena khaṇḍatithisattvena vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5625: jyeṣṭhayā sambadhyata iti pradarśanārthaṃ na tu yadaiva jyeṣṭhāyuktā tadaivopādeyā nānyadetyevamarthamiti
GSD36mvir_sau:5636: moghastasya bhavelloko labdhaṃ cāsya vinaśyati // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5638: āsvalāyanena ca pūrvedyuḥ pitṛbhyo dadyāditi aṣṭakāśrāddhātpūrvedyuḥ śrāddhāntaramuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5667: putraḥ svayameva kuryāt nāniṣṭvā tu pitṝn śrāddhe karma vaidikamārabhet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5669: atra nāniṣṭvetivacanenaiva sarvatra nāndīśrāddhaprāptau yajñodvāhapratiṣṭhāsvityādipunarvacanaṃ niyamārtham /
GSD36mvir_sau:5671: na cotpattiviniyogābhyāṃ sāptadaśya iva sārthakatobhayorapi viniyojakatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:5685: śrāddhatrayaṃ tu kurvīta vaiśvadevaṃ ca tāntrikam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5689: tato mātāmahānāṃ ca vṛddhau śrāddhatrayaṃ smṛtam //
GSD36mvir_sau:5713: śastreṇa tu hatā ye vai tebhyastatra pradīyate // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5719: śrāddhe praśastāstithayo yathaitā na tathetarāḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5722: tatrāpyasāmarthye kātyāyanaḥ, aparapakṣe kurvītorddhvraṃ vā caturthyā yadahaḥ sampadyeteti
GSD36mvir_sau:5730: dviścaturvā yathāśrāddhaṃ māse māse dine dine //
GSD36mvir_sau:5733: tatrāpi kanyākumbhavṛṣārke anena vidhinā śrāddhaṃ trirabdasyeha nirvapet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5741: ata eva gautamenānekān kālānabhidhāyoktam--kālanithamaḥ śaktita iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5749: tribhāgahīnaṃ pakṣaṃ vā tribhāgaṃ tvarddhameva vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:5756: ahorātreṇa caikena sāvano divasaḥ smṛtaḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5758: evaṃ caikasminneva dine śrāddhayogyatithidvayalābhe śrāddhadvayaṃ tithivṛddhau ca śrāddhāvṛttiḥ kṛtatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5762: tribhāgahīnaṃ = tṛtīyabhāgahīnaṃ pañcamīmārabhya, tribhāgaṃ = tṛtīyabhāgaṃ daśamīmārabhya
GSD36mvir_sau:5771: yeṣāṃ caturdaśyāṃ śrāddhaṃ nāsti teṣāṃ pañcamyādidaśamyā dikalpau /
GSD36mvir_sau:5778: bhānūpādhyāyastu yeṣāṃ caturdaśyāṃ śrāddhaṃ nāsti teṣāṃ dvādaśyādiḥ kalpaḥ yeṣāṃ tadasti teṣāṃ trayodaśyādirityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:5779: vastutastu asya vākyasyānekakālopadeśamātre tātparyādgurulaghukālopadeśasyārthikatvāduttarottaralaghukālopadeśakatvābhāvāt tribhāgamityatra bhāgitayā buddhisthīkṛtasya
GSD36mvir_sau:5781: 'pi bhāgitayānupasthiteḥ pakṣaviśeṣaṇatvāccārdhapadārthenānvayāyogāt “athāparapakṣe śrāddhaṃ pitṛbhyo dadyātpañcamyādidarśāntamaṣṭamyādidaśamyādi sarvasmiṃśca'; iti gautamaikavākyatayā mūlaśrutikalpanālāghavācca ardhaṃ pakṣārdhamityeva vyākhyānamucitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5782: atra pakṣaśrāddhādikalpānāṃ gurulaghukalpatvenecchāvikalpāsambhavādekādayo tisro deyā itivatphalatāratamyamiti śrāddhavivekaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5783: nitye phalābhāvānna phale tāratamyaṃ kintu śaktyapekṣayā vyavatthito vikalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5784: ekakalpāśrayaṇe ca tadanirvāhena kalpāntarāśrayaṇe tasminprayoge tasyaiva pakṣasya kathañcinnirvāhyatvādvrīhiyavādivaditimiśrāḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5786: nityasyāpi kathāñcitphalavattvācchaktasya laghukalpāśrayaṇe phalābhāvakalpanāyā anyāyyatvāt ṣoḍaśigrahaṇādāvatiprasakteśca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5787: atra ca dine dina iti vīpsāśravaṇāccaturdaśyāmapi pārvaṇaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:5788: kāryaṃ”vajeyitvā caturdaśīm”iti niṣedhastu aparapakṣāntaracaturdaśīviṣaya iti pradīpavivekau
GSD36mvir_sau:5795: yo vai śrāddhaṃ naraḥ kuryādekasminnapi vāsare //
GSD36mvir_sau:5796: tasya saṃvatsaraṃ yāvatsantṛptāḥ pitaro dhruvam / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5798: atra kanyāsaṃsthatvavacanaṃ prāśastyārthaṃ na tu tasyaiva śrāddhakālatvam
GSD36mvir_sau:5800: śrāddhaṃ tatra prakurvīta kanyāṃ gacchatu vā na vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:5803: madhye vā yadi vāpyante yatra kanyāṃ ravirvrajet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5804: sa pakṣaḥ sakalaḥ pūjyaḥ śrāddhaṃ tatra vidhīyate // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5809: nabho vātha nabhasyo vā malamāso yadā bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:5811: iti nāgarakhaṇḍokteḥ saptamapakṣa eva tat nyāyyamityuktaṃ malamāsakartavyanirṇaye /
GSD36mvir_sau:5825: ata eva brahmavāyupurāṇayoḥ paurṇamāsyāditithiṣoḍaśakasya phalamuktamityuktaṃ kāmarūpanibandhe
GSD36mvir_sau:5826: atha vā yadā tithivṛddhyā ṣoḍaśadinātmakaḥ pakṣaḥ syāttadā vṛddhidine 'pi
GSD36mvir_sau:5840: eṣu śrāddhaṃ na kurvīta gṛhī putradhanakṣayāt //
GSD36mvir_sau:5843: prājāpatye ca pauṣṇe ca pitryarkṣe bhārgave tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5844: yastu śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta tasya putro vinaśyati // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5846: prājāpatyaṃ = rohiṇī, pauṣṇe = revatī, pitryaṃ = maghā kvacidasyāpavādo--
GSD36mvir_sau:5849: tathā tithiṃ ca nakṣatraṃ vāraṃ ca na vicārayet / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:5853: yā tithiryasya māsasya mṛtāhe tu pravartate /
GSD36mvir_sau:5854: sā tithiḥ pitṛpakṣe tu pūjanīyā prayatnataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5856: piṇḍaśrāddhaṃ ca kartavyaṃ vicchitiṃ naiva kārayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:5860: atra pratidinaṃ śrāddhakaraṇe nandādi na varjyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5862: naiva nandādi varjyaṃ syānnaiva varjyā caturdaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:5866: caturdaśyāṃ kriyā kāryā anyeṣāṃ tu vigarhitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:5871: śastreṇa tu hatā yevai tebhyastatra pradīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:5874: nandādivarjanaṃ tu pañcamyādipakṣeṣu na bhavati vibhāgādiparimāṇahāniprasaṅgāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5880: ata ūrddhvaṃ tu kanyāyā yānyahāni tu ṣoḍaśa /
GSD36mvir_sau:5884: sūrye kanyāsthite śrāddhaṃ yo na kuryādgṛhāśramī /
GSD36mvir_sau:5886: ityādivacanaiḥ pañcamapakṣanirapekṣameva kanyānimittakaṃ śrāddhāntaraṃ vidhīyate tasya cāparapakṣa eva kanyāsaṅkramaṇe tantraṃ, bhede tu pṛthageva,
GSD36mvir_sau:5887: kanyāyāṃ sakṛdevānuṣṭhānamiti śūlapāṇinoktaṃ, tat vidhimede gauravātpañcamapakṣe ca kanyā saṅkramaṇāvaśyambhāvātkanyopalakṣitasyaiva pañcamapakṣasya śrāddhakālatvopapatteḥ”ādau vā yadi vā
GSD36mvir_sau:5894: sa pakṣaḥ sakalaḥ pūjyaḥ śrāddhaṣoḍaśakaṃ prati /
GSD36mvir_sau:5895: iti karmaṇi saṅkhyāśravaṇaṃ na tadbhedakaṃ tasyaikadeśakanyāsambandhamātreṇāpi sakalapakṣapūjyatvaguṇaparatvena karmotpattiparatvā bhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:5899: evaṃ ca kālabhedātsāyamprātaḥ kālayoḥ sāṅgahomaprayogāvṛttivatsarvāsu tithiṣu sāṅgaśrāddhāvṛttiḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5901: evaṃ ca yadabhyāsapakṣe 'ntedakṣiṇādānaṃ brāhmaṇaikyaṃ ceti hemādriṇoktaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:5904: evañca pakṣaśrāddhe nirvighnatārthaṃ sakṛdeva brāhmaṇaiḥ sahopasaṃvāde kṛte 'pi yadi brāhmaṇānāmāśaucaprāptistadā teṣāṃ tyāga eve /
GSD36mvir_sau:5909: kintvāśaucāpagamottaraṃ sakṛdādipakṣeṇa yathāvanmahālayaśrāddhaṃ kāryaṃ kenāpi pakṣeṇa tasyājātatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:5914: haṃse varṣāsu kanyāsthe śākenāpi gṛhe vasan /
GSD36mvir_sau:5918: atra prāptāprāptavivekenāmāvāsyāyā ūrdhvamarvāk pañcamyā gauṇakālavidhāne tātparyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5928: tāvacchrāddhaṃ pravāñchanti dattaṃ vai pitaraḥ sutaiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:5936: yeyaṃ dīpānvitā rājan! khyātā pañcadaśī bhuvi /
GSD36mvir_sau:5937: tasyāṃ dadyānna ceddattaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vai mahālaye //
GSD36mvir_sau:5939: atra yadyapi kārttikapaurṇamāsyāmapi dīpadānaṃ vihitaṃ tathāpyamāvāsyaiva pañcadaśīśabdena grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:5940: kṛṣṇapakṣasya pitrye praśastatvāt dīpāvalītvena tasyā eva khyātatvācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5945: asyāṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ yena sa gayāśrāddhakṛdbhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:5950: prāpya śrāddhaṃ hi kartavyaṃ madhunā pāyasena ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:5954: trayodaśyāṃ prayatnena varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5959: ityādi śaṅkhabrahmapurāṇamanvādivacaneṣu maghāyuktaiva trayodaśī śrāddhakālatvena yadyapi śrūyate tathāpi kevalāpi sā śrāddhakālaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:5966: api naḥ sa kule bhūyādyo no dadyāttrayodaśīm /
GSD36mvir_sau:5977: iti candrikāsthavākyena śuddhāmabhidhāya maghāyoge prāśastyābhidhā nācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5978: “varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca”ityādau cakārastu na tithyā sahetaretarayogārthaḥ kintu parasparanipekṣaikakriyānvayalakṣaṇasamuccayārthaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:5980: eṣa no dāsyati śrāddhaṃ varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:5982: na caivaṃ trayodaśyāṃ prayatnena varṣāsu maghāsu ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5983: ityādau varṣāyā api pṛthakśrāddhakālatā syāditi vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:5988: prāpya śrāddhaṃ hi kartavyaṃ madhunā pāyasena ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:5990: api naḥ sakule bhūyādyo no dadyāttrayodaśīm //
GSD36mvir_sau:5996: eṣa no dāsyati śrāddhaṃ varṣāsu ca maghāsu ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:5997: iti kevalamaghāpratipādakavasiṣṭhavākyasya cārthavādatvātkathaṃcitpratyakṣavidhyekavākyatve ca sambhavati svatantravidhyantarakalpanānaicityā tkevalavākyānāṃ lakṣaṇayā śrutikalpanālāghavāya yogaviṣayatvakalpanamevocitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6001: tarhi tata eva lāghavādgajacchāyākhyayogayuktāyāmeva trayodaśyāṃ kuñjaraprākchāya eva ca deśe śrāddhaṃ syānnānyatra /
GSD36mvir_sau:6002: sarvopasaṃhāreṇa viśiṣṭaviṣayiṇyā eva śruteḥ kalpane lāghavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6020: prajāmiṣṭāṃ yaśaḥ svargamārogyaṃ ca dhanaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6021: nṝṇāṃ śrāddhe sadā prītāḥ prayacchanti pitāmahāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6024: kṛṣṇapakṣe trayodaśyāṃ yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kurute naraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6030: na tṛptāstatra ye yasya prajāṃ hiṃsanti tasya te // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6036: yadvā naiṃkavargasya pārvaṇamātraṃ na kartavyaṃ kintu sarveṣāṃ pitṛpitṛvyādīnāmapi pārvaṇaikoddiṣṭāni kāryāṇītyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6042: mahālayatrayodaśīśrāddhaṃ ca yugādiśrāddhādabhinnaṃ yugāditvāvinābhāvena tadupasthiteriti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:6045: sasantāno naiva kuryānnityaṃ te kavayo viduḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6046: itibṛhatparāśareṇa viśiṣyāparapakṣatrayodaśīśrāddhe piṇḍaniṣedhāttadviṣayaḥ śrāddhaniṣedha ityadoṣaḥ kāmyaśrāddhaviṣayo vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6049: iti kāmyaśrāddhaṃ prakṛtya doṣokteḥ putravadgṛhasthaviṣayo vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6050: trayodaśyāṃ tu vai śrāddhaṃ na kuryāt putravāngṛhī /
GSD36mvir_sau:6056: atra trayodaśīmahālayamadhāśrāddhānāṃ tantraṃ yugādiśrāddhabhede tu tasyāpi /
GSD36mvir_sau:6062: caturdaśyāṃ kriyāḥ kāryā anyeṣāṃ tu vigarhitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6070: yuvānaḥ pitaro yasya mṛtāḥ śastreṇa vā hatāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6075: evaṃ ca kṛtapatyanugamanāyā api caturdaśīśrāddhaṃ bhavatyeveti gauḍāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6076: anye tu avaidhamaraṇaṃ caturdaśīśrāddhaprayojakaṃ prāyo 'naśanābhyāṃ tu vidhito 'pi vipannānāṃ bhavatyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6104: śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ tena samāḥ sahasraṃ rahasyametat pitaro vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6109: nigamaḥ, aparaṇkṣe yadahaḥ sampadyetāmāvāsyā yā tu viśeṣeṇāṣṭakā
GSD36mvir_sau:6114: pātraṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ prāpya sadyaḥ śrāddhaṃ vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:6128: viṣuve sati saṅkrāntyāṃ vyatīpāte ca putrakāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6140: ye syuḥ pitāmahādūrddhvaṃ te tu nāndīmukhāstrayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6144: āṣāḍhyāmatha karttikyāṃ māghyāṃ trīn pañca vā dvijān /
GSD36mvir_sau:6164: śrāddhasya pūjitaḥ kālo bhavetsa eva vā punaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6167: tatra kātyāyanaḥ--atha kāmyāni bhavanti striyo 'pratirūpāḥ pratipadi,
GSD36mvir_sau:6168: dvitīyāyāṃ strījanma, aśvāstṛtīyāyāṃ, caturthyāṃ kṣudrapaśavaḥ, putrāḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:6169: pañcamyāṃ, ṣaṣṭhyāṃ dyūtarddhiḥ, kṛṣiḥ saptamyām, aṣṭamyāṃ vāṇijyam,
GSD36mvir_sau:6170: ekaśaphaṃ navamyāṃ, gāvo daśamyāṃ, paricārakā ekādaśyāṃ, dvādaśyāṃ dhanadhānye kupyam, jñātiśraiṣṭhayaṃ trayodaśyāṃ yuvānastasminmriyante
GSD36mvir_sau:6176: svargaṃ hyapatyamojaśca śauryaṃ kṣetraṃ balaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6180: vidyāṃ dhanaṃ bhiṣaksiddhiṃ kupyaṃ gā apyajāvikam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6187: sarvānkāmānbaudhe, vidyāmabhīṣṭāṃ jaive, dhanaṃ śaukre, jīvitaṃ śanaiścare /
GSD36mvir_sau:6192: nabhasyamāsasya tamisrapakṣe trayodaśī pañcadaśī ca māghe //
GSD36mvir_sau:6194: pānīyamapyatra tilairvimiśraṃ dadyāt pitṛbhyaḥ prayato manuṣyaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6195: śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ tena samāḥ sahasraṃ rahasyametanmunayo vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6199: navamī kārttike śuklā tṛtīyā mādhave sitā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6200: amāvāsyā tapasye ca nabhasye ca trayodaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:6207: vaiśākhasya tṛtīyā yā navamī kārttikasya tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:6214: maghābhiḥ sahitā yā tu nabhasye tu trayodaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:6220: etāścatasrastithayo yugādyā dattaṃ kulaṃ cākṣayamāsu vindyāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6221: yuge yuge varṣaśatena yacca yugādikāle divasena tadbhavet // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6224: vaiśākhasya tṛtīyā yā samā kṛtayugena tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:6225: navamī kārttike yā tu tretāyugasamā tu sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:6226: māghe pañcadaśī rājan! kalikālasamā tu sā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6230: tadā tu kriyate kiñcitsarvaṃ koṭiguṇaṃ bhavet / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6232: kṛtayugena sameti sampūrṇakṛtayugadharmaprāptirasyāmekasyāṃ tithau bhavatītyāha hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6236: ekārāśau sameṣyanti pravekṣyati tadā kṛtam // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6238: atra ca paurṇamāsī tu māghasyeti bhaviṣyavacanāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:6239: māghe ca paurṇamāsyāṃ tu ghoraṃ kaliyugaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6244: śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ tena samāḥ sahasraṃ rahasyametanmunayo vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6245: iti viṣṇupurāṇāt pitṛkarmaprādhānyāt ābdike pitṛkārye ca māsaścandramasaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6247: māghāsite pañcadaśī kadācidupaiti yogaṃ yadi vāruṇena /
GSD36mvir_sau:6248: ṛkṣeṇa kālaḥ sa paraḥ pitṝṇāṃ na hyalpapuṇyairnṛpa! labhyate 'sau //
GSD36mvir_sau:6249: itimakarāditye tadasambhavāt kumbhāditye ca sambhavāt asminpakṣe ca pūrṇimāmāvāsyayorapi yugāditvasambhavāt cāndramāsayugādayo grāhyā iti
GSD36mvir_sau:6253: iti ṛṣyaśṛṅgavacanātsauramāsagatā eva grāhyā iti hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6254: etāstu pitṛkarmasu aparāhṇavyāpinyo grāhyā daivike pūrvāhnavyāpinyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6261: dve śukle dve tathā kṛṣṇe yugādyāḥ kavayo viduḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6262: śukle pūrvāhnike grāhye kṛṣṇe caivāparāhṇike // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6267: dinarkṣaṃ revatī yatra gamanaṃ caiva rāśiṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:6270: grahaṇaṃ viṣuve caiva saumye vā mihiro yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:6271: saptamī śuklakṛṣṇā vā yugāntadivasaṃ viduḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6273: saumya udagayane yadi śuklā kṛṣṇā vā saptamī grahaṇaviṣuvottarāyaṇopetā sūryavāropetā tadā yugāntadivasa ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6289: tṛtīyā caiva māghasya tathā bhādrapadasya ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:6292: śrāvaṇe cāṣṭamī kṛṣṇā tathāṣāḍhe ca pūrṇimā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6293: kārttikī phālganī caitrī jyeṣṭhā pañcadaśīṃ sitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:6296: pitṝnuddisya yo dadyātsa gatiṃ paramāṃ labhet /
GSD36mvir_sau:6297: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ pitṛtarpaṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:6303: āśvine daśamī śuklā śrāvaṇī kārttikī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6309: atha kalpādayo rājan! kathyante tithayaḥ śumāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6310: yāsu śrāddhe kṛte tṛptiḥ pitṝṇāmakṣayā bhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:6320: paurṇamāsyāṃ tu tasyaiva kaurmaḥ pravavṛte nṛpa! /
GSD36mvir_sau:6338: ekādaśyāṃ tu śuklāyāṃ māghe vyānaḥ prajagmivān /
GSD36mvir_sau:6350: śuklā trayodaśī māghe kārttikasya tu saptamau //
GSD36mvir_sau:6355: vaiśākhaphālgunayoḥ kṛṣṇatṛtīyā caitrapañcamī tadamāvāsyeti catasraḥ kṛṣṇāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6364: śataghnaṃ tattu saṅkāntyāṃ śataghnaṃ viṣuve tataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6388: sūryācandramasoḥ krāntisāmyaṃ jyotiḥśāstragamyaṃ vyatīpāta iti kalpataruḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:6394: pañcānanasthau gurubhūmiputrau meṣe raviḥ syādyadi śuklapakṣe /
GSD36mvir_sau:6395: pāśābhidhānā karabheṇa yuktā tithirvyatīpāta itīha yogaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6396: asmin hi gobhūmihiraṇyavāsasāṃ dānena sarvaṃ ca vihāya pāpam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6405: vyatīpāte vaidhṛtau ca dattasyānto na vidyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:6416: (*)na tau vāhyau mahārāja! vinā śrāddhaṃ kathaṃcana //
GSD36mvir_sau:6426: śuklapakṣe navaṃ dhānyaṃ pakvaṃ jñātvā suśobhanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6431: kṛṣṇapakṣe navānnaṃ tu na kuryānmānavo yataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6432: pitarastaṃ na gṛhṇanti dātā ca narakaṃ vrajet //
GSD36mvir_sau:6436: trijanmani = janmatithau janmanakṣatre janmacandre veti kāmarūpīye /
GSD36mvir_sau:6439: trayodaśīṃ janmadinaṃ ca nandāṃ janmarkṣatārāṃ sitavāsaraṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6449: hastasvātipunarvasū mṛgaśiraḥpuṣyānurādhā tathā mūlāyāṃ śravaṇe ca revatidhane citrānale vāruṇe
GSD36mvir_sau:6450: brāhme śakraviśākhayośca turage saumyendujīvādike candre śobhanatārake ca śubhadaṃ śrāddhaṃ navānne kṛtam //
GSD36mvir_sau:6454: śyāmākairityetadvānaprasthaparam”gṛhamedhī hi yavābhyāṃ śaradvasantayoryajeta śyāmākairvanī varṣāsu”iti śruteriti kāmarūpīye /
GSD36mvir_sau:6470: jyeṣṭhasyetyanenāputrasyāpi kaniṣṭhasya bhrāturnāvaśyakaṃ śrāddhamiti gamyate na punaḥ sarvathā niṣedhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6476: sajātīyatvaṃ ca titherna pratipadāditvamātreṇa kintu tanmāsapakṣasajātīyamāsapakṣagatatvena ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6478: pratyakṣaṃ tu tathābhūtaṃ kṣayāhaṃ tasya taṃ viduḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6484: iti bhaviṣyapurāṇe vatsarāntagrahaṇānna maraṇāghikaraṇakatitheḥ śrāddhādhikaraṇatvaṃ kintu vatsarāntatithisajātīyatvanirūpakatvameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6485: tena yatkena ciducyate pratisaṃvatsaramityaviśeṣaśravaṇādvarṣe bhavaṃ vārṣikamitivyutpannasamākhyābalācca maraṇādhikaraṇakatitherapi śrāddhādhikaraṇātvam ataśca sāṃvatsarikaṃ maraṇādhikaraṇatithāvapi prāptam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6490: mṛte 'hani tu kartavyaṃ pratimāsaṃ tu vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:6494: ata eva tatraiva māse bhavaṃ māsikamityeva samākhyāvyutpattiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6495: sāṃvatsarike tu uktavākye vatsarāntagrahamādvarṣānte bhavaṃ vārṣikamityeva samākhyāvyutpattiḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:6496: atra ca”vatsarānte mṛtāhani”ityatra savatsarānte jāte mṛtāhanītyartho
GSD36mvir_sau:6499: atra hi na saṃvatsarasya grahaṇaṃ tithivṛddhihra /
GSD36mvir_sau:6505: ataśca cāndrasaṃvatsarasya pūrvatithyantatvena dvitayivatsarādyabhūtāyā mṛtatitheḥ pūrvavatsarāntatvābhāvānna vatsarānte mṛtāhanītisāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ kintu vatsarānte jāte mṛtāhanītyeva vacanārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6506: tena dvitīyavatsarādyamṛtatithau śrāddhaṃ kāryam iti dākṣiṇātyasammato
GSD36mvir_sau:6508: śūlapāṇistu māse bhavaṃ varṣe bhavamityeva samākhyāvyutpattiḥ na caivaṃ sarvādyamṛtatithau māsikasāṃvatsarikādikaraṇāpattiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6513: prathamavārṣikam”ādyamekādaśo 'hani”iti tu māsikādbhinnameva sarvaikodiṣṭaprakṛtibhūtaṃ śrāddhaṃ vidhatte na punarādyamāsikasyotkarṣamityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:6520: śrāddhavighne samutpanne tithilope ca vā punaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6525: yāṃ tithiṃ samanuprāpya udayaṃ yāti bhāskaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6527: yāṃ tithi samanuprāpya astaṃ yāti divākaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6529: itidevalādivacanādyathā karmakāleṣvavidyamānāyā api titheḥ sampūr ṇatvakalpanayā grahaṇaṃ na tathā naraṇādhikaraṇāhorātre trimuhūrtādirūpeṇa udayāstamayavarttinyāstithermaraṇasambandhitayā grahaṇam, kintu--
GSD36mvir_sau:6533: tatra yasya maraṇatithirmaraṇapakṣaśca na jñāyate tanmāsastu jñāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:6540: atra ca yadyapi mṛtāhasyaivājñānamuktaṃ tathāpi pakṣajñāne vakṣyamāṇarītyā tattyāgasyānunitatvāt śuklapakṣagataikādaśyāmeva sāṃvatsarikaśrāddhaprāpteḥ pakṣājñāne 'pyetasya
GSD36mvir_sau:6547: atra ca sāmānyavacanātpitṛvyādīnāmapi mṛtāhādyajñāne ayameva nirṇaya ucitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6549: na jānāti dinaṃ yastu māsaṃ vātha narādhipa! /
GSD36mvir_sau:6550: mṛtayostu mahāprājña! pitrostu sa kathaṃ naraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6556: atra viśeṣata itiśravaṇāt śuklaikādaśyāmapi śrāddhaṃ bhavatīti gacchuklapakṣaikādaśyā eva mukhyatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6557: yadi tu sa na jñāyate tadā kṛṣṇapakṣasya pitrye praśastatvena viśeṣata ityuktyā ca kṛṣṇaikādaśyeva mukhyaḥ kālaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6566: yadā tu maraṇamāso na jñāyate dinaṃ tu jñāyate tadā--
GSD36mvir_sau:6568: dinameva tu jānāti māsaṃ naiva tu yo naraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6571: tadā hyāṣāḍhake māsi māghe vā taddinaṃ bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:6574: yadā tu trayāṇāmapi maraṇasambandhimāsapakṣatithīnāmajñānaṃ tadā yadi prasthānottarameva jīvanavārttā na jñātā tatra prasthānatithyādisajātīyamāsatithipakṣā grāhyāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6577: dinamāsau na vijñātau maraṇasya yadā punaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6586: yadā tu trayāṇāmapi prasthānatithyādisamānajātīyānāṃ māsapakṣatithīnāmajñānaṃ yasya ca prasthānottaraṃ bahukālaṃ jīvanavārttā śrutā paścācca maraṇaniścayaśravaṇaṃ tasyākṛtapretakāryasya śravaṇatithyādisajātīyamāsapakṣatithayo grāhyāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6591: ekadvyajñānakṛto yo nirṇayaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ so 'trāpi draṣṭavya iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6592: atra ca yaddine maraṇaniścayaśravaṇaṃ taddine 'pi kṛtapretakāryasya ābdikakaraṇaṃ veditavyam. akṛtapretakāryasya tu maraṇaniścayaśravaṇottaraṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:6597: tena kāryamaṃmāyāṃ tu śrāddhaṃ māghe 'tha mārgake /
GSD36mvir_sau:6602: pratyavdaṃ tu tathābhūtaṃ kṣayāhaṃ tasya taṃ viduḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6603: iti vyāsavacanena pakṣasyāpi mṛtāhopapādakatvena pakṣajñāne tattyāgasya kartumaśakyatvāt bhādrādimāsīyaśuklaikādaśyāmeva prāpteramāgrahaṇānupapattiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6607: anuvādakatvādeva ca mukhyakṛṣṇaikādaśīrūpagauṇaśuklaikādaśīrūpakālāntaropalakṣakatvamamāśabdasya māghādipadasya ca bādrādyupalakṣakatvaṃ na doṣāya /
GSD36mvir_sau:6608: ata eva smārttena svamatānusāreṇa eta dvacanavyākhyānāvasare kṛṣṇaikādaśyabhāve evāmāvasyā grāhyetyuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6609: athaṃ ca neti maraṇapravāsamaraṇaśravaṇādinā kenāpi cihnenetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6610: evaṃ ca maraṇasambandhimāsajñāne ca maraṇamāsīyapravāsatithirgrāhyetyādyapi sūcitaṃ bhavati
GSD36mvir_sau:6611: atra ca maraṇasambandhitithyādyajñāne prasthānasambandhino maraṇaśravaṇasambandhinaśca tithyāderjñāne prasthānasambandhitithyādikameva grāhyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6614: vastutastu śravaṇadine maraṇasya paramparayā mṛtāhasambandhāvagateḥ mukyatayāvagatasya sāvatsarikatithisajātīyatiṣyavacchedakatvarūpasya sambandhaviśeṣasya bādhe 'pi arthādavagatasya sambandhasāmānyasya sati
GSD36mvir_sau:6615: sambhave ānubandhyāgnīṣomayoḥ sādyaske prakṛtidṛṣṭapaurvāparyamātrasyeva tyāgāyogāt maraṇasambandhitithyādyajñāne śravaṇasanbandhitithyādikameva grāhyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6617: maraṇasyeti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sambandhamātravācitvena śravaṇadvārakatve 'pi na kadācit kṣātiḥ”saptadaśāratnirvājapeyasya”itivat
GSD36mvir_sau:6618: (a. 3 pā. 1 adhi. 9) tasmāt maraṇasambandhitithyādyajñāne śravaṇasambandhitithyādigrahaṇaṃ tadajñāne ca
GSD36mvir_sau:6620: yattvatra vācaspatinā māsasyājñānena kāryaṃ mūlābhāvādityuktaṃ, tat kālārdaśehamādrismārttabhaṭṭācāryādidhṛtapūrvoktabṛhaspatyādivacanairmāsājñāne bhādrādimāsānāṃ vihitatvādupekṣyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6621: yasya tu ajñātadeśagatasya jīvanamaraṇānyatarānirdhāraṇātpañcadaśavarṣāṇi pratīkṣya paścātpratikṛtidāhādyaurdhvadehikaṃ kriyate tasya dāhasambandhitithyādisajāṃtīyā māsapakṣatithathayo grāhyāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6624: pitari proṣite yasya na vārttā naiva cāgatiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6636: jīvan yadi sa āgacchet ghṛtakumbhe niyojayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:6641: athaindrāgnena paśunā giriṃ gatvātha tatra tu //
GSD36mvir_sau:6645: kecittu pañcāśardvaṣanyūnavayaskasya pañcadaśavarṣapratīkṣā tadadhikavayaskasya dvādaśeti vyavasthāmāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6655: deye pitṝṇāṃ śrāddhe tu āśaucaṃ jāyate yadi /
GSD36mvir_sau:6656: tadāśauce vyatīte tu teṣāṃ śrāddhaṃ vidhīyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:6658: sā tithistasya kartavyā na tvanyā vai kadācana // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6663: dānaṃ pratigraho homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ pitṛkarma ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6668: pretapiṇḍakriyāpadasya pretaikoddiṣṭaparatvātpretaikoddiṣṭasyāśaiṃce deyatvasiddho tadvikāre sāṃvatsarikaikoddiṣṭe 'pi atideśena deyatve prāpte ṛṣyaṅgavacanenāśaucāntakālavidhiriti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6673: vastutastu pretapiṇḍakriyāpadaṃ na pretaikoddiṣṭaparaṃ tatparatve lakṣaṇāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6675: ataśca pretaikoddiṣṭasyāpi āśauce adeyatvānnātideśena sāṃvatsarikaikoddiṣṭe deyatvaprasaktirasti
GSD36mvir_sau:6677: anye tu na deya itiviśeṣaṇena pārvaṇādīnāmāśaucānte akattevyatā kintu kāmadhenau mṛtāhaprakaraṇa evaitasya ṛṣyaśṛṅgavacanasya likhitatvādākare 'pi mṛtāhaprakaraṇa evaitadityunnīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:6688: atra hi mṛtāhapadaṃ śrāddhavighne ityasyāpi viśeṣaṇaṃ madhyagatatvena viśeṣāgrahaṇātsākāṅkṣatvācca
GSD36mvir_sau:6689: atha vā yadyapi mṛtāhapadamavijñāt ityanenaiva sambadhyate tathāpi upasthitatvāttatratya eva vighno bodhyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6692: na caikādaśyādikālapuraskāreṇātra deyatvāvagamānna ṛṣyaśṛṅgavacanenāśau cāntakālavidhisambhava itivācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6693: asya satyapi deyatāviśeṣaparatve ārthikasya deyatāsāmānyasyopajīvanenātra kālāntaravidhiḥ sambhavatyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6698: evaṃ ca atratyasya ekādaśyādikālasya”na tvanyā vai kadācana”iti
GSD36mvir_sau:6700: niṣedhārthamupajīvyasya tasya sarvathā pratiṣeddhumaśakyatvena pratiṣedhasya sambhavadviṣayatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:6703: etena yatkenaciduktamāśaucavighne āśaucāntatithau deyaṃ na kṛṣṇaikādaśī pratīkṣaṇīyā tasyā”na tvanyā vai kadācana”ityanena pratiṣedhāt vignāntaraviṣayatvamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6706: ekādaśyāṃ na karttvayaṃ darśe vāpi vicakṣaṇaiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:6714: tatra pramādādinā śrāddhāsambhave amāvāsyāyāṃ, tasyāḥ prāgudāhṛtakālādarśaṃdhṛtagobhilavacanenāśaucapuraskāreṇa vihitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6715: tatrāpyasambhave kṛṣṇekādaśyāṃ laghuhārītavacane vighnasāmānye tasyā vihitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6716: tatrāpyasambhave śuklaikādaśyāṃ tasyā api viśeṣata i tyuttyānukalpatvena sūcitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6717: yattvatra vācaspatinā laghuhārītavacanasya āśaucātiriktamṛtāhapratibandhaviṣayatvamuktaṃ tat”na tvanyā vai kadācana”ityaprāptakālapratiṣedhānupapatterayuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6719: iyaṃ cāśaucavighne tadantakartavyatā puraṣaprayatnānapaneyāśaucavighne na tu puruṣaprayatnāpaneye tasya śrāddhāharvihitaśaucādevāpagamāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6720: tathā ca kṣatāśaucasyāpi puruṣaprayatnānapaneyatvāt kṣatāśaucena vighne tadanta eva kāryamititi kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:6721: anyetu kṣatāśaucasya āśaucatve pramāṇābhāvāt āśaucitve 'pi vā--
GSD36mvir_sau:6723: itipūrvodāhṛtavacanena jananamaraṇāśauca eva tadantakartavyatāvidhānāt na kṣatāśauce tadante kāryaṃ kintu ekādaśyādāvevetyāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6724: evañca yanmate tadantakartavyatā tanmate pūrvadinakartavyaniyamasyāpi uttaredyurevānuṣṭhānaṃ pūrvadine nirvraṇībhāvasaṃśayena pradhānakartavyatvāniścayāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6730: evañca yadbācaspatinoktaṃ vraṇāśaucasthale pūrvadinakṛtyamanaṅgemeva nirvraṇībhāvasaṃśayena pūrvadine pradhānakartavyatvāniścayāduttaradine ca tanniścaye pūrvāhṇarūpakālābhāvātsphyāśleṣe jyāyāmāvāhanasyeva bādha iti,
GSD36mvir_sau:6733: yadapi ca dṛṣṭāntakathanaṃ tadapi daśame āvāhanasya nimittānantaraṃ kartavyatvābhidhānāt ākarājñānamūlam
GSD36mvir_sau:6734: evañca jananamaraṇāśaucāntyadinottaradine śrāddhakaraṇe taddina eva pūrvadinakṛtyānuṣṭhānaṃ pūrvadine āśaucasattvena anadhikārāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6735: yāni tu arthaluptāni ekabhaktādīni teṣāṃ lopa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6736: vācaspatistu pūrvadina eva kāryaṃ tatra śaucasyātantratvāt ekādaśāhaśrāddhavadityāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:6737: atra ca”deye pitṝṇāṃ”ityatra mṛtāhanirūpyaśrāddhasya tasminnahani āśauce
GSD36mvir_sau:6740: tena māsikasāṃvatsarikayorāśaucavighne tadante kartavyatā tadasambhave tu amāvāsyādau /
GSD36mvir_sau:6746: atra ca prathamasya kālasya sūtakavighnaviṣayatvaṃ ṛṣyaśṛṅgabacanaikavākyatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6748: ṛṣyaśṛṅgavacanasya sāmānyavacanatve 'pi anayoḥ pakṣayorvikalpasya aṣṭadoṣaduṣṭatvādbhinnaviṣayatvaṃ yuktameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6754: ekoddiṣṭe tu samprāpte yadi vighnaḥ grajāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:6757: yadyapi cātra nimittakathanabelāyāmekoddiṣṭapadaṃ māsikābdikasādhāraṇaṃ pratīyate tathāpi māse 'nyasminnitivacanānmāsikaikoddiṣṭaparameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6759: idaṃ ca māsikāntaradinarūpakālavidhānaṃ na kṛṣṇaikādaśyādyasambhave tasya māsikapuraskāreṇa viśeṣavihitatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6763: atra coktavacane ekoddiṣṭagrahaṇādekoddiṣṭarūpeṣveva māsikeṣu dināntarakālavidhānaṃ na pārvaṇarūpeṣu anumāsikeṣviti candrikākāraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6764: atra ca patitamāsikaṃ kṛtvā paścāttaddinamāsikaṃ kāryaṃ kḷptakramatyāge pramāṇābhāvāt iti gauḍāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6767: astu vā kramasyāṅgatvaṃ tathāpi anupādeyakālānurodhena tadbādho yukta eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6768: na ca aparāṅṇādeḥ atiśayamātrārthatvāttadbādhe 'pi na śrāddhakālabādha iti
GSD36mvir_sau:6771: anyathā kālabādhābhāve bhinnaprayogavacanaparigṛhītatvāt saṅkāntyamāvāsyādiśrāddhānāmapi bhedena karaṇāpattiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6775: tasmātpatitamāsikaṃ māsikāntaradine taddinamāsikena saha tantreṇa kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6776: ābdikaṃ tu āśaucātirikte pākāsambhavādinā vighne taduttarāmāvāsyādiṣu kāryaṃ na tu āmena /
GSD36mvir_sau:6782: vyādhyādinā aśaktena tu putrādidvārā taddina evānnena karaṇīyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6787: ekohiṣṭaṃ tu kartavyaṃ pākenaiva sadā svayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6789: iti laghuhārītavacanaṃ, tanna pratinidhimātrasya niṣedhakaṃ kintu asagotrapratinidhiniṣedhakam
GSD36mvir_sau:6792: agotrajaiḥ = dvārabhūtaiḥ na tu sakṛtkarttṛbhiḥ sagotrāyetyananvayāpatteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6798: tadahaḥsamupoṣayet iti mukyakālākaraṇanimittaṃ prāyaścittarūpamupoṣaṇaṃ tadahni kartavyamityarthaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:6802: tasmāttadahni upoṣaṇarūpaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇaikādaśyādau punaḥ śrāddhaṃ kāryameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6807: mṛtāhani tu samprāpte yasya bhāryā rajasvalā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6808: śrāddhaṃ tadā na kartavyaṃ kartavyaṃ pañcame 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:6809: itihemādrimādhavādilikhitaṃ vacanaṃ, tat yasya mṛtasya śrāddhakartrī bhāryā rajasvaleti vyākhyeyam
GSD36mvir_sau:6812: srayanadhi kārāt vyāsajyavṛtterbharttṛgatasyāpyadhikārasya nivṛttatvāttasyāstaddaśāpagama eva śrāddhaṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6820: na ca”pāṇigrahaṇāddhi sahatvaṃ sarvakarmasu”iti vacanaṃ mūlamitivācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6821: etasya yatra śrautasmārttāgnisādhyeṣu karmasu pramāṇāntareṇa ubhayādhikāro
GSD36mvir_sau:6825: mṛtapitrādikasya amāvāsyādāvakaraṇapratyavāyaparihārārthe pitṛpitāmahādigatatṛptyuddhārādiphalārthe vā śrāddhe pitṛtvādyanirūpikāyāstasyā mṛtapitṛkatvābhāvena adhikārāsambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6827: ātmanepadāddhi agnisvāmigataṃ phalaṃ janayantyagnisādhyāni karmāṇi na asvāmigatamityetāvadavagamyate na tu sarvasvāmigataṃ phalaṃ janayanti iti
GSD36mvir_sau:6828: dampatyormadhye ekasya rogādipīḍitasya tatparihārārthamiṣṭau kriyamāṇāyāṃ tadasambhavāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:6829: na ca śrāddhāṅgapākasya madhyamapiṇḍaprāśanasya ca patnīsādhyatvāt patnīśabdasya ca yajñasvāmivacanatvāttasyā adhikārābhāve kathaṃ tatkarttṛkatvopapattiritivācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6831: tasmādadhikārasadbhāve pramāṇābhāvāttasyāṃ rajasvalāyāmātmādipavkenānnena tadahareva śrāddhaṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6834: tatra tāvat dvividhāni pretaśrāddhāni navāni navamiśrāṇi ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:6838: saṃjñākaraṇaṃ tu “cāndrāyaṇaṃ navaśrāddhaṃ'; iti prāyaścittādyupayogārtham tānyanekavidhānyuktāni hemādyudāhṛtanāgarakhaṇḍe bhartṛyajñena /
GSD36mvir_sau:6839: trīṇi sañcayanasyārthe tāni vai śṛṇu sāmpratam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6840: yatra sthāne bhavenmṛtyustatra śrāddhaṃ tu kārayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:6841: ekoddiṣṭaṃ tato mārge viśrāmo yatra kāritaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6867: tatrāpi navamadivasakartavyasya navaśrāddhasya vighnādinā vicchede tadekādaśe 'hni kartavyamityuktam
GSD36mvir_sau:6878: iti āśvalāyanaśākhināṃ pañca, āpastambānāṃ ṣaḍiti dvayoḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:6880: aitareyiṇāṃ ca pañca ṣaḍ vetivikalpaṃ ca vakti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6885: viśāṃ nava rājñāṃ sapta vipraśūdrayoḥ ṣaḍiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6891: iti śaṅkhavacane yat ādyaṃ tadapi navamiti vyākhyātam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6898: tathā pi tatra brāhmaṇā yugmasaṅkhyākāḥ kāryāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6899: pretāya ca gṛhadvāri caturthe bhojayet dvijān /
GSD36mvir_sau:6916: gāvaḥ suvarṇaṃ vittaṃ ca gretamuddiśya śaktitaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6917: iti bṛhaspatyuktaṃ ca dharmajātaṃ tat savistaramanyatra jñeyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6920: mṛte 'hani tu kartavyaṃ pratimāsaṃ tu vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:6924: tathāpi vakṣyamāṇatadvākyaparyālocanayā ekādaśe 'hani kriyamāṇaṃ mahaikoddiṣṭaṃ tābhyāṃ bhinnameva
GSD36mvir_sau:6932: ityatra ca vidhīyamānaṃ pretoddeśena śrāddhaṃ tābhyāṃ bhinnameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:6950: atrāpi navaśrāddhamāsikayoranupasthiterakoddiṣṭameva nānādharmaviśiṣṭaṃ bhinnameva tābhyāmiti kiṃ bhūyasā /
GSD36mvir_sau:6951: tatra ca pūrvodāhṛtamatsyapurāṇavacanādekasminneva pretasthāne ekādaśa brāhmaṇā iti mukhyaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:6953: athāśaucavyapagame prātaḥ suprakṣālitapāṇipādaḥ svācāntaḥ evaṃ vidhāneva brāhmaṇān yathāśaktyudahmukhān gandhamālyavastrālaṅkārādibhiḥ pūjitān bhojayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:6955: varāhapurāṇe tu ekasyaiva brāhmaṇasya tatra tatra parāmarśādekasyāpi niyojanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6964: āgataṃ ca dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā kartavyā svāgatakriyā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6971: yadāpi bahubrāhmaṇapakṣastadāpi pretopabhuktavastraśayyādikamekasmā eva guṇavate deyamitarebhyo yathāśakti dakṣiṇāmātramityuktam--
GSD36mvir_sau:6978: iha ca bahuṣu vākyeṣu ekādaśāhagrahaṇaṃ na āśaucottaradinopalakṣakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6980: sarveṣāṃmeva varṇānāṃ sūtakaṃ tu pṛthak pṛthak //
GSD36mvir_sau:6985: kṣatriyādibirapi vacanādāśauce satyapi maraṇādekādaśāha evādyaśrāddhaṃ kartavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:6993: iti vaiṣṇavamātsyavacanataḥ kṣatrādibhirapi svasvāśaucānte ekāhatryahāśaucibhirapi tanmadhye daśāhakṛtyānuṣṭhāne tadanta evaikādaśāhaśrāddhaṃ naikādaśe 'hnīti vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:6998: saṅkocamātraṃ hi tadā na tu kasyacillakṣaṇā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7002: brāhmaṇa ekādaśāhe tatkurvanna pavkena bhojayet kintu tatra tyaktena yathāsaṅkhayabrāhmaṇabhojanaparyāptenāmena sūtakānte paktvā bhojayediti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7003: evaṃ ca sati ekādaśāhasūtakāntarūpakāladvayopetaṃ brāhmaṇakṣātriyādiviṣayaṃ vidhidvayamarthavadbhavati anyathā viṣṇuvacanādeva sūtakāntarūpakālopetenaikenaiva vidhinā sarvavarṇasādhāraṇādyaśrāddhavidhisiddhau mātsyamanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7006: śrotriyā bhojanīyāstu nava sapta trayodaśa / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7011: evañca satyekādaśāhikānnavaśrāddhādāśaucānte vidhīyamānaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ karmāntaramiti gamyate iti hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7012: yadā ca”brāhmaṇe daśa piṇḍāḥ syuḥ”iti pāraskaravacanātprativarṇaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7013: daśadvādaśapañcadaśatriṃśatpiṇḍāḥ, yadā vā”sarvebhya”iti vākyāt dvitīyo daśaiva piṇḍā iti pakṣaḥ, sarveṣāṃ ca khasvāśaucāntyadine daśamaḥ piṇḍastadāpi kṣatriyavaiśyaśūdrādīnāmekādaśe 'hni pretatvanivṛttyarthaṃ kṛtenāpi śrāddhena antyadinakriyamāṇadaśamapiṇḍasahitenaiva pretatvanivṛttirityanyatra vistaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7019: śāve tu sūtakaṃ cetsyānniśāśeṣe tathaiva ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:7024: eka eva vṛṣotsargo gaurekā tatra dīyate // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7033: navaśrāddhaṃ na kurvīta tripāde pañcake tathā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7040: arvāktu dvādaśāhasya labdhvā tarati duṣkṛtam // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7046: deyastu daśamaḥ piṇḍo rājñāṃ vai dvādaśe 'hani /
GSD36mvir_sau:7048: śūdrāṇāṃ daśamaḥ piṇḍo māse pūrṇe vidhīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:7053: brāhmaṇe daśa piṇḍāḥ syuḥ kṣatriye dvādaśa smṛtāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7054: vaiśye pañcadaśa proktāḥ śūdre triṃśatprakīrttitāḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7060: sampūrṇe tu tato māse piṇḍaśeṣaṃ samāpayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:7064: rājñāṃ dvādaśe vaiśyānāṃ pañcadaśa ityādinā daśamapiṇḍamātrotkarṣastu madhyamaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7068: māsaṃ yāvadvātrapūrakapiṇḍāsamāptau kathamekādaśāhikaśrāddhavidhiḥ kathaṃ ca viṣṇūktaḥ--
GSD36mvir_sau:7074: itvāṅgirasavacanātsarveṣāṃ daśāhamevāśaucamiti pakṣaḥ sāmprataṃ cāyameva bahudhā pracārībhūtaḥ kṣatriyādyācārasaṃvādī ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:7079: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā pañcame saptame 'pi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7080: dvau dvau piṇḍau pradātavyau śeṣāṃstu daśame 'hani //
GSD36mvir_sau:7084: evaṃ ca gātrapūrakapiṇḍadānaprakārāṇāmapi anayaiva rītyāvirodha iti, tanna
GSD36mvir_sau:7089: āśaucasya ca hrāse 'pi piṇḍān dadyāddaśaiva tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:7097: tṛtīye pañcaṭa vai dadyāddaśapiṇḍavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7111: tatpātheyaṃ hi bhavati mṛtasya manujasya ca // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7113: atra ca śiṣṭaiḥ prathamadine kriyamāṇatvādādyadinaṃ grāhyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7114: smṛtyarthasāre tu sañcayane kṛte manuṣyalokātpretalokaṃ gacchata āmena pātheyaśrāddhamekoddiṣṭavidhānena ityuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7118: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā saptame navame 'pi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7119: asthisañcayanaṃ kāryaṃ dine tadgotrajaiḥ saṃha // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7128: sadyaḥ śauce tatkṣaṇaṃ tu kartavya iti niścayaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7130: pālāśe tvasthidāhe ca sadyaḥ sañcayanaṃ bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7135: na ca brahmapurāṇoktavyavasthāpakṣe saptamanavamadinapakṣayornirviṣayatā syāditi vaktavyam
GSD36mvir_sau:7160: dviraindave tu kurvāṇaḥ punaḥ śāvaṃ samaśnute //
GSD36mvir_sau:7162: darśātprācīna ekaḥ kṣīṇa indurdarśottaramaparo bhāvī vṛddhimān /
GSD36mvir_sau:7163: kālādarśe tu etadagre tatheti kṛtvā vacanāntaraṃ likhitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7166: evaṃ sāmānyena mātāpitṛviṣaye 'pi darśa eva piṇḍodakadānāditantrasamāpriprasaktau--
GSD36mvir_sau:7176: pitryāśaucamadhye 'pi darśapāte samāptiruttaratantrasyocitā kimutānyāśaucamadhye iti pitṛvyatiriktasapiṇḍaviṣaye
GSD36mvir_sau:7179: bhavatu vā pitṛviṣaye 'pi niyāmakaṃ tathāpi”asvargyaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ dharmyamapyācarenna tu”ityanena nyāyena śiṣṭācārasahakṛtena”pitrostu
GSD36mvir_sau:7180: yāvadāśaucaṃ”ityanena gotamavacanena gālavavacanaṃ bādhyata iti pitryāśaucamadhye darśapāte 'pi yāvadāśaucaṃ piṇḍādikaṃ dadyāt itareṣāṃ tu darśāvadhikamevottaratantrasamāpanamiti vivekaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7181: atha vā kṣetrajasya bījipitṛviṣayaṃ dattakādiputrāṇāṃ pratigrahītrādimātāpitṛviṣayaṃ vā gālavavacanaṃ gautamavacanaṃ tu aurasaputrikāputrayormātāpitṛviṣayam. atha vā aurasādīnāṃ sarve ṣāmapi svamātāpitṛviṣaye āpadanāpatkalpāśrayaṇena vyavasthā vijñeyeti madanapārijātaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7182: mādhavanirṇayāmatādau tryahānantaraṃ darśapāte mātāpitṛtantrasyāpi samāptirna tu tryahamadhye darśapāte gautamavacanamapi tadviṣayakameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:7183: mātāpitṛvyatiriktānāṃ tu daśāhamadhye yadā kadāciddarśapāte tantrasamāptireveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7184: daśāhamadhye darśapāte darśātpūrvaṃ pramādālasyādinā yadā pretatantramanārabdhaṃ tadā tasya darśottaramapi ārambhaḥ samāptiścocitaiva tadā dviraindavatādoṣo 'pi parihṛto bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7187: ādyondāvevetyatra kartavyā iti na vidhīyate tathāsati”ādyandau”iti”kartavyā”iti ca vidheyadvaye vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7188: tenātrāpi dviraindava iti niṣedhāt dviraindavatvameva niṣidhyata iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7189: kvaciddarśapātavat saṅkrāntivyatīpātayorapi pāte tantrasamāptiḥ vacanaṃ ca saṅgraha itikṛtvā likhitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7195: atha navamiśrāṇi ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāni cetyevaṃprasiddhānāṃ māsikānāṃ kālaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7198: tāni ca maraṇamāsādārabhya saṃvatsaraṃ yāvatpratimāsaṃ vidhīyamānāni dvādaśa ūnamāsikaṃ traipākṣikam ūnaṣāṇmāsikamūnābdikaṃ cetyeva ṣoḍaśa bhavanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7208: traipakṣikaṃ tripakṣe syādūnābdaṃ dvādaśe tathā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7210: ūnaṣāṇmāsikamūne ṣaṣṭhe māsi, traipakṣikaṃ tṛtīye pakṣe, unābdikamūne dvādaśe māsi, ūnamāsikaṃ tu
GSD36mvir_sau:7226: ekāhena tu ṣaṇmāsā yadā syurapi vā tribhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7227: nyūnāḥ, saṃvatsaraścaiva syātāṃ ṣāṇmāsike tadā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7230: ekenāhnā nyūne ekadinapūrttinyūne tadantime dine ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7234: māsikāni svakīye tu divase dvādaśe 'pi vā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7240: ūnā nyūneṣu māseṣu viṣamāhe same 'pi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7244: ṣaṣṭhe ṣāṇmāsikaṃ kuryāt dvādaśe māsi cābdikam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7247: na ca kārṣṇājininā “tripakṣe'; ityuktaṃ bhaviṣye tu “vṛtte tripakṣe';
GSD36mvir_sau:7249: vṛtte 'tīta iti nārthaḥ, kintu tripakṣa ityadhikaraṇasaptamyanurodhādvṛtte
GSD36mvir_sau:7253: dvādaśe 'hani māse ca tripakṣe ca tataḥ param //
GSD36mvir_sau:7254: iti brahmapurāṇavākye 'pi pūrvodāhṛtavacanopātta-vṛtta iti padasya atīta
GSD36mvir_sau:7255: iti yathāśrutamevārthaṃ kṛtvā atrāpi tripakṣe ityasyāgre 'tīta iti śeṣaṃ pūrayanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7263: atra ca dvitīyādimāsikāni dvitīyatṛtīyādi māseṣu mṛtāhe kartavyāni ādyamāsikaṃ tu ekādaśe 'hni kartavyamityāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:7265: mṛte 'hani tu kartavyaṃ pratimāsaṃ tu vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:7270: ādyamṛtatithiṃ gṛhītvottaramutatitheḥ pūrvatithiparyantaṃ triṃśattithisamudāyātmakacāndramāsamānena caitraśuklapañcamyāṃ mṛtasyāgrimaśuklacaturthyāṃ māsikam,
GSD36mvir_sau:7271: evamūnaṣāṇmāsikonābdakayorekāhanyūnatāpakṣe tryahanyūtāpakṣe ca tṛtīyāyāṃ pratipadi ca tayoranuṣṭhānamiti
GSD36mvir_sau:7274: tu”iti kārṣṇājinivacanācca”māsikāni svakīye tu divase”iti,”ṣāṇmāsikābdikeśrāddhe syātāṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7281: mādhavena tūnaṣāṇmāsikaṃ saptamāsagatamṛtāhadinātpūrvedyuranuṣṭheyam ūnābdikaṃ ca dvitīyavatsarādermṛtāhadinātpūrvedyuḥ kartavyamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7283: māse bhavaṃ māsikamiti vyutpattyā, māse 'tīte bhāvaṃ māsikamiti vyutpattyā
GSD36mvir_sau:7284: vā, māsasambandhi māsikamiti hemādryuktavyutpattyā vā, māsādau bhavaṃ māsikamiti vyutpattyā vā māsikasya yadyapi tanmāsabhavanaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7285: tanmāsasambandho vā tanmāsāntargatayatkiñcittithyadhikaraṇakatvenāpi sambhavati jyotiṣṭomasyeva vasantakālikatvaṃ śrāddhasyevāparapākṣikatvam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7286: tathāpi prathamātikrame kāraṇā bhāvāt vakṣyamāṇasmārttabahuvacanānurodhācca māsopakrama eva kartavyatā niścīyate
GSD36mvir_sau:7287: tāni tu vacāṃsi '; māsikāni svakīye tu divasa”iti”mṛtāheṣvitarāṇi
GSD36mvir_sau:7290: dvādaśe 'hani māse ca tripakṣe ca tataḥ param /
GSD36mvir_sau:7291: māsi māsi tu kartavyaṃ yāvatsamvatsaraṃ dvijaiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7296: ekādaśe caturthe ca māsi māsi ca vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:7299: evaṃ satyādyamāsikamekādaśāhe, ūnamāsikamūne māsi dvādaśāhe vā,
GSD36mvir_sau:7301: dvitīyamāsasyādyamṛtatithau, tṛtīyamāsikaṃ tṛtīyamāsasyādyamṛtatithau kriyamāṇatvāccaitraśuklapañcamīpramītasya vaiśākha śuklapañcamyāṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7303: evamagre 'pi tattanmāse budhvā dvādaśamāsasya phālgunasyādyamṛtatithau pañcamyāṃ dvādaśamāsikaṃ kṛtvā ūnābdikaṃ caitraśuklacaturthyāṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7304: yadā tu sapiṇḍīkaraṇe”tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe sapiṇḍīkaraṇam”itikātyāyanapakṣastadā tasminneva dine ūnābdikasapiṇḍīkaraṇayorbaddhakramatvādūnābdikaṃ kṛtvā sapiṇḍīkṛtiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7305: yadā tvāśvalāyanapakṣaḥ”atha sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ saṃvatsarānta iti, tadā pūrvadine caturthyāmūnābdikaṃ kṛtvā caitraśuklapañcamyāṃ dvitīyavatsarādyamṛtatithau sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā
GSD36mvir_sau:7308: kātyāyanavākye 'pi saṃvatsare pūrṇe sati dbitīyadine sapiṇḍīkaraṇamiti vyākhyāsambhavāt
GSD36mvir_sau:7310: māseṣūktaṃ yadekādaśasu mṛtadineṣvādyamekādaśāhe nyūnābde yattadardhe yadapi tadapare dvādaśāhe tripakṣe / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7319: evaṃ ca prathamamāsikonamāsikatraipakṣikatṛtīyamāsikacaturthapañcamaṣāṇmāsikonaṣāṇmāsikasaptamāṣṭamanavamadaśamaikādaśadvādaśamāsikonābdikāni ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāni dadyādinati hemādyudāhṛtasūtrabodhitaḥ śrāddhakramo 'pyupapadyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:7320: anyathonānāṃ tattanmāsikottaratvaṃ traipakṣikasya ca dvitīyottaratvaṃ na syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7321: etena yacchūlapāṇinoktaṃ māse bhavamityeva samākhyāvyutpattiḥ, na caivaṃ sarvādyamṛtatithau māsikāpattirmṛtatithermṛtatithiṃ yāvaccāndrasya
GSD36mvir_sau:7323: mṛtatitheriti vāvadhau paccamī tenānyamṛtatithereva pūrvamāsaśabdārthatvam ataśca prathamamāsikaṃ dvitīyamṛtatithāveveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7326: nanu”pratisaṃvattsaraṃ caivaṃ”itivacanādādyamṛtatithiṃ gṛhītvā ādyasāṃvatsāṃrekasyāpi ādmāsikavatpravṛttiḥ syāditicet, satyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7328: pratyuta tasya dbitīyavatsarādyamṛtatithāvutpannatvādādyamatatithau prāptireva nāstīti dvitīyavatsarādau kriyamāṇamābdikamityucyate tṛtīyavatsarādau tu pratyābdikamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7349: yattu hemādṣādau ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānāṃ prakārāntareṇa gaṇanaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇādīnāṃ ca ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāntargatatvenopavarṇanam
GSD36mvir_sau:7352: nṝṇāṃ tu tyaktadehānāṃ śrāddhāḥ ṣoḍaśa sarvadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7358: riktayośca tathā tithyoḥ pretaśrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7360: riktayośca tithyorityekenānhā nyūne ṣaṣṭhe dvādaśe ca māse ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7377: viruddhagaṇanasya tu śākhābhadena deśabhedena vā vyavasthā draṣṭavyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7378: kṣatriyādibhirapyetadādyaṃ śrāddhaṃ satyapyāśauca ekā daśe 'hanyeva kāryam
GSD36mvir_sau:7381: caturṇāmapi varṇānāṃ sūtakaṃ tu pṛthakpṛthak // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7394: āhitāgnermaraṇadinā danyasmin dine dāhe sati dāhadinādārabhya navaśrāddhaikādaśāhikatraipakṣikāntāni kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7400: dhruvāṇi tu prakurvīta pramītāhani sarvadā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7411: mukhyaṃ śrāddhaṃ māsi māsi aparyāptāvṛtuṃ prati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7412: dvādaśāhena vā kuryādekāhe dvādaśāpi vā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7414: pratimāsaṃ mṛtāhe māsikaṃ śrāddhamiti mukhyaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7416: ṛtoratra cāndrasya saurasya vāsambhavānmāsadvayaśrāddhamagrimamāsi kāryamiti tasyārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7418: pūrvamāse mṛtitithimullaṅdhyottaramāse mṛtitithau atikrāntaśrāddhaṃ prāptakālaṃ ca śrāddhaṃ ceti dvayaṃ tatra kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7420: yathā ekādaśāhe ādyaṃ nirvarttya ūnamāsikaṃ ca svakāle kṛtvā tato dvitīyamāsikaṃ traipakṣikaṃ ca tṛtīyamāsikena saha, caturthamāsikena saha caturthaṃ, pañcamena saha ṣaṣṭham, ūnaṣāṇmāsikaṃ ca saptamena saha,
GSD36mvir_sau:7421: aṣṭamaṃ navamena, daśamamekādaśena, dvādaśamūnābdikena saheti pūrvamapyuktam”navamiśraṃ tu ṣaḍutaram”iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7423: atha vā dvādaśāhena dvādaśabhirdinaiḥ apavarge tṛtīyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7425: tatrāśaucottaradine ekādaśāhe ādyaṃ, tatastaduttaradine tūnādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7426: ca, tatastaduttaradine traipākṣikaṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca, tatastaduttareṣu triṣu dineṣu krameṇa caturthapañcamaṣaṣṭhāni, tata uttaradine tūnaṣāṇmāsike
GSD36mvir_sau:7427: saptamaṃ ca, tatastaduttaradineṣu aṣṭamanavamadaśamaikādaśāni, tata uttaradine dvādaśamūnābdikaṃ ceti dvādaśabhirdinaiḥ ṣoḍaśa śrāddhāni kṛtvā taduttaradine sapiṇḍīkaraṇam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7428: śrāddhacintāgaṇau tu dvādaśāhamupakramya dvādaśabhirddinairdvādaśa māsikāni śrāddhāni kṛtvā tataḥ pareha'ni sapiṇḍīkaraṇamityuktam iti tṛtīyakalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7429: atha vā ekasminneva dine ekāhe ekādaśāhe dva /
GSD36mvir_sau:7430: daśāhe vā dvādaśāpi māsikāni kṛtvā sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryamiti caturthaḥ kalpaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7437: ekoddiṣṭe tu samprāpte yadi vivnaḥ grajāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:7438: māse 'nyasmina tithau tasyāṃ kuryādantaritaṃ ca yat //
GSD36mvir_sau:7439: antaritaṃ māsikaṃ taduttarasambandhini māsi kuryāditi kālādarśe /
GSD36mvir_sau:7442: āśaucādinā tu māsikāntarāye āśaucānte uttaramāse mṛtatithau vā amāvāsyāyāṃ vā kṛṣṇaikādaśryāṃ vā anukalpena śuklaikādaśyāmapi veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7444: āśaucopahatau tu māsikavidherāśaucakālātyayaḥ śasto vottaramāsi taddinamamāvāsyā sitaikādaśī
GSD36mvir_sau:7446: etāni ṣoḍaśa śrāddhāni saṃvatsarādarvāk dvādaśāhādau sipaṇḍīkaraṇe kartavye apakṛṣya sapiṇḍīkaraṇātpūrvaṃ karttaṃvyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:7451: sapiṇḍīkaraṇāt prāgapakṛṣya kṛtānyapi sapiṇḍanottaraṃ punastāni svasvakāle kartavyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:7455: māsikaṃ codakummaṃ ca deyaṃ tasyāpi vatsaram // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7466: ṣoḍaśānāṃ madhye yāni svasvakāle dvitrāṇi kṛtāni tataḥ sapiṇḍana upasthite tatpūrvaṃ yāni avaśiṣṭāni apakṛṣya kṛtāni tānyeva punaḥ kuryāt na tvanyāni svasvakāle kṛtānītyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7467: vivāhādyupasthitau tu sapiṇḍīkaraṇātpūrvamapakṛṣya kṛtānyapi vūdhdyanantaraṃ punarnaiva kāryāṇītyāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:7469: nirvartya vṛddhitantraṃ tu māsikāni na tantrayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7470: ayātayāmaṃ maraṇaṃ na bhavetpunarasya tu // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7472: vṛdhdyatantaraṃ māsikāni na kuryāttadā ayātayāmaṃ nūtanaṃ maraṇaṃ na bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7484: yathākālaṃ tu kāryāṇi nānyathā mucyate tataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7487: arvāksapiṇḍīkaraṇe tu kena niroddhavyo 'pakarṣa iti ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāni kṛtvaiva sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ saṃvatsarātprāgapi kartavyamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7489: yadā prāksapiṇḍīkaraṇāt pretaśrāddhāni karoti tadaikoddiṣṭavidhānena kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7490: yadā tu tadūrdhvaṃ karoti tadābdikaṃ śrāddhaṃ yo yathā karoti pārvaṇamekoddiṣṭaṃ vā tathā māsikāni kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7494: pratyabdaṃ yo yathā kuryāttathā kuryātsa tānyapi //
GSD36mvir_sau:7496: tathā saṃvatsaraparyantaṃ pratidinaṃ pretodde śena bhojanaparyāptānnasahita udakumbho deyaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:7503: dine dine pradātavyo yāvatsyādvatsaraḥ sutaiḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7516: annaṃ caiva svaśattyā tu saṅkhayāṃ kṛtvābdikasya tu /
GSD36mvir_sau:7517: dātavyaṃ brāhmaṇebhyastu yadvā tanniṣkrayaṃ ca yat //
GSD36mvir_sau:7521: iti udakumbhasyāpyapakarṣakaṃ, tattu yājñavalkyavacovirodhānnāpakarṣaparaṃkintu pratidinamudakumbhānnadānāśaktau ekasminnapi dine tāvanto yathāsambhavaṃ yadā kadācidvā vatsaramadhye tāvanto deyā iti tadarthaḥ ācārasyāpi tathādṛṣṭatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7523: tathāpi guṇapradhānabhāvāvivakṣayā idamannameṣa kumbha iti pṛthageva tyāgaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7524: atra ca yadā pretoddeśenānnasya tatsthānīyasya vā dravyasya śraddhayā tyāgaḥ śrāddhamiti vijñāneśvaroktaṃ
GSD36mvir_sau:7527: śūlapāṣyuktaṃ ca śrāddha lakṣaṇaṃ, tadāpi etacchrāddhalakṣaṇākrāntatvādannodakumbhatyāgo 'pi śrāddharūpa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:7531: ahanyahani yaccoditaṃ tannityāmatyabhidhānādyatrāvadhidinaviśeṣānupādānena jīvanāvadhi niyojyatvaṃ pratīyate tannityam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7543: caturdaśyāṃ ca nonāni kṛttikāsu tripuṣkare // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7545: tripuṣkaraṃ ca tripānnakṣatraṃ bhadrā tithirgurubhaumaravivārāṇāmanyatamasya melane bhavati
GSD36mvir_sau:7548: viṣamacaraṇaṃ dhiṣṇyaṃ bhadrātithiryadi jāyate suragururavikṣmāputrāṇāṃ kathaṃ cana vāsare
GSD36mvir_sau:7552: tadā tripuṣkaro yogo dvayoryogo dvipuṣkaraḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7554: dvitīyāsaptamīdvādaśīnāṃ bhadrātithīnāṃ punarvasūttarāphālgunīviśākhottarāṣāḍhāpūrvābhādrapadanakṣatrāṇāṃ bhānubhaumaśanaiścarāṇāṃ ca melane tripuṣkaraṃ dbimelane dvipuṣkaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:7569: tatra śrāddhaṃ na kurvīta gṛhī putradhanakṣayāt //
GSD36mvir_sau:7576: nakṣatre tu na kurvīta yasmin jāto bhavennaraḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7577: na prauṣṭhapadayoḥ kārṃyaṃ tathāgneye ca bhārata! //
GSD36mvir_sau:7578: dāruṇeṣu ca sarveṣu pratyarau ca vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7579: jyautiṣe yāni coktāni tāni yatnena varjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:7624: atra hi karturuddeśyasya niragnitve nimitte kālo niyamyate tasyaiva karmāṅgatvena vidhīyamānatvāt
GSD36mvir_sau:7625: yattu kāle karma vidhīyate na karmaṇi kāla itinyāyavidvacanaṃ tadanupādeyatvābhiprāyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7629: atra hi pūrṇa iti varṣasamāptyuttaradina ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7637: tatrāpi sati saptamyeva na tu daśānte paṭa itivadvācakatvaṃ pūrvodāhṛtavākyavirodhāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7638: yacca smṛtyarthasāre dvādaśamāsopāntyadine ūnābdikaṃ taduttaradine sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ taduttaradine mṛtāharūpe prathamābdikamiti, tadetat”vārṣike
GSD36mvir_sau:7640: evañca sati ekoddiṣṭapradhānakatvena madhyāhne sapiṇḍanaṃ vidhāya pārvaṇapradhānakatvena vāparāhṇe sapiṇḍanaṃ kṛtvā sambhave 'parāhṇa eva gauṇakālarūpasāyāhne vā sāṃvatsarikaṃ kāryaṃ na tu lopastasya /
GSD36mvir_sau:7641: kecittu mṛtāhadine sapiṇḍane ābdikalopa eva mukhyakālasyābhāvāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:7647: yacca śeṣabhojanaṃ vinā karmāsamāpterna karmāntarārambha iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7650: taduttaraṃ ca rāgataḥ prāpte bhojane pratipattimākāṅkṣamāṇasya śeṣasya niyamo na tu śeṣabhojanaṃ śrāddhāṅgam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7652: pratyābdikenāvaśyakartavyatayā vihitena vyavahitaṃ sadābdikaśrāddhāṅgakaśeṣabhojanena saha tantreṇaikasmin dine daivavaśāpannānekavārṣikaśeṣabhojanamivānuṣṭhātuṃ śakyamiti na kiñcidanupapannam vṛddhirabhyudayaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7653: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7656: gomilo 'pi yadaharvā vṛddhirāpadyate iti vṛddhirvā yadahaḥ syāditi /
GSD36mvir_sau:7660: sapiṇḍīkaraṇasya madhyāhnakālatvāt vṛddhiśrāddhasya ca prātaḥ kālikatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7669: apakṛṣyāpi kurvīta karttāṃ nāndīmukhaṃ dvijaḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7671: ayaṃ cāpakarṣaḥ sapiṇḍanaṃ vinā pitrādīnāṃ pārvaṇārhapitṛtvaprāptyabhāvena nāndīśrāddhasya kartumaśakyatvāt jñeyo na tu vācanika iti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:7672: apare tu na hyadṛṣṭārthe hetunā prayojanam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7673: na hyapakarṣe devatāsambhavaḥ prayojakaḥ kintu vidhiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7674: devatāyā abhāve tu jīvatpitṛkasyeva karmalopa eva yuktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7678: mātāmahasapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ prāpnuyāddauhitrānurodhena vā mātulasya gauṇakāle 'nuṣṭhānaprasaṅgaḥ,”na pārvaṇaṃ nābhyudayam”iti
GSD36mvir_sau:7690: atra ca “tripakṣe vai sapiṇḍanam'; ityatra tṛtīyasya pakṣasyādhikaraṇa
GSD36mvir_sau:7692: na cāstu saptamī paraṃ tu satisaptamī sā, evaṃ ca māsikābdikādiśrāddhavanmṛtatithisajātīyāyāṃ tithau sapiṇḍīkaraṇa miti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7695: na ca”pūrṇe saṃvatsare ṣaṇmāse tripakṣe yadaharvā vṛddhirāpadyate”iti
GSD36mvir_sau:7696: gobhilavākye saṃvatsara iva ṣaṇmāsatripakṣayorapi pūrṇa ityanuṣaṅgeṇānvayāttaduttaradinasyaiva grahaṇamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7700: hemādristu pakṣatraye pūrṇa iti vadannapi tṛtīyapakṣasampūrttidinasyaivādhikaraṇatvamāha saptamīsvārasyāt na tu taduttaradinasyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7710: baudhāyanādyuktavihitakāla eva kartavyaṃ, tadabādhenaivopapattau bādhāyogāt svatantrakālakalpanāprasaṅgācca
GSD36mvir_sau:7717: yadā ca darśo ddhāviṃśatidinādūrdhvaṃ bhavati tadāśaucātparato dvādaśasu divaseṣu ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāni kṛtvā trayodaśadivase sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7719: māsikārthavat dvādaśāhaṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni vā kuryāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7724: tatronamāsikatraipakṣikonaṣāṇmāsikāni prathamadvitīyaṣaṣṭhadvādaśādivaseṣu kāryāṇi divasasya māsa tthānīyatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7726: dinamekaṃ vardhayet”iti tenaivoktam dvādaśāhaṃ trayodaśa iti
GSD36mvir_sau:7729: tatā sāgninā pravasitena vicchinnāgninā vā pārvaṇaśrāddhānurodhenāpi apakarṣaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7733: na pārvaṇaṃ nābhyudayaṃ kurvanna labhate phalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:7738: ekatvaṃ sā gatā bharttuḥ piṇḍe gotre ca sūtake /
GSD36mvir_sau:7746: anyathā mātāmahena saha sapiṇḍane mātāmahapiṇḍabhoktṛtvaṃ na syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7748: tasmātsāgninā kartrā āśaucottaraṃ dvādaśasu divaseṣu māsikāni kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni maraṇadinādārabya vā dvādaśe dine ekādaśe 'hani eva vā darśapāte tatraiva sapiṇḍanaṃ kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7749: atra ca pramādādakaraṇe tripakṣādiṣu vihiteṣu kāleṣu kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7755: tasyaiva dvādaśāhādīnāṃ mukhyatvāt tadagrimāṇāmanukalpatvena vidhānamuktaṃ na tu niragnikasya
GSD36mvir_sau:7756: tasya varṣāntasyaiva mukhyatvāt, na ca taduttaraṃ vihitaḥ kālo 'stīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7758: dvādaśe 'hani ṣaṣṭhe vā tripakṣe vā trimāsi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7762: baudhāyanaḥ--atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ tripakṣe tṛtīyamāsi ṣaṣṭhe vaikādaśe vā dvādaśāhe veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7763: atrāpi pūrvoktayuttyādhikaraṇatve siddhe yadatīte ṣaṣṭhe māsīti kasyacidvyākhyānaṃ tatra mūlaṃ mṛgyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7767: māsikārthavat dvādaśāhaṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā trayodaśe 'hni vā kuryāta /
GSD36mvir_sau:7772: asthitiśca rājopadravādinā deśatyāgasambhāvanārūpā rogādinā karmāsāmarthyarūpā vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7775: dvādaśāhaśca dvādaśañca tadahaścetivyutpattyā dvādaśaṃ dinaṃ tacca mṛtadināvadhikameva /
GSD36mvir_sau:7776: dvādaśānāmahnāṃ saṅghāto dvādaśāhaḥ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāpakarṣakaḥ kālaḥ sa cābhyudayarūpa iti śūlapāṇiḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:7777: nanu kathamasya praśastatvaṃ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ hi pitṛtvaprāptyarthaṃ na ca dvādaśāhe kṛtaṃ kevalaṃ tatpitṛtvāpādakaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7785: pretatvamapi tasyāpi jñeyaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ nṛpa! // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7787: ataḥ pūrvaṃ kṛte 'pi sapiṇḍane vatsarānta eva pretatvanivṛtteḥ kathamasya praśastatbamiticet, ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānyakṛtvā kṛte sapiṇḍane na pitṛtvaprāptirityetatparamidaṃ vacanadvayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7792: nanu ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānyapakṛṣya kṛte sapiṇḍana pretatvanivṛtterjātatvātpunarmāsikodakumbhaśrāddhaṃ na syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7796: māsikaṃ codakumbhaṃ ca deyaṃ tasyāpi vatsaram //
GSD36mvir_sau:7799: kecittu vṛddhinimittaṃ vināpakṛṣṭe sapiṇḍane saṃvatsarānta eva pretatvanivṛttiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7805: pretatvācceha nistīrṇāḥ prāptā pitṛgaṇaṃ tu te // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7807: yadi vāśavatyā gauṇekāle 'nuṣṭhāna daivāttaduttaraṃ vṛddhyādyāpadyeta tadā
GSD36mvir_sau:7808: vṛddhikālaṃ prāpya pretatvaparihāro bhavati tasya vatsarāntakālatulyatvāditi vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7811: yadi cāhitāgnerdvādaśāhasyeva mukhyatvena pretatvanivṛttiphalakasya sapiṇḍanasyātra vihitatvāditi, tadā vihitatvaṃ gauṇasyāpyastyeva /
GSD36mvir_sau:7812: mukhyakālaśca na svarūpeṇa prayojakaḥ anyathā vatsarānte sapiṇḍanābhāve
GSD36mvir_sau:7813: 'pi pretatvanivṛttiḥ syādeva tasmānmakhyakāle 'nuṣṭhitameva sapiṇḍanaṃ pretatvanivartakaṃ vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7817: kecittu sarveṣāmapi kālānāhitāgniṃ prati mukhyatvena dvādaśādikāleṣu kṛtaṃ sapiṇḍanaṃ vṛddhipūrvaṃ kṛtamiva pretatvanivartakamiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7821: dvādaśāhe tu keṣāñcinmataṃ caikādaśe tathā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7823: kecittu idaṃ sakalasādhāraṇamukhyakālasaṅgrāhakaṃ na tu niragnerekādaśāhādipratipādakam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7825: evaṃ ca”yā tupūrvamamāvāsyā”ityādivākyaistāṃstān prati prāprāneva kālān
GSD36mvir_sau:7830: dvādaśe 'hani ṣaṣṭhe vā tripakṣe vā trimāsi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7837: anye tu vatsarānto mukhyastatsannihita ekādaśo māso jaghanyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7839: yadā ca sapiṇḍīkaraṇārthaṃ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhānyapakṛṣyante tadā mṛtatithisajātīyāyāṃ tithau kāryāṇi
GSD36mvir_sau:7841: asambhave tu sapiṇḍanadine eva nimitte sannidhānāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:7842: atha vā sati kālavyavadhāne prāgudāhṛtaviṣṇuvākyāt dvādaśasu divaseṣu ṣoḍaśaśrāddhāni vidadhyāditi
GSD36mvir_sau:7848: iti vidhānānmāsaṃ śūdrasyāśaucasattvādavayavapiṇḍasya daśamasya taṃ prati sūtakānte vihitatvāt kathaṃ dvādaśāhe śūdrasya sapiṇḍanamitivācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7850: ityetatpakṣamāśritya vā sacchūdrasya darśaśrāddhānurodhena ekādaśāhavidhivadvacanabalātsūtakanivṛttimabhyupetya vā vacanāt sūtakamadhya eva vā kāryamiti na doṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7851: vastuto dvādaśāhapadaṃ na maraṇadinādārabhya dvādaśāhaparaṃ kintu sūtakāntadivasādūrdhvaṃ dvijātivat dvādaśasu divaseṣu dvādaśa māsikāni kṛtvā dvādaśāha eva sapiṇḍanaṃ kāryaṃ na tu dvijā tivattrayodaśāhe /
GSD36mvir_sau:7852: ata eva tatroktam--yadyadhimāsastadā trayodaśe dina iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7856: deśāntaragatānāṃ ca putrāṇāṃ ca kathaṃ bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:7857: śrutvā tu vapanaṃ kāryaṃ daśāhaṃ tu tilodakam //
GSD36mvir_sau:7862: raudrahaste ca rohiṇyāṃ maitrabhe vā samācaret //
GSD36mvir_sau:7867: śrāddhaṃ ca trividhaṃ pārvaṇamekoddiṣṭaṃ daivikaṃ ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:7870: trīnuddiśya tu yattaddhi pārvaṇaṃ munayo viduḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7874: tatra yasyāṃ tithau pārvaṇaśrāddhaṃ vihitaṃ sā yadi dinadvayasambandhinībhavettadā yasminpūrvasminparasminvā
GSD36mvir_sau:7877: tayā karmāṇi kurvīta hrāsavṛddhī na kāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:7885: sā pitṛbhyo yato dattā hyaparāhṇaḥ svayaṃbhuvā //
GSD36mvir_sau:7886: yasyāmaparāhṇasambandhinyāṃ ravirastaṃ yāti sā pitṛkārye praśaste tyarthaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:7889: sā grāhyā pitṛkārye tu na pūrvāstānuyāyinī //
GSD36mvir_sau:7891: tathā ca yāparāhṇavyāpinyastānuyāyinī sā pitṛkārye grāhyetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7892: yadā tu dinadvaye 'pi nāparāhṇavyā pinī tadāpi pūrvaiva grāhyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7899: mūlaṃ hi pitṛtṛptyarthaṃ paitraṃ coktaṃ maharṣibhiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7901: titheḥ prāntaṃ surākhyaṃ hi upoṣyaṃ kavayo viduḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7902: pitryaṃ mūlaṃ titheḥ proktaṃ śāstrajñaiḥ kālakovidaiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7904: na tatraudayikī grāhyā daive hyaudayikī tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7906: sāyāhnavyāpinī yā tu pārvaṇe sā uhāhṛtā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7909: udite daivataṃ bhānau pitryaṃ cāstamite ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:7911: bhānāvudite sati yad dvimuhūrtaṃ muhūrtadvayaṃ taddaivataṃ =
GSD36mvir_sau:7913: astamite astaṃ gantumārabdhe bhānau astamayātpūrvaṃ yat trimuhūrtaṃ tatpitryaṃ = pitryakarmayogyam
GSD36mvir_sau:7917: dinadvaye 'pi sāmyenāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptiśca śrāddhāṅgatithervṛdhdyā kṣayeṇa sāmyena vā bhavati, tatra kasmindine pārvaṇamitisaṃśaye--
GSD36mvir_sau:7921: kharvaḥ = sāmyavāṃstithiḥ, darpo vṛddhistadvāṃstithiḥ, hiṃsā kṣayastadvāniti trividhaṃ tithilakṣaṇaṃ tithisvarūpam /
GSD36mvir_sau:7922: atra sarvatvādīnāṃ grāhyatithigatatvaṃ kharvadarpayoḥ parayorhisāyāśca pūrvasyā grāhyatvābhidhānāt
GSD36mvir_sau:7923: sā ca tulyakālaikadeśabyāptirgrāhyatithervṛddhikṣayasāmyairitthaṃbhavati samarātrindivasamaye yadā viṃśatighaṭīparimitā pūrvatithir bhavati dvāviṃśatighaṭīparimitā cottaratithistadā dinadvaye 'pi sāmyena ghaṭīcatuṣṭayaparimitāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptirbhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:7925: yadā ca dvāviṃśatighaṭīparimitā pūrvatithirviṃśatighaṭīparimitā cottaratithistadāpi sāmyena ghaṭīdbayarūpāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptirbhavati tithaiśca ghaṭīdvayena kṣīyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:7926: yadā ca pūrvottaradinayoḥ pūrvottare tithī ekaviṃśatighaṭīparamite stastadāpi sāmyenaiva ghaṭītrayaparimitāparāhṇaikadeśavyāptirbhavati tithiśca sāmyamupaiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7927: atra vṛddhisāmyayoḥ parā grāhyā kṣaye pūrveti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7930: āmaśrāddhaṃ tu pūrvāhṇa ekoddiṣṭaṃ tu madhyataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7937: vidhijño vidhimāsthāya rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:7941: madhyāhnavyāpinī yā tu tithiḥ pūrvā parāpi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7942: tasyāṃ pitṛbhyo dātavyaṃ hāsavṛddhī na kāraṇam //
GSD36mvir_sau:7958: prātaḥkāle tu na śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta dvijottamaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7960: itimādhavodāhṛtācchivarāghavasaṃvādavākyātprātaḥ kālavihitavṛddhiśrāddhātirikteṣu śrāddheṣu prātaḥ kālasya niṣedhāttadatiriktapūrvāhṇo daivikaśrāddhakālaḥ tadvyāptyaiva pūrvavannirṇayaḥ viśeṣastu yadā vṛddhikṣayādibhirdinadvaye 'pi tulyakālā karmakālavyāptistadottaraiva grāhyā
GSD36mvir_sau:7961: udite daivataṃ bhānau pitrye cāstamite ravau /
GSD36mvir_sau:7971: āvartanaṃ nāma dinamadhyaṃ tathā ca āvartanāvadhikaḥ pūrvo bhāgaḥ pūrvahṇastadavadhikaḥ paro bhāgo 'parāhṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:7979: pūrvāhṇo vai devānāṃ madhyandino manuṣyāṇāmaparāhṇaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tasmādaparāhṇe dadātīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7980: atra vidheyāparāhṇsaya stutyarthamuktasya pūrvāhṇamadhyandinayordevamanuṣyasambandhasya pramāṇāntarāpratītatvātpūrvāhṇe devebhyo dadāti madhyandine manuṣyebhya iti vidhī kalpyete iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:7983: pūrvāhṇaḥ prathamaḥ prokto madhyāhnastu tataḥ paraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:7989: pūrvāhṇaḥ praharaṃ sārddhaṃ madhyāhnaḥ praharaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:7992: pañcadhā vibhāgadyotikā śatapathaśrutiḥ--ādityastveva sarva ṛtavaḥ sa
GSD36mvir_sau:7993: yadaivodetyatha vasanto yathā saṅgavo 'tha grīṣmo yathā madhyandino 'tha varṣā yadāparāhno
GSD36mvir_sau:8003: ahno muhūrtā vijñeyā daśa pañca ca sarvadāṃ / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8005: ahnastriṃśadghaṭīparimitatve nyūnādhikatve vā muhūrtāḥ pañcadaśaiveti sarvadetyasyārthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8007: raudraḥ śvetaśca maitraśca tathā sārabhaṭaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8010: śambaro vijayaścaiva bhedāḥ pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8023: sāyāhnaśca caturdhāvibhāge praharaparimitaḥ, pañcadhāvibhāge trimuhūrtaparimita iti dvividhaḥ sāyāhnaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8024: ete ca pūrvāhṇādayastu tattatkarmasu yathāviniyojakaṃ yathālābhaṃ grāhyā yavabrīhyādivat /
GSD36mvir_sau:8031: kuṃ yatra gopatirgobhiḥ kārtsnyena tapati kṣaṇe /
GSD36mvir_sau:8032: sa kālaḥ kutapo jñeyastatra dattaṃ mahāphalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8036: sarvapṛthivītāpakatvaṃ khamadhyagatasya sūryasya bhavatīti tadupalakṣitaḥ kālaḥ kutapaśabdenocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8041: sa kālaḥ kutapo jñeyaḥ pitṝṇāṃ dattamakṣayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8044: tilā darbhāśca madhyāhno navaite kupāḥ smṛtāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8054: rātrau śrāddhaṃ na kurvīta rākṣasī kīrttitā hi sā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8066: caturthe prahare prāpte śrāddhaṃ tatra na kārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8071: yattvatra śūlapāṇyādibhiruktaṃ na vikalpabhiyā paryudāsāṅgīkaraṇaṃ vidhiniṣedhayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣarūpatvena tulyabalatvābhāvāt tadaprasakteḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:8076: eteṣāṃ ca paryudāsatvam amāvāsyāvidhiśeṣatayā rātryādītarāmāvāsyāyāmi ti śūlapāṇiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8082: te hi ahorātraṃ vinā karmakaraṇāśaktestadvadahorātraparā bhavanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8086: purāṇeṣvapi ca”adya janmāṣṭamīṃ prāpya”iti sahkalpavākyaṃ sāvanadinasya vidhiṃ sūcayati
GSD36mvir_sau:8088: nanu paryudāsasyāpi paryudasanīyaprāptisāpekṣatvātsarvaśrāddheṣu ca pūrvāhṇāparāhṇāditattadvelānāṃ niyatatvena rātryādiprāptyabhāvātkathamete paryudāsā iti cet,
GSD36mvir_sau:8101: darśaprakaraṇagatasyāpi ca niṣedhasya prakaraṇe niveśāmbhavādutkarṣa iti kecit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8103: taddhi prakṛtiprāptasyāparāhṇasya aupideśikena nimittānantaryeṇa bādhādrātrāvapi sāmānyataḥ prāpnoti na tu grahaṇādivattatpuraskārema vidhirastīti tatra vikalpaprasattyabhāvātsa eva rātriparyudāsasya viṣayaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:8106: ityādivacanaṃ tadapi vāśabdopanibandhādvacanāntaraparyudastaparātreranyatra prāptaprātassāyāhnādigauṇakālasyāpi mukhyatvadyotanārthaṃ na punā rātrāvapi tatkartavyatāparamityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8107: apare tu prakaraṇābādhe sambhavati tadvādhasyāyogātprakṛtāveva daivānmānuṣādvā pratibandhādasamāpte śrāddhe yadi ravirastamiyāttadā prārabdhatvādrātrāvapi tatsamāpane prasakte na naktaṃ śrāddhaṃ kurvīteti paryudāsaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8108: tathā ca sāmikṛtameva sthāpayitvā paredyuḥ kṛtvātatsamāpanīyaṃ yajamānenāpi ca taduttarameva bhoktavyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8111: vastutastu aparāhṇādividhayo na niyamārthāḥ kintu prāśastyātiśayārthāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8113: aparāhṇe pitṝṇāṃ tu tatra dānaṃ praśasyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:8115: ataśca teṣāmaniyatatvāttatra sarvabelānāṃ prasaktau yukte rātriparyudāsaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:8124: vidhijño vidhimāsthāya rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8130: dināṣṭamabhāgāntyamuhūrtayoḥ punarniṣedhāt na tu sarvathā vihitatvameva rātriprātaḥ kālavat
GSD36mvir_sau:8135: bhavatu vā ekodiṣṭavṛddhyādiṣu madhyāhnaprātarādiśrutirniyamārthā aparāhṇaśrutistu pārvaṇe pūrvodāhṛtavākyaiḥ prāśastyātiśayārthaiva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8137: atra ca pārvaṇasyāparāhṇakālatve 'pi prārambhaḥ kutapa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8138: ahno muhūrtā vijñeyā daśa pañca ca sarvadā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8139: tatrāṣṭamo muhūrto yaḥ sa kālaḥ kutapaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8145: etasyāpi ca vikṛtibhūte pārvaṇe vyavasthā smaryate mārkaṇḍeyena--
GSD36mvir_sau:8147: kṛṣṇapakṣāparāhṇe tu rauhiṇaṃ tu na laṅghayet // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8150: idaṃ hi vacanaṃ śuklapakṣasambandhināṃ yugamanvādisāṃvatsarikādīnāṃ sarveṣā sarvasya prayogasya pūrvāhṇakālatvaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣasambandhināṃ cāparāhṇakālatvaṃ na vidadhāti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8155: tena dvedhāvibhaktapūrvāhṇāntargatasya kutapapūrvabhāgasya tādṛśāparāhṇāntargatasya ca taduttarabhāgasya pakṣabhedenopakramakālatvavyavasthāpanamevānena vākyena kriyata iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:8157: dve śukle dve tathā kṛṣṇe yugādī kavayo viduḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8168: evamāmaśrāddhaṃ tu pūrvāhne ityatrāpi sa eva /
GSD36mvir_sau:8172: ayaṃ cāmaśrāddhe pūrvāhnavidhirdvijātikarttṛkāmaśrāddha eva na tu śūdrakarttṛkāmaśrāddhe 'pi
GSD36mvir_sau:8185: vacanaṃ tu yadi sākaraṃ tadā sarvatrāmaśrāddhe pūrvāhṇavikalpitaṃ kālāntaraṃ vidhattāṃ na tu śūdrāmaśrāddhe kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8189: atra ca prātaḥkālaḥ pañcadhāvibhāgena pakṣāntareṣu prātarvibhāgābhāvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8190: yastu tredhācaturdhāvibhaktadinādyabhāgayorapi kvacitprātaḥśabdaprayogaḥ sa gauṇa ityuktaṃ parvanirṇaye /
GSD36mvir_sau:8205: na coktavacane niṣedhānupapattiḥ tasya samūlatve vikalpenopapatteriti,
GSD36mvir_sau:8209: naca tripiṇḍapadena piṇḍamātravidhānaṃ tritvaṃ tu avayutyānuvāda iti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8210: bhavanmate niṣedhavākyasya nirmūlatvena piṇḍadānarūpaprākṛtāṅgasya punārvidhāne pūrvatvāpatteḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:8211: piṇḍadānasya prādhānyapakṣe tu tasya śrāddhapadenaiva siddheḥ punarvidhāne brāhmaṇabhojanarūpapradhānāntaraparisaṅkhayāpatteḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:8212: na ca niṣedhasya samūlatvāṅgīkāreṇaiva pākṣikatvopapādanārthaṃ piṇḍadānavidhiriti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8215: yadā ca śrotriyo 'bhyati gṛhaṃ vedavidagnicit / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8224: bharaṇīṣu ca kurvīta piṇḍanirvapaṇaṃ na hi /
GSD36mvir_sau:8228: asyāṃ śrāddhaṃ kṛtaṃ yena sa gayāśrāddhakṛdbhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8242: ityādīni śrāddhaniṣedhakāni vacanāni tadekavākyatayā śrāddhaniṣedhakāni vyākhyeyānīti kecit
GSD36mvir_sau:8243: vastutastu hemādrau tithau vāre ca śrāddhasya bihitatvāttatprayuktaśrāddha eva piṇḍadānaniṣedhaḥ
GSD36mvir_sau:8246: sa śrāddhe tannimitte syānnānyaśrāddhe kadācana // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8276: atra hi anekāni śrāddhāni ekasmin vākye upādāya piṇḍadānaniṣedhaḥ śṛyamāṇo na tattacchrāddhaprakaraṇe paṭhita iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:8281: ityādivākyeṣu smṛtyantaravihitaśrāddhānuvādena na piṇḍadānaṃ paryudatyate yenoktadoṣāvakāśaḥ syāt kintu apūrvakarmotpattiḥ kriyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:8292: pañcadaśyāṃ ca bho vīra! meṣasaṅkramaṇe tu vā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8301: māsaṃ samagraṃ parayā bhattyā snāyīta kārttike //
GSD36mvir_sau:8313: darśaṃ vā paurṇamāsīṃ vā prārabhya snānamācaret /
