GSD36mvir_sau:8318: māghasnānavatāṃ puṇyaṃ kramāttatra ca dhāraṇā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8322: caitre māsi mahābāho! puṇyā pratipadā purā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8324: na tasya duritaṃ kiñcinnādhayo vyādhayo nṛpa! /
GSD36mvir_sau:8327: kārttikāśvayuje māsi caitre vāpi tathā nṛpa! // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8333: āśvine māsi vai pūṇyā dvitīyā śuklapakṣagā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8336: vṛścike ca dvitīyāyāṃ śuklāyāṃ pratipūjanam / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8348: māghe māsi tṛtīyāṃ guḍasya lavaṇasya ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8349: dānaṃ śreyaskaraṃ rājan! strīṇāṃ ca puruṣasya ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:8353: śivā śāntā sukhā rājan! caturthī trividhā matā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8354: māsi bhādrapade śuklā śivā lokeṣu pūjitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8355: māsi māghe tathā śuklā yā caturthī mahīpate! /
GSD36mvir_sau:8356: jñeyā sā śāntidā nityaṃ śāntiṃ kuryātsadaiva tu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8357: yadā śuklacaturthyāṃ tu vāro bhaumasya vai bhavet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8358: tadā sā sukhadā jñeyā sukhānāmeti kīrttitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8368: śuklā mārgaśire puṇyā śrāvaṇe yā ca pañcamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8372: yeyaṃ bhādrapade māsi ṣaṣṭhī tu bharatarṣabha! /
GSD36mvir_sau:8384: māsi bhādrapade śuklā saptamī yā gaṇādhipa! /
GSD36mvir_sau:8386: yā tu mārgaśire māsi śuklapakṣe tu saptamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8387: tadā sā kathitā vīra! sarvānandakarī śubhā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8406: tasyāṃ snānaṃ prakurvīta dānaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8409: tasyāṃ vratādi kurvāṇo labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8416: caitre trayodaśī puṇyā tasyāṃ daśaguṇaṃ phalam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8420: māghasya kṛṣṇapakṣe yo dāne bahuphalā hi sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8424: vaiśākhī kārttikī māghī paurṇamāsī mahāphalā / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8443: śuklapakṣe tu saptamyāṃ yadā saṅkramate raviḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8446: sarveṃ koṭiguṇaṃ proktaṃ bhāskarasya vaco yathā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8454: pauṣe budhāṣṭamī śuklā mahābhadrā mahāphalā / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8457: pauṣe māsi yadā devi! aṣṭamyāṃ yamadaivatam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8459: tadā sā tu mahāpuṇyā jayantī cāṣṭamī smṛtā / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8470: nāmnā sā vijayā khyātā tithīnāmuttamā tithiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8471: yo dadāti tilaprasthaṃ prāpya kālaṃ tu vatsaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:8477: hastayuktā tu vaiśākhe jyeṣṭhe tu svātisaṃyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8478: jyeṣṭhayā tu tathāṣāḍhe mūlopetā tu vaiṣṇave //
GSD36mvir_sau:8480: tathā bhādrapade māsi śravaṇena ca saṃyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8488: māghyāṃ tu samatītāyāṃ śravaṇena tu seyutā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8489: dvādaśī yā bhavet kṛṣṇā proktā sā tilavaiṣṇavī //
GSD36mvir_sau:8505: mahatī pūrṇamāsī sā yuktā pūrṇendunā gurau //
GSD36mvir_sau:8508: paurṇamāsī tu mahatī proktā saṃvatsare tu sā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8512: pūrṇimā jīvavāre tu mahacchabdā hi sā tithiḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8514: harikṣetre ca gaṅgāyāṃ sāmudre naimiṣe tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8517: aindre guruḥ śaśī caiva prājāpatye ravistathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8518: pūrṇamāsī tu sā jñeyā mahājyaiṣṭhīti kīrttitā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8520: āgneyaṃ ca yadā ṛkṣaṃ kārtikyāṃ tu bhavetkvacit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8522: yadā yāmyaṃ bhavedṛkṣaṃ puṇyaṃ tasyāṃ tithau kvacit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8524: prājāpatyaṃ yadā ṛkṣaṃ yadā tasyāṃ narādhipa! /
GSD36mvir_sau:8526: mande vārke gurau vāpi vāreṣveteṣu ca triṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:8527: trīṇyetāni ca ṛkṣāṇi proktāni vrahnaṇā svayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8534: meṣasthasca yadā sauriḥ siṃhe ca gurucandramāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8535: bhāskaraḥ śravaṇākhye tu mahāmāghī tu sā smṛtā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8540: amā somena bhaumena guruṇā raviṇā tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8546: amāvāsyā yadā puṣye raudrarkṣe vā punarvasau /
GSD36mvir_sau:8550: māghāsite pañcagaśī kadācidupaiti yogaṃ yadi vāruṇena /
GSD36mvir_sau:8551: ṛkṣeṇa kālaḥ sa paraḥ pitṝṇāṃ na hyalpapuṇyairnṛpa! labhyate 'sau //
GSD36mvir_sau:8562: divaiva yogaḥ śasto 'yaṃ na tu rātrau kadācana / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8568: kapilāṃ ca dvijāgryāya dattvā kratuphalaṃ labhet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8570: bhādramāsyasite pakṣe bhānau caiva kare sthite /
GSD36mvir_sau:8571: pāte kuje ca rohiṇyāṃ sā ṣaṣṭhī kapilābhidhā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8575: ayaṃ ca yadā sampūrṇaḥ tadaiva puṇyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8577: saṃyoge tu caturṇāṃ tu nirddiṣṭā paraṇeṣṭhinā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8580: amāvāsyā tu somena saptamī bhānunā saha /
GSD36mvir_sau:8588: ekādaśyāṃ site pakṣe puṣyarkṣaṃ yadi jāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:8591: śukle vā yadi vā kṛṣṇe caturthī vā caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8596: rātrau snānaṃ na kurvīta dānaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8597: naimittikaṃ ca kurvīta snānaṃ dānaṃ ca rātriṣu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8600: madhyaṃ dine 'rdharātre ca śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā tu sāmiṣam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8605: tatra siṃhārke śuklacaturthyāṃ candradarśanaṃ na kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8613: ṣaṣṭhīṣu tailaṃ palamaṣṭamīṣu kṣaurakriyāṃ caiva caturdaśīṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:8614: strīsevanaṃ naṣṭakalāsu puṃsāmāyuḥkṣayārthaṃ munayo vadanti // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8618: saptamyāṃ na spṛśettailaṃ nīlavastraṃ na dhārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8619: na cāpyāmalakaiḥ snānaṃ na kuryātkalahaṃ naraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8623: saptamyāṃ naiva bhuñjīta tāmrapātreṇa bhojanam // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8628: atra sannihitaṃ pāpaṃ taile māṃse bhage kṣure //
GSD36mvir_sau:8632: iti smaraṇāt tato 'nyatra doṣābhāva iti, tanna /
GSD36mvir_sau:8635: tailaniṣedhe ca sarvatra tilatailasyaiva niṣedhaḥ tailapadasya tatraiva śakteḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8640: caturdaśī aṣṭamī ca amāvāsyā ca pūrṇimā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8645: viṇmūtrabhojanaṃ nāma prayāti narakaṃ naraḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8648: parvasu nādīyīta na māṃsamasnīyāt parvasu hi rakṣaḥpiśācavyabhicārivīnnatambinīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8653: tailaṃ māṃsaṃ vyavāyaṃ ca kṣuraṃ caiva vivarjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8656: bhage māṃse kṣure taile nityaṃ tiṣṭhati parvasu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8659: patraṃ vā pāṭayetteṣāṃ brahmahatyāṃ sa vindati //
GSD36mvir_sau:8670: vasyā vāsyā vasī vāsī amāpūrvā ameti ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8680: māse nabhasyamāvāsyāṃ darbho grāhyo navaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8683: kuśāḥ śākaṃ ca puṣpāṇi gavārthe ca tṛṇādikam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8690: amāvāsyāsu sarvāsu navaṃ vastraṃ na dhārayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8704: vastraṃ ca pīḍayennaiva kṣureṇāpi na hiṃsyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:8705: hemādrau tu caturthacaraṇe kareṇāpi hi budhyate iti pāṭhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8707: tailaṃ na saṃspṛśedāmaṃ vṛkṣādīn chedayenna ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8708: pakṣādau ca ravau ṣaṣṭyāṃ riktāyāṃ ca tathā tithau //
GSD36mvir_sau:8718: nandāsu nābyaṅgamupācareta kṣauraṃ ca riktāsu jayāsu māṃsam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8719: pūrṇāsu yoṣit parivarjanīyā bhadrāsu sarvāṇi samārabheta //
GSD36mvir_sau:8720: nābhyaṅgamarke na ca bhūmiputre kṣīraṃ ca śukre ca kuje ca māṃsam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8721: budhena yoṣā na samācareta śeṣeṣu sarvāṇi sadaiva kuryāt //
GSD36mvir_sau:8722: citrāsu haste śravaṇeṣu tailaṃ kṣīraṃ viśākhāpratipatsu varjyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8728: na mṛcca nodakaṃ vāpi na niśāyāṃ tu gomayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8730: ayaṃ ca niṣedhaḥ śaucādyatiriktakarmasu tatra mṛdgrahaṇasya vihita tvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8733: ravibhavanasthe kāryaṃ jīve na kāryo vivāhastu //
GSD36mvir_sau:8738: siṃhe gurau siṃhalave vivāho neṣṭaśca godottarataśca yāvat /
GSD36mvir_sau:8745: supte viṣṇau nivartante kriyāḥ sarvāḥ śubhādikāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8748: puṇyāni yāni karmāṇi na syuḥ supte jagatpatau // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8752: āhāraṃ maithunaṃ nidrāṃ svādhyāyaṃ ca caturthakam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8758: adhyetā narakaṃ yāti dātā nāpnoti tatphalam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8761: rātrau dānaṃ na kurvīta kadācidapi kena cit /
GSD36mvir_sau:8763: viśeṣato niśīthe tu na śubhaṃ karma śarmaṇe /
GSD36mvir_sau:8779: tailābhyaṅgo nārkavāre na bhaume no saṅkrāntau vaidhṛtau viṣṭiṣaṣṭhyoḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8780: parvasvaṣṭamyāṃ ca neṣṭaḥ sa iṣṭaḥ proktānmuktvā vāsare sūryasūnoḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8782: mohātpratipadaṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ kuhūṃ riktāṃ tithiṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8787: tailābhyaṅgaṃ na kurvīta kuryurvā navamīṃ vinā //
GSD36mvir_sau:8789: pañcamī daśamī caiva tṛtīyā ca trayodaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8792: caturṇāṃ tasya vṛddhiḥ syāt dhanāpatyabalāyuṣām // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8796: snāne vā yadi vāsnāne pavkatailaṃ na duṣyati //
GSD36mvir_sau:8802: ghṛtaṃ ca sārṣapaṃ tailaṃ yattailaṃ puṣpavāsitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8809: yadi nāma caturdaśyāṃ sadā māṃsaṃ vivarjayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:8811: caturthī cāṣṭamī caiva dvādaśī ca caturdaśī /
GSD36mvir_sau:8813: saṅkrame cāpi sūryasya viṣuve cāpi vārṣike /
GSD36mvir_sau:8814: māṃsāttu virato martyo yāti svargaṃ dinatrayam //
GSD36mvir_sau:8818: yo naraḥ kārttike māsi māṃsaṃ tu perivarjayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8820: kālanirṇayadīpikāyāṃ tu yadi nāma caturdaśyāmiti sthāne yadi nāma ca śarvaryāmiti pāṭhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8823: viṣṇuḥ--parvasu avaśyaṃ tilahomān kuryādalaṅkṛtastiṣṭhet evamācārasevī syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:8836: prājāpatyena brahmacaryakālena ca jāyayā sahaitāṃ rātriṃ sūryācandramasau vasata iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8847: anena ślokapūrvārdhena pratiyugamācāraśabdavācyāgnihotrādikarmaṇāṃ bheda uktastadbhedādeva ca tatpratipādakaśrutyādipramāṇasyāpi bheda uktastatra karmabhede hetumāhottarārdhena--nānādharmā ityādinā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8860: upadravāśca vartante ādhayaḥ kṣudbhayaṃ tathā // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8863: yugasvabhāvādaharaharapacīyamānajñānakarmendriyaśaktīnāṃ dvijātīnāṃ katipayāṅgasahitāgnihotrādikarmaṇāṃ pramādālasyādibhistattadaṅgahānāttattvenāpratyabhijñāyamānānāṃ bhedādiva tatpratipādakānāṃ śrutyādīnāmapi bheda iva bhavati na punaḥ śrutyādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ vā vāstavo bheda ityabhiprāyaḥ anayaiva ca diśā evañjātīyakāni vacanāni bodhyāni /
GSD36mvir_sau:8881: dvāpare yajñamevāhuḥ kalau dānaṃ dayā damaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8883: tapo dharmaḥ kṛtayuge jñānaṃ tretāyuge sthitam /
GSD36mvir_sau:8884: dvāpare cādhvaraḥ proktastiṣye dānaṃ dayā damaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8890: dhyānaṃ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ yajanaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8893: jñānaṃ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ ca tataḥ param /
GSD36mvir_sau:8894: dvāpare ca tathā yajñaḥ pratiṣṭhā tu kalau yuge //
GSD36mvir_sau:8897: kṛte tu mānavā dharmāstretāyāṃ gautamā matāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8899: tapaḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge ityādyuktaṃ tatra hetumāha--
GSD36mvir_sau:8902: dvāpare rudhire caiva kalau tvannādiṣu sthitāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8903: prāṇanādivṛttipañcakopeto vāyuviśaśeṣaḥ prāṇaḥ, sa cāsthimāṃsādimayeṣu śarīreṣu karmasūtranibaddho
GSD36mvir_sau:8907: yuge yuge ca ye dharmāstatra tatra ca ye dvijāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8908: teṣāṃ nindā na kartavyā yugarūpā hi te dvijāḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8910: kāmakrodhalobhādīn sarvān doṣānkālakṛtān jñātvā kasyāpi nindāṃ na kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8912: jito dharmo hyadharmeṇa satyaṃ caivānṛtena ca /
GSD36mvir_sau:8917: sthitirhi satyaṃ dharmasya tasmātsatyaṃ na lopayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8920: yugānurūpaṃ svasvasāmarthyamālocya mukyakalpenānukalpe na vā nityanaimittikāni karmāṇyanutiṣṭhatā pratiṣiddhāni ca varjayatāṃ pramādakṛtapātakaprāyaścittāni cācaratāmatyantāśaktānāṃ vānindyatvam tadanyeṣāṃ nindyatvamiti vastusthiriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8921: evaṃ satyapi vastuto nindyasyāpi svayaṃ doṣānnāviṣkuryāditi teṣāṃ nindā na kartavyetyasyābhiprāya iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:8933: dvāpare bhagavān viṣṇuḥ kalau devo maheśvaraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8937: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kalirityatra keśavaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8941: manuṣyāstu tadā śāntā nirvairāḥ suhṛdaḥ samāḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8942: yajante tapasā devaṃ śamena ca damena ca //
GSD36mvir_sau:8947: taṃ tadā manujā devaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ harim /
GSD36mvir_sau:8966: puṣkaraṃ tu kṛte sevyaṃ tretāyāṃ naimiṣaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:8967: dvāpare tu kurukṣetraṃ kalau gaṅgāṃ samāśrayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:8969: kṛte tu sarvatīrthāni tretāyāṃ puṣkaraṃ param /
GSD36mvir_sau:8970: dvāpare tu kurukṣetraṃ kalau gaṅgā viśiṣyate //
GSD36mvir_sau:8975: dvāpare kulamekaṃ tu karttāraṃ tu kalau yuge //
GSD36mvir_sau:8983: sarvāvasthāṃ gato vāpi yukto vā sarvapātakaiḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:8984: yastvoṃnamaḥ śivāyeti mucyate tu kalau naraḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:8988: sadā taṃ yajate yastu śraddhayā munipuṅgava! /
GSD36mvir_sau:8994: ye taṃ viprāstu sevante yena kenāpi śaṅkaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:9003: na hyataḥ paramo lābho dehināṃ bhrāmyatāmiha /
GSD36mvir_sau:9004: yato vindeta paramāṃ śāntiṃ naśyati saṃsṛtiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9009: yadabhyarcya hariṃ bhattyā kṛte varṣaśataṃ nṛpa! /
GSD36mvir_sau:9013: ye 'rcayanti narā nityaṃ te 'pi vandyā yathā hariḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9027: ubhe vimuktide plaṃsāṃ prāpte dāvānale kalau //
GSD36mvir_sau:9033: mantrervinā na sidhdyānti prajñāḥ śuddhistu durlabhā //
GSD36mvir_sau:9034: kāle kalau viśeṣeṇa śuddhaṃ ghastu na dṛśyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:9035: kalau yuge hi tamasā naṣṭadharme bhayaṅkare //
GSD36mvir_sau:9037: vinā gaṅgāṃ dharmamayīṃ gatiḥ syācca kathaṃ kalau /
GSD36mvir_sau:9038: śirasaḥ karttanaṃ tasya prāṇatyāgo 'pi vā varaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9039: samarthastu kalau kāle gaṅgāṃ yo nābhigacchati //
GSD36mvir_sau:9043: anāśritya tu gaṅgāṃ hi muktimicchati yaḥ kalau /
GSD36mvir_sau:9045: vṛthā kulaṃ vṛthā vidyā vṛthā yajñā vṛthā tapaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9046: vṛthā dānāni tasyeha kalau gaṅgāṃ na yāti yaḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9052: narāśvamedhau madyaṃ ca kalau varjyaṃ dvijātibhiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9055: kalau pañca na kurvīta bhrātṛjāyāṃ kamaṇḍalum //
GSD36mvir_sau:9058: na yajñe govadhaḥ kāryaḥ kalau ca na kamaṇḍaluḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9106: kalau pañca na kurvīta bhrātṛjāyāṃ kamaṇḍalum //
GSD36mvir_sau:9108: akṣatā gopaśuścaiva śrāddhe māṃsaṃ tathā madhu /
GSD36mvir_sau:9133: vaiśākhe dhanadāyī ca jyeṣṭhe mṛtyuprado bhavet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9143: phālgune mārgaśīrṣe ca jyeṣṭhe dīkṣātra madhyamā //
GSD36mvir_sau:9150: śuklapakṣe śubharkṣe ca śubhavāratithau tathā / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9153: na vinā parva dīkṣā syāt varṣāsu madhupauṣayoḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9154: anyatra tu sadā kāryā viśuddhau guruśiṣyayoḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9156: iti varṣādiniṣiddhakāleṣvapi śubhaśakunādyupalamme sati dakṣikāryetyāha hemādriḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9158: śuklapakṣe 'tha kṛṣṇe vā dīkṣā sarvasukhāvahā / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9164: pūrṇimā pañcamī caiva dvitīyā saptamī tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9165: trayodaśī ca daśamī praśastāḥ sarvakāmadāḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9171: dvitīyā pañcamī caiva ṣaṣṭhī cāpi viśeṣataḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9176: paurṇamāsīṃ vinā śeṣā hitā muktau mumukṣubhiḥ //
GSD36mvir_sau:9178: saptamyāṃ ca navamyāṃ ca ekādaśyāmathāpi vā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9182: guṇairyuktā tu saṅgrāhyā guṇairhīnāṃ tu vrajayet / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9194: tāṃ tāṃ tithiṃ samālocya tadbhaktāṃstatra dīkṣayet /
GSD36mvir_sau:9200: dvitīyā ca śriyaḥ proktā pārvatyāstu tṛtīyikā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9201: nityā mārgeṣu pārvatyā aṣṭamī ca caturdaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:9202: caturthī gaṇanāthasya bhānoḥ proktā tu saptamī /
GSD36mvir_sau:9203: evaṃ mukyāstu tithayaḥ surendra! paribhāṣitāḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9206: ādityaṃ maṅgalaṃ sauriṃ tyaktvā vārāstu bhūtaye / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9209: ravau gurau site some kartavyaṃ budhaśukrayoḥ / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9217: hastaḥ svātiranurādhā maghā mūlaṃ ca revatī /
GSD36mvir_sau:9218: abhijit śravaṇaṃ ce ti śivayoge caturdaśī //
GSD36mvir_sau:9242: varīyāṃśca śivaḥ siddho brahmā aindraśca ṣoḍaśa /
GSD36mvir_sau:9248: śakunyādīni viṣṭiṃ ca viśeṣeṇa vivarjayet / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9257: lagnadoṣā grahadoṣāḥ sarve naśyanti vai śubhe /
GSD36mvir_sau:9258: lagnasthe bhārgave prauḍhe kendrasthe vā bṛhaspatau //
GSD36mvir_sau:9260: maumukṣavīṃ pratyayaṃ tu na kālaniyamaḥ smṛtaḥ // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9265: tridhā sthāpyātra yaḥ śeṣo yāmasaṅkhyoditā hi sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:9266: tridhā sthāpyātra yaḥ śeṣo yāmasahkhyoditā hi sā //
GSD36mvir_sau:9269: māsi tasmin tathā yāme kurvīta grahaṇaṃ manoḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9270: jyotiḥśāstraśunirṇīte lagne vā dīkṣito bhavet // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9273: deyamantravarṇān koṣṭhacakre catuṣkoṣṭhātmakamekakoṣṭhamaṅgīkṛtya siddhasādhyasusiddhavairibhedena pṛthakkṛtya tanmadhye siddhasusiddhavarṇānekīkṛtya sādhyavairivarṇān pratyekaṃ daśabhirguṇayitvā sarvamekīkṛtāhkān pṛthak sthānatraye saṃsthāpya prathamamaṣṭabhirharet /
GSD36mvir_sau:9277: tatra tasmin māse śuklapakṣe tasmin dine tasmin prahare mantramupadiśet /
GSD36mvir_sau:9291: śiṣyānukūle kāle vā dehaśuddhiḥ subhāvahā / iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9295: mantropadeśo guruṇā sādhanaṃ ca śubhāvaham // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9311: tasminkāle yadgurorgṛhītaṃ tat nṛṣu iṣṭaṃ dadātīti sambandhaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9329: dīkṣā kāryā tu kāleṣu pavitrāropakarmaṇi // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9333: prayāge śrīgirau kāśyāṃ kālākālau na śodhayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9338: karuṇāsamaye ca gurornakṣatrādīṣyate na dīkṣāyām // iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9344: grāme vā yadi vāraṇye kṣetre vā divase niśi //
GSD36mvir_sau:9347: na tithirna jalaṃ homo na snānaṃ na japakriyā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9348: dīkṣāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ kintu svecchāvāpte hi sadgurau //
GSD36mvir_sau:9349: iha kecit candragrahe dīkṣā na kāryā jaḍatvaṃ tadā syādityāhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9361: evaṃ grahaṇādikāleṣu uktamāsaśukladvādaśyādiṣu viṣṇudīkṣā kāryā iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9367: cakriṇaṃ halinaṃ caiva śārṅgiṇaṃ khaṅginaṃ tathā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9369: ajitaṃ cācyutaṃ caiva sarvaṃ sarveśvaraṃ pṛthum /
GSD36mvir_sau:9371: kūrmaṃ varāhaṃ matsyaṃ vā jalaprataraṇe smaret /
GSD36mvir_sau:9383: vāmanaṃ khaṅginaṃ caiva duḥsvapneṣu ca saṃsmaret //
GSD36mvir_sau:9387: maṅgalyaṃ maṅgale viṣṇuṃ māṅgalyeṣu ca kīrttayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9394: kāryārambhe tathā rājan! yatheṣṭaṃ nāma kīrttayet //
GSD36mvir_sau:9397: tasmadyatheṣṭaṃ khalu devanāma sarveṣu kāryeṣu japettu bhatkyā //
GSD36mvir_sau:9403: tāmāśiṣamāśāse taṃ tave jyotiṣmatīmiti brūyādyadyasya putro jātaḥ syāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:9405: evaṃ ca upalakṣyavayovasthāviśeṣaṇībhūtavayasa ādhānakālatvaṃ sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:9407: baudhāyanaḥ, vivāho vyākhyāto 'trāgnyādheyasya kālo yathāśraddhamata ūrddhaṃ jīvati pitaryagnīnādadhīteti baudhāyanaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9411: jīvati pitarīti pakṣe caupāsanaṃ dhārayato na pratyavāya ityuktaṃ baudhāyanenaiva--”na durbrāhmaṇo bhavatyaupāsanaṃ dhārayamāṇa”iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9412: eṣa traivarṇikasādhāraṇaḥ kālo 'dhunā varṇāviśeṣapuraṣkāreṇa ṛtuviśeṣā vivicyante /
GSD36mvir_sau:9413: tatra śrutiḥ--vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīnādadhīta, grīṣme rājanyaḥ, śaradi
GSD36mvir_sau:9415: rathakāro na”māhiṣyeṇa karaṇyāṃ tu rathakāraḥ prajāyate”iti yājñabalkyokto
GSD36mvir_sau:9417: āpastambastu--vasanto brāhmaṇasya grīṣmo rājanyasya hemanto vā śaradvaiśyasya varṣāsu rathakārasya
GSD36mvir_sau:9418: ye trayāṇāṃ varṇānāmetatkarma kuryusteṣā meṣa kālaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9421: ye brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyāḥ eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ madhye etatkarma rathakarma kuryusteṣāmeṣa kāla iti, evaṃ ca rathakāro na jātiviśeṣaḥ kintu
GSD36mvir_sau:9424: baudhāyanaḥ--yadaivainaṃ śraddhopanamedathādadhīta saivāsyarddhiḥ tadetadārttasyātivelaṃ vā śraddhāyuktasyeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9428: kātyāyanena--vasanto brāhmaṇabrahmavarcasakāmayoḥ grīṣmaḥ kṣatriyaśrīkāmayoḥ varṣāḥ prajāpaśukāmavaiśyarathakṛtāmiti
GSD36mvir_sau:9429: etena brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyānāṃ kāmyā anye 'pi kālā iti siddham /
GSD36mvir_sau:9432: saurā api mīnameṣau meṣavṛṣau vetyādibhedena dvividhā ityapi coktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9434: sārvavarṇika”ityetasmānmāghaphālgunau ca militvā pañca māsā brāhmaṇasyādhānakāla iti siddham
GSD36mvir_sau:9438: tathā phālgunīpūrṇamāsa ādadhītetyuktvā dvyahe puraikāhe veti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9442: baudhāyanasaktu-yā vaiśākhyāḥ paurṇamāsyā upariṣṭādamāvāsyā bhavati sā sakṛtsavaṃtsarasya rohiṇyā sampadyate tasyāmādadhīteti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9445: paurṇamāsyāmāpūryamāṇapakṣe vā puṇye nakṣatre 'tra yattrīṇi nipatanti tatsamūham /
GSD36mvir_sau:9452: tatra kātyāyanaḥ--kṛttikārohiṇīmṛgaśiraḥ phalgunīṣu hasto lābha kāmasya citrā ceti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9454: āśvalāyanaḥ-agnyādheyaṃ kṛttikāsu rohiṇyāṃ mṛgaśirasi phalgunīṣu viśākhayoruttarayoḥ prauṣṭhapadayoreteṣāmekasmin kasmiṃścit /
GSD36mvir_sau:9455: āpastambastu--kṛttikāsu brāhmaṇa ādadhīta mukhyo brhanavarcasī bhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:9458: mṛgaśīrṣe brahmavarcasakāmo yajñakāmo vā yaḥ purābhadraḥ sanpāpīyān syātsa punarvasvorādadhīta
GSD36mvir_sau:9459: pūrvayoḥ phalgunyoryaḥ kāmayeta, dānakāmā me prajāḥ syuriti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9461: etadeva viparītamathāparaṃ pūrvayorādhāya pāpīyān bhavati uttarayorvaśīyān haste yaḥ kāmayeta prame dīyeteti citrāyāṃ rājanyo bhrātṛvyavān viśākhayoḥ prajākāmo 'nurādhe vṛddhikāmaḥ uttareṣu prauṣṭhapadeṣu pratiṣṭhākāmaḥ sarvāṇi nityavadeke samāmananti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9466: atra akāmyamānamapi aniṣṭaṃ phalaṃ bhavati vastu sāmarthyāt”yo
GSD36mvir_sau:9477: yaḥ sarvakarmabhyo 'gnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ somameva kartumicchati sa ṛtuṃ nakṣatraṃ ca na sūrkṣetaunādriyeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:9480: rudradattena tu nakṣatragrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārthamiti na parvādara iti uktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9483: nādyaḥ, prakaraṇādādhānakālamātrabādho yukto na somasya tasyāprakṛtatvāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:9484: kiñca na hi some āpastambena nakṣatrāṇyuktāni yena kathañcidbuddhisthatāmātreṇa bādha ucyeteti
GSD36mvir_sau:9486: evaṃ sati atra vākye brāhmaṇaṃ prati ṛtvanādarakathanamanarthaṃ syāt,
GSD36mvir_sau:9488: na ca vasantastadānīṃ somāṅgameva nādhānāṅgamiti vācyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9493: yakṣyamāṇa”ityatra darśapūrṇamāsottarakālatārūpaḥ somakāla ādhānasomayorekāhasambandhena bādhyata ityuktam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9494: tattulyanyāye nātrāpi vasantānādareṇa kālāntare ādhāne kriyamāṇe somādhānayorekāhasambandhārthaṃ somasyāpyṛturbādhyata eva tasmānna somakālamātrasya na vādhānakālamātrasya bādhaḥ ato vacanamanarthakamiti atra vadāmaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9495: satyaṃ, naikamātrakālabādha iti, kintu somādhānayordvayorapi kālo bādhyate
GSD36mvir_sau:9498: ata eva”yadaivainaṃ yajña upanamedathādadhīta”iti bhāradvājena nakṣatrādyanādara ukto yakṣyamāṇatvābhisandhimata iti na kiñcidanupapannam
GSD36mvir_sau:9499: uttarāyaṇaṃ sarvamādhānakāla ityuktamācāryairityuktaṃ baudhāyanabhāṣye keśavasvā minā /
GSD36mvir_sau:9500: yadyapi jyotiḥśāstre lagnādyuktamādhāne, tathāpi tadupādeyameva tasya
GSD36mvir_sau:9502: apare tu smārttatvenāsya smārttādhāna evopasaṃhāro na śrautādhāna iti vadanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9503: etacca malamāsādiṣu tathā guruśukramauḍhyādiṣu na kāryam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9510: ayanam ayanaṃ pratīti pratyayanaṃ pratidakṣiṇāyanaṃ pratyuttarāyaṇaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9516: āpastambaḥ--saṃvatsare saṃvatsare yajeta ṣaṭsu ṣaṭūsu vā māseṣvityeke /
GSD36mvir_sau:9519: tena varṣāntare ādhānadivasa ityartha ityeke bhāṣyakṛtaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9522: saṃvatsarasyaivādhikaraṇatve tatra ca kadetyapekṣite ṛtuvyāvṛttāvityekaḥ suvayasa ityapara iti kāladvayam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9523: ṛtuvyāvṛttau = rsavatsaramadhye yasmin kasmiṃścit ṛtuvyāvṛttidina ityarthaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9525: bhāṣyakāramate ṛtuvyāvṛttau pratiṛtuvyāvṛttāvevaṃ saṃvatsare ṣaṭ iti pakṣāntaraṃ suyavasa iti ca pakṣāntaraṃ svatantrameva saṃvatsarapakṣāditi
GSD36mvir_sau:9526: ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu māseṣu iti ca pakṣāntaram /
GSD36mvir_sau:9528: keṣāṃcinmate tu ṣaṇmāse ityetatpakṣe āvṛttimukha iti yojayanti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9529: evaṃ ca bhāṣyakāramate pratisaṃvatsaramādhānadina ityekaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:9530: ādhānadināt ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu māseṣviti dvitīyaḥ, saṃvatsaramadhye pratiṛtuvyāvṛttāviti tṛtīyaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:9533: keṣācinmate tu saṃvatsare saṃvatsare iti pakṣe yasmin kasmiṃścidṛtāvekaḥ,
GSD36mvir_sau:9534: suyavase vetyaparaḥ, ṣaṭsu ṣaṭsu māseṣ iti pakṣe ca āvṛttimukha iti tṛtīya iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9543: apare tu śuklapakṣaḥ sampūrṇa iti āhuḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9545: athavā na kṣīyate candramā asminniti nakṣatraṃ paurṇamāsītyartha iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9546: etanmate paurṇamāsyāṃ darśapaurṇamāsa prayogārambhātpaurṇamāsīmārabhya darśaparyantaṃ na karmāntarārambhaḥ, na karmavati karmāntarārambha iti niyamāt /
GSD36mvir_sau:9547: bhāṣyakārastu tato nānījānaṃ paśunā saṃvatsaro 'tīyādityarthavādāntargatavākyaparyālocanayā ādhānadivasātsaṃvatsaramadhye yasmin kasmiṃścitparvaṇi paśuḥ kārya iti ṣaṣṭhaṃ kālamāha /
GSD36mvir_sau:9548: eṣa ca puśurnityaḥ”saṃvatsare saṃvatsare”iti pratyayanamiti ca vīpsāśravāt, etadakaraṇe manvādyuktaprāyaścittasya vakṣyamāṇatvācca /
GSD36mvir_sau:9551: tatra cāturmāsyāni kartavyānītyuktaṃ yājñabalkyena--cāturmāsyāni caiva hīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9557: tatra saṃvatsaraprayogavantyapi dvividhāni, ṛtakuyājikalpena cāturmāsyayājikalpena ceti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9558: eteṣāṃ prayogāṇāṃ bhede ca pramāṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇatattatkālavidhita evāvaseyam
GSD36mvir_sau:9562: tatra sāṃvatsarikaprayoge ṛtuyājikalpe vaiśvadevādikāla ukta āpastambena /
GSD36mvir_sau:9563: vasante vaiśvadevena yajate prāvṛṣi varuṇapraghāsaiḥ śaradi sākamedhairiti vijñāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:9564: atra triṣu parvasu niyataḥ kāla uktaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9565: śunāsīrīye tu ṛtuyājisaṃjñānurodhācchiśira eva grāhya iti pratibhāti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9568: anekeṣu kāleṣu satsvapi”ityanena bhāradvājavacanenoktasya tasyābādhenaivopapattau bādhakalpanāyogāt
GSD36mvir_sau:9569: cāturmāsyayājikalpe tathā yāvajjīvaprayoge 'pi kāla uktenaiva yaścaturṣu
GSD36mvir_sau:9571: tatrāpi niyamamāha-phālgunyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ caitryāṃ vā vaiśvadevena yajeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:9572: tataścaturṣu māseṣu āṣāḍhyāṃ vā śrāvaṇyāṃ varuṇapraghāsairyajeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:9573: tataścaturṣu māseṣu pūrvasmin parvaṇyupakramya dvyahaṃ sākamedhairyajeta /
GSD36mvir_sau:9574: tato dvyahetryahe caturahe 'rddhamāse māli caturṣu vā māseṣu śunāsīrīyairiti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9575: atra yadā phālgunyāmupakramastādāṣāḍhyāmityādi, yadā caitryāṃ tadā
GSD36mvir_sau:9577: asya pakṣasya ṛtuyājipakṣādayameva bhedo yadṛtuyāji pakṣe vasantānte vaiśvadevairiṣṭvā prāvṛḍādyaparvaṇi varuṇapraghāsānuṣṭhānamapi sambhavati /
GSD36mvir_sau:9578: cāturmāsyayājipakṣe caturṣu caturṣu ca māseṣviti niyama iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9580: tatra bhāradvājaḥ--dvādaśāhāni yakṣyamāṇaḥ pratipadi vaiśvānarapārjanyābhyāṃ dvitīye vaiśvadevena tṛtīye caturthe voparamya
GSD36mvir_sau:9581: pañcame varuṇapraghāsaiḥ ṣaṣṭhe saptame voparamyāṣṭame navame vā sākamedhairdaśame ekādaśe voparamya dvādaśe śunāsīrīyayā, trayodaśe paśuriti saṃvatsarapratimā vai dvādaśa rātrayaḥ saṃvatsarameva yajeteti vijñāyate /
GSD36mvir_sau:9582: trayodaśe paśuriti yadi paśunā samāptistatpakṣe bodhyam /
GSD36mvir_sau:9583: atra dvitīyādipadāni dvitīyāditithiparāṇi pratipadīti upakramāt spaṣṭe coktaṃ baudhāyanena--
GSD36mvir_sau:9585: caturthyāṃ varuṇapraghāsairaṣṭamyāṃ navamyāṃ ca sākamedheḥ dvādaśyāṃ śunāsīrīyaiḥ puruṣo yajeteti vijñāyata iti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9587: nakṣatre prayoga ityeka āhurūdagayana āpūryamāṇapakṣe puṇyāhe prayuñjīteti
GSD36mvir_sau:9588: atra pakṣe āpūryamāṇasya pakṣasya puṇyanakṣatre upakramaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9592: kathamu khalu yāvajjīvaprayuktānāṃ cāturmāsyānāmanuprayogo bhavatīti phālgunyāṃ vā caitryāṃ vā paurṇamāsyāṃ śunāsīrīyapuruṣo ya jetātha vaiśvadevāyopavaset vaiśvadeveneṣṭvā paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyāṃ yajetātha cediṣṭayā paśunā somena vā yajeta kathaṃ tatra kuryāditi pratikṛṣyaitasya pakṣasya śunāsīrīyapuruṣo yajetaiṣāmekena yajetātha vaiśvadevāyopavaset
GSD36mvir_sau:9594: atho etadbaudhāyanasya pakṣaṃ vedayante yāvjajīvikānyeva cāturmāsyāni syuriti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9596: atra yadā phālgunyāṃ pūrvasaṃvatsare upakramastadā phālgunyāṃ yadā caitryāmupakramastadā caitryāmiti
GSD36mvir_sau:9597: atha cediṣṭhyeti yadi prayogasamāptyarthaṃ iṣṭyādi kriyate tadāyaṃ kramaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9599: atho etadbaudhāyanasyetyādyuttyā ca yāvajjīvikaprayogo 'pi pākṣiko bodhyaḥ /
GSD36mvir_sau:9602: yathāprayogamiti yāvatā kālena prayogasamāptirbhavati tāvati kāle santataṃ pūrvāhnādau kuryāditi
GSD36mvir_sau:9605: na hi yathāprayogamityanena cāturmāsyakālavidhānaṃ kintu brahmacaryakālasya niyamaḥ prayogadinamitaiva vratacaryeti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9608: yāvajjīvaprayuktānyeva cāturmāsyāni syurantaramithunāni prathame tveva saṃvatsare vrataṃ caredityatrohasmāha śālākiḥ sāṃvatsarikānyeva cāturmāsyāni brahmacaryavantīti /
GSD36mvir_sau:9613: śālikimate tu sāṃvatsarikeṣve vāyaṃ niyamo na yāvajjīvikeṣu /
GSD36mvir_sau:9615: apare tu māstu yathāprayogamityataḥ santatakaraṇaṃ tathāpi”udagayana
GSD36mvir_sau:9616: āpūryamāṇapakṣe samastāni”iti bhāradvājavacanātsamastānāṃ saṃlagnānāṃ prayoga iti /
